Dialogue: All right!! We made it!

Original: Barret: Yo!! This way!!
Dialogue: Yo!! This way!!

Original: Barret: Let's go!! We're gonna dive outta here!!
Dialogue: Let's go!! We're gonna dive outta here!!

Original: Barret: Yo!! Ain't no time to waste!! ...do something!
Dialogue: Yo!! Ain't no time to waste!! ...do something!

Original: Tifa: ...Scary...huh.
Dialogue: ...Scary...huh.

Original: Cloud: Too late to be saying that now. Why'd you come along anyway?
Dialogue: Too late to be saying that now. Why'd you come along anyway?

Original: Tifa: Because...
Dialogue: Because...

Original: Barret: Hey you two! There ain't no time for that!
Dialogue: Hey you two! There ain't no time for that!

Original: Wedge: Guess who? It's me, Wedge! Looks like things were a success.
Dialogue: Guess who? It's me, Wedge! Looks like things were a success.

Original: Wedge: I look just like my little brother in these clothes... I wonder how everyone's doin' now...?
Dialogue: I look just like my little brother in these clothes... I wonder how everyone's doin' now...?

Original: Jessie: It's me, Jessie. How do I look, Cloud? Do I look good in a Shinra uniform?
Dialogue: It's me, Jessie. How do I look, Cloud? Do I look good in a Shinra uniform?

Original: Cloud: ...you look great, just like a man.
Dialogue: ...you look great, just like a man.

Original: Jessie: Yay!! I'm so happy ...I think?
Dialogue: Yay!! I'm so happy ...I think?

Original: Cloud: Just concentrate on our plan.
Dialogue: Just concentrate on our plan.

Original: Jessie: You're right, sorry.
Dialogue: You're right, sorry.

Original: Tifa: Yeah!! I've made up my mind! Watch closely. I'm gonna jump!!
Dialogue: Yeah!! I've made up my mind! Watch closely. I'm gonna jump!!

Original: Cloud: You don't care if I go first?
Dialogue: You don't care if I go first?

Original: Barret: A leader always stays till the end. Don't worry 'bout me, just go!
Dialogue: A leader always stays till the end. Don't worry 'bout me, just go!

Original: Barret: Yo! Don't go gettin' your spikey-ass hurt! It's only the beginnin' of the mission!
Dialogue: Yo! Don't go gettin' your spikey-ass hurt! It's only the beginnin' of the mission!

Original: Barret: Later! You take care of the rest!
Dialogue: Later! You take care of the rest!

Original: Barret: Oh man...... We were forced to get this far out. We can't just go back now. We've gotta go on. Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!
Dialogue: Oh man...... We were forced to get this far out. We can't just go back now. We've gotta go on. Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!

Original: Barret: That was close. I thought we were gonna get caught... They probably don't realize that we've sneaked in yet. We should get to the reactor in no time. Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!
Dialogue: That was close. I thought we were gonna get caught... They probably don't realize that we've sneaked in yet. We should get to the reactor in no time. Biggs, Wedge, and Jessie did good. Now, it's our turn!

Original: Barret: Good, so far everything's going as planned. Better not let your guard down till we get to the Sector 5 reactor. Biggs, Wedge and Jessie got everything ready for us. So MOVE it.
Dialogue: Good, so far everything's going as planned. Better not let your guard down till we get to the Sector 5 reactor. Biggs, Wedge and Jessie got everything ready for us. So MOVE it.

Original: Barret: Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!
Dialogue: Well, the reactor's just down this tunnel!

Original: Cloud: Shinra security guards are there. ...We've got to turn back.
Dialogue: Shinra security guards are there. ...We've got to turn back.

Original: Soldier: You're the AVALANCHE!
Dialogue: You're the AVALANCHE!

Original: Cloud: More security's coming. It's dangerous to stay here.
Dialogue: More security's coming. It's dangerous to stay here.

Original: Cloud: Those light beams are the Shinra's security sensors. We can't go any further.
Dialogue: Those light beams are the Shinra's security sensors. We can't go any further.

Original: Cloud: After coming this far, only an amateur'd get caught by the security sensor.
Dialogue: After coming this far, only an amateur'd get caught by the security sensor.

Original: Barret: That's one damn tiny hole. You tellin' me to squeeze into that to get under the Plate? No way! Yo, Cloud, what're we gonna do?
Dialogue: That's one damn tiny hole. You tellin' me to squeeze into that to get under the Plate? No way! Yo, Cloud, what're we gonna do?

Original: Tifa: ...There seems to be nothing that'll get us stuck in this duct.
Dialogue: ...There seems to be nothing that'll get us stuck in this duct.

Original: Cloud: Yeah. If we go down this duct, we won't be able to come back up here.
Dialogue: Yeah. If we go down this duct, we won't be able to come back up here.

Original: Barret: Don't be wastin' time. Never know when the Shinra'll find us. Cloud, you jes' gotta go.
Dialogue: Don't be wastin' time. Never know when the Shinra'll find us. Cloud, you jes' gotta go.

Original: Barret: But, damn man, that thing gives me the chills.
Dialogue: But, damn man, that thing gives me the chills.

Original: Barret: Whaddya mean we're not goin' in? There ain't no other way of gettin' to the Sector 5 reactor 'cept through here.
Dialogue: Whaddya mean we're not goin' in? There ain't no other way of gettin' to the Sector 5 reactor 'cept through here.

Original: Wedge: Cloud, this way. The reactor's up this ladder.
Dialogue: Cloud, this way. The reactor's up this ladder.

Original: Jessie: I'm sorry. The ID scan problem on the train was all my fault. I made your ID card special...... So that's why it happened... I put my heart into making it. But I failed.
Dialogue: I'm sorry. The ID scan problem on the train was all my fault. I made your ID card special...... So that's why it happened... I put my heart into making it. But I failed.

Original: Jessie: Next time, I'll give you something more decent. I'll be back at the hideout in my research room workin' on it.
Dialogue: Next time, I'll give you something more decent. I'll be back at the hideout in my research room workin' on it.

Original: Biggs: We're gonna pull out now. We'll meet up at the hideout. Cloud, we're countin' on you to blow the reactor!
Dialogue: We're gonna pull out now. We'll meet up at the hideout. Cloud, we're countin' on you to blow the reactor!

Original: Tifa (in flashback): Papa...
Dialogue: Papa...

Original: Tifa (in flashback): Sephiroth!?
Dialogue: Sephiroth!?

Original: Tifa (in flashback): Sephiroth did this to you, didn't he!?
Dialogue: Sephiroth did this to you, didn't he!?

Original: Tifa (in flashback): Sephiroth...SOLDIER... Mako Reactors...Shinra...Everything! I hate them all!
Dialogue: Sephiroth...SOLDIER... Mako Reactors...Shinra...Everything! I hate them all!

Original: Barret: Damn man, get a hold of yourself!
Dialogue: Damn man, get a hold of yourself!

Original: Tifa: You all right?
Dialogue: You all right?

Original: Cloud: ......Tifa.
Tifa: Mmm?
Dialogue: Mmm?

Original: Cloud: No... forget...... Come on, let's hurry!
Dialogue: No... forget...... Come on, let's hurry!

Original: Cloud: I know. You're my watch, right?
Dialogue: I know. You're my watch, right?

Original: Barret: Damn straight. Tifa's old friend... That ain't good enough.
Dialogue: Damn straight. Tifa's old friend... That ain't good enough.

Original: Tifa: Let's hurry, Cloud.
Dialogue: Let's hurry, Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Jessie said we all have to push the button at once.
Dialogue: Jessie said we all have to push the button at once.

Original: Tifa: No good. Let's try it again.
Dialogue: No good. Let's try it again.

Original: Barret: This way!
Dialogue: This way!

Original: Barret: Shinra soldiers!?
Dialogue: Shinra soldiers!?

Original: Barret: SHIT! What the hell's goin' on?
Dialogue: SHIT! What the hell's goin' on?

Original: Cloud: ...a trap...
Dialogue: ...a trap...

Original: Barret: Presi...President Shinra?
Dialogue: Presi...President Shinra?

Original: Tifa: Why is the President here?
Dialogue: Why is the President here?

Original: President Shinra: Hmm... So you all must be that... ...what was it?
Dialogue: Hmm... So you all must be that... ...what was it?

Original: Barret: AVALANCHE! And don't ya forget it! And you're President Shinra, huh?
Dialogue: AVALANCHE! And don't ya forget it! And you're President Shinra, huh?

Original: Cloud: Long time no see, President.
Dialogue: Long time no see, President.

Original: President Shinra: ...Long time no see? Oh...you. You're the one who quit SOLDIER and joined AVALANCHE. I knew you'd been exposed to Mako, from the look in your eyes... Tell me, traitor... what was your name?
Dialogue: ...Long time no see? Oh...you. You're the one who quit SOLDIER and joined AVALANCHE. I knew you'd been exposed to Mako, from the look in your eyes... Tell me, traitor... what was your name?

Original: Cloud: Cloud.
Dialogue: Cloud.

Original: President Shinra: Forgive me for asking, but I can't be expected to remember each person's name. Unless you become another Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Forgive me for asking, but I can't be expected to remember each person's name. Unless you become another Sephiroth.

Original: President Shinra: Yes, Sephiroth... He was brilliant. Perhaps too brilliant...
Dialogue: Yes, Sephiroth... He was brilliant. Perhaps too brilliant...

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth.......?
Dialogue: Sephiroth.......?

Original: Barret: Don't give a damn 'bout none of that! This place's goin' up with a big BANG soon! Serves y'all right!
Dialogue: Don't give a damn 'bout none of that! This place's goin' up with a big BANG soon! Serves y'all right!

Original: President Shinra: And such a waste of good fireworks, just to get rid of vermin like you...
Dialogue: And such a waste of good fireworks, just to get rid of vermin like you...

Original: Barret: VERMIN!? That's all you can say...VERMIN! Y'all Shinra're the VERMIN, killing the planet! And that makes you King VERMIN! So shu'up jackass!
Dialogue: VERMIN!? That's all you can say...VERMIN! Y'all Shinra're the VERMIN, killing the planet! And that makes you King VERMIN! So shu'up jackass!

Original: President Shinra: ...You are beginning to bore me. I'm a very busy man, so if you'll excuse me... I have a dinner I must attend.
Dialogue: ...You are beginning to bore me. I'm a very busy man, so if you'll excuse me... I have a dinner I must attend.

Original: Barret: Dinner!? Don't gimme that! I ain't even started wit' you yet!
Dialogue: Dinner!? Don't gimme that! I ain't even started wit' you yet!

Original: President Shinra: But, I've made arrangements for a playmate for you all.
Dialogue: But, I've made arrangements for a playmate for you all.

Original: Tifa:!? What's that noise?
Dialogue: !? What's that noise?

Original: Barret: The hell is this!?
Dialogue: The hell is this!?

Original: President Shinra: Meet 'Airbuster', a techno-soldier. Our Weapon Development Department created him. I'm sure the data he'll extract from your dead bodies will be of great use to us in future experiments.
Dialogue: Meet 'Airbuster', a techno-soldier. Our Weapon Development Department created him. I'm sure the data he'll extract from your dead bodies will be of great use to us in future experiments.

Original: Cloud: ...Techno-soldier?
Dialogue: ...Techno-soldier?

Original: President Shinra: Now then, if you'll excuse me.
Dialogue: Now then, if you'll excuse me.

Original: Cloud: Wait, President!
Dialogue: Wait, President!

Original: Barret: Yo, Cloud! We've gotta do somethin' 'bout him!
Dialogue: Yo, Cloud! We've gotta do somethin' 'bout him!

Original: Tifa: Help, Cloud!
Dialogue: Help, Cloud!

Original: Tifa: THIS is from SOLDIER?
Dialogue: THIS is from SOLDIER?

Original: Cloud: No way! It's just a machine.
Dialogue: No way! It's just a machine.

Original: Barret: I don't care what it is!! I'm gonna bust him up!
Dialogue: I don't care what it is!! I'm gonna bust him up!

Original: Barret: It's gonna blow! Let's go, Tifa!
Dialogue: It's gonna blow! Let's go, Tifa!

Original: Tifa: Barret! Can't you do something?
Dialogue: Barret! Can't you do something?

Original: Barret: Not a damn thing.
Dialogue: Not a damn thing.

Original: Tifa: Cloud! Please don't die! You can't die! There's still so much I want to tell you!
Dialogue: Cloud! Please don't die! You can't die! There's still so much I want to tell you!

Original: Cloud: I know, Tifa......
Dialogue: I know, Tifa......

Original: Barret: Hey, you gonna be awright?
Dialogue: Hey, you gonna be awright?

Original: Cloud: ............ You worry about yourselves! I'm all right, but take care of Tifa!
Dialogue: ............ You worry about yourselves! I'm all right, but take care of Tifa!

Original: Barret: ...Alright. Sorry 'bout all this.
Dialogue: ...Alright. Sorry 'bout all this.

Original: Cloud: Stop talkin' like this is the end!
Dialogue: Stop talkin' like this is the end!

Original: Cloud: Shit! Can't hold on much longer. Barret......Hurry!
Dialogue: Shit! Can't hold on much longer. Barret......Hurry!

Original: Barret: Don't go cryin' like a woman. There ain't nothin' I can do for ya. Ya gotta do it yourself.
Dialogue: Don't go cryin' like a woman. There ain't nothin' I can do for ya. Ya gotta do it yourself.

Original: Cloud: Barret...
Dialogue: Barret...

Original: Barret: Alright, then, later.
Dialogue: Alright, then, later.

Original: Grey text: ......You all right? ......Can you hear me?
Dialogue: ......You all right? ......Can you hear me?

Original: Cloud: ......Yeah......
Grey text: Back then...... You could get by with just skinned knees......
Dialogue: Back then...... You could get by with just skinned knees......

Original: Cloud: ......What do you mean by 'back then'?
Dialogue: ......What do you mean by 'back then'?

Original: Grey text: What about now? Can you get up?
Dialogue: What about now? Can you get up?

Original: Cloud: ......What do you mean by 'that time'? ......What about now?
Dialogue: ......What do you mean by 'that time'? ......What about now?

Original: Grey text: ......Don't worry about me. You just worry about yourself now.
Dialogue: ......Don't worry about me. You just worry about yourself now.

Original: Cloud: ......I'll give it a try.
Dialogue: ......I'll give it a try.

Original: Flower girl: Oh! It moved!
Dialogue: Oh! It moved!

Original: Grey text: ......How about that?
Dialogue: ......How about that?

Original: Flower girl: Whew...... Am I glad.
Dialogue: Whew...... Am I glad.

Original: Grey text: Take it slow now. Little by little......
Dialogue: Take it slow now. Little by little......

Original: Flower girl: Hello, hello?
Dialogue: Hello, hello?

Original: Cloud: ......I know.
Dialogue: ......I know.

Original: Cloud: Hey...who are you?
Dialogue: Hey...who are you?

Original: Flower girl: Hello, hello!
Dialogue: Hello, hello!

Original: Flower girl: You okay? This is a church in the Sector 5 slums. It suddenly fell on top of me. It really gave me a scare.
Dialogue: You okay? This is a church in the Sector 5 slums. It suddenly fell on top of me. It really gave me a scare.

Original: Cloud: ......I came crashing down?
Dialogue: ......I came crashing down?

Original: Flower girl: The roof and the flower bed must have broken your fall. You're lucky.
Dialogue: The roof and the flower bed must have broken your fall. You're lucky.

Original: Cloud: Flower bed......is this yours?
Dialogue: Flower bed......is this yours?

Original: Cloud: Sorry about that.
Dialogue: Sorry about that.

Original: Flower girl: That's all right. The flowers here are quite resilient because this is a sacred place. They say you can't grow grass and flowers in Midgar. But for some reason, the flowers have no trouble blooming here. I love it here.
Dialogue: That's all right. The flowers here are quite resilient because this is a sacred place. They say you can't grow grass and flowers in Midgar. But for some reason, the flowers have no trouble blooming here. I love it here.

Original: Flower girl: ......So, we meet again. ......Don't you remember me?
Dialogue: ......So, we meet again. ......Don't you remember me?

Original: Cloud: Yeah, I remember...
Dialogue: Yeah, I remember...

Original: Flower girl: Oh! I'm so happy!
Dialogue: Oh! I'm so happy!

Original: Flower girl: Thanks for buying my flowers.
Dialogue: Thanks for buying my flowers.

Original: Flower girl: You didn't buy any flowers from me though. Well, that's okay.
Dialogue: You didn't buy any flowers from me though. Well, that's okay.

Original: Flower girl: Excuse me, but that's really rude!
Dialogue: Excuse me, but that's really rude!

Original: Flower girl: But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me.
Dialogue: But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me.

Original: Flower girl: I don't remember a thing. Well, that's okay.
Dialogue: I don't remember a thing. Well, that's okay.

Original: Flower girl: ......I guess you don't remember. You were walking in a daze.
Dialogue: ......I guess you don't remember. You were walking in a daze.

Original: Flower girl: But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me.
Dialogue: But I'll forgive you, because you bought flowers from me.

Original: Flower girl: Well, that's okay.
Dialogue: Well, that's okay.

Original: Flower girl: Say, do you have any materia?
Dialogue: Say, do you have any materia?

Original: Cloud: Yes, some. Nowadays you can find materia anywhere.
Dialogue: Yes, some. Nowadays you can find materia anywhere.

Original: Flower girl: But mine is special. It's good for absolutely nothing.
Dialogue: But mine is special. It's good for absolutely nothing.

Original: Cloud: ......good for nothing? You probably just don't know how to use it.
Dialogue: ......good for nothing? You probably just don't know how to use it.

Original: Flower girl: No, I do...... it just doesn't do anything. I feel safe just having it. It was my mother's...... Say, I feel like talking. Do you feel up to it? After all, here we are meeting again, right?
Dialogue: No, I do...... it just doesn't do anything. I feel safe just having it. It was my mother's...... Say, I feel like talking. Do you feel up to it? After all, here we are meeting again, right?

Original: Flower girl: Wait here. I've got to check my flowers. It'll just be a minute.
Dialogue: Wait here. I've got to check my flowers. It'll just be a minute.

Original: Flower girl: ......oh, I see. Ahhh. I wonder whose fault that is. It takes a lot to grow them, you know. Poor flowers.
Dialogue: ......oh, I see. Ahhh. I wonder whose fault that is. It takes a lot to grow them, you know. Poor flowers.

Original: Flower girl: Just a little longer. Oh! Now that you mention it...... We don't know each other's names, do we? My name is......
Dialogue: Just a little longer. Oh! Now that you mention it...... We don't know each other's names, do we? My name is......

Original: Aeris: I'm Aeris, the flower girl. Nice to meet you.
Dialogue: I'm Aeris, the flower girl. Nice to meet you.

Original: Cloud: The name's Cloud. Me......? I do a little bit of everything.
Dialogue: The name's Cloud. Me......? I do a little bit of everything.

Original: Aeris: Oh...... a jack of all trades.
Dialogue: Oh...... a jack of all trades.

Original: Cloud: Yeah, I do whatever's needed.
Dialogue: Yeah, I do whatever's needed.

Original: Cloud: What's so funny? What are you laughing at?
Dialogue: What's so funny? What are you laughing at?

Original: Aeris: Sorry......I just
Dialogue: Sorry......I just

Original: Aeris: Sorry, bad timing on my part.
Dialogue: Sorry, bad timing on my part.

Original: Aeris: Cloud! Don't let it get to you!
Dialogue: Cloud! Don't let it get to you!

Original: Reno: Don't worry about me.
Dialogue: Don't worry about me.

Original: Aeris: Say, Cloud. Have you ever been a bodyguard?
Dialogue: Say, Cloud. Have you ever been a bodyguard?

Original: Aeris: You DO do everything, right?
Dialogue: You DO do everything, right?

Original: Cloud: ......Yeah, that's right.
Dialogue: ......Yeah, that's right.

Original: Aeris: Then, get me out of here. Take me home.
Dialogue: Then, get me out of here. Take me home.

Original: Cloud: OK, I'll do it... but it'll cost you.
Dialogue: OK, I'll do it... but it'll cost you.

Original: Aeris: Well then, let's see......
Dialogue: Well then, let's see......

Original: Aeris: How about if I go out with you once?
Dialogue: How about if I go out with you once?

Original: Cloud: I don't know who you are, but......
Dialogue: I don't know who you are, but......

Original: Cloud: You don't know me......?
Dialogue: You don't know me......?

Original: On-screen: ......I know you.
Dialogue: ......I know you.

Original: Cloud: Oh yeah......I know you.
Dialogue: Oh yeah......I know you.

Original: Cloud: that uniform......
Dialogue: that uniform......

Original: Soldier: ...... Hey sis, this one's a little weird.
Dialogue: ...... Hey sis, this one's a little weird.

Original: Cloud: Shut up! You Shinra spy!
Dialogue: Shut up! You Shinra spy!

Original: Soldier: Reno! Want him taken out?
Dialogue: Reno! Want him taken out?

Original: Reno: I haven't decided yet.
Dialogue: I haven't decided yet.

Original: Aeris: Don't fight here! You'll ruin the flowers!
Dialogue: Don't fight here! You'll ruin the flowers!

Original: Aeris: The exit is back there.
Dialogue: The exit is back there.

Original: Reno: They were......Mako eyes.
Dialogue: They were......Mako eyes.

Original: Reno: Yeah, all right. Back to work, back to work.
Dialogue: Yeah, all right. Back to work, back to work.

Original: Reno: Oh! And don't step on the flowers......
Dialogue: Oh! And don't step on the flowers......

Original: Reno: There they are, over there!
Dialogue: There they are, over there!

Original: Aeris: Cloud...that one!
Dialogue: Cloud...that one!

Original: Cloud: I know. Looks like they aren't going to let us go.
Dialogue: I know. Looks like they aren't going to let us go.

Original: Aeris: What should we do?
Dialogue: What should we do?

Original: Cloud: Well we can't let them catch us, can we? Then, there's only one thing left.
Dialogue: Well we can't let them catch us, can we? Then, there's only one thing left.

Original: Cloud: Aeris! This way!
Dialogue: Aeris! This way!

Original: Cloud: All right. I'll hold them off.
Dialogue: All right. I'll hold them off.

Original: Aeris: Right. Make sure they don't get through!
Dialogue: Right. Make sure they don't get through!

Original: Reno: The Ancient is getting away! Attack! Attack! Attack!
Dialogue: The Ancient is getting away! Attack! Attack! Attack!

Original: Aeris: Eaygh!!
Dialogue: Eaygh!!

Original: Cloud: Aeris!
Dialogue: Aeris!

Original: Reno: Think we killed 'em? They shouldn't have put up a fight, I say!
Dialogue: Think we killed 'em? They shouldn't have put up a fight, I say!

Original: Aeris: Cloud, help!
Dialogue: Cloud, help!

Original: Cloud: Damn! What's that......?
Dialogue: Damn! What's that......?

Original: Cloud: Aeris!
Dialogue: Aeris!

Original: Aeris: A, all right.
Dialogue: A, all right.

Original: Cloud: Here's a barrel. If I can just push it over......
Dialogue: Here's a barrel. If I can just push it over......

Original: On-screen: Push the barrel?
Dialogue: Push the barrel?

Original: Soldier: Guuagh!
Dialogue: Guuagh!

Original: Aeris: Thanks, Cloud.
Dialogue: Thanks, Cloud.

Original: Aeris: Oh, Cloud what are you doing!?
Dialogue: Oh, Cloud what are you doing!?

Original: Aeris: Eaygh!!
Dialogue: Eaygh!!

Original: Cloud: Aeris!
Dialogue: Aeris!

Original: Soldier: The Ancient! We got her!
Dialogue: The Ancient! We got her!

Original: Aeris: Whew, that surprised me.
Dialogue: Whew, that surprised me.

Original: (At the start of the third wave.)Aeris: Cloud, help!
Dialogue: Cloud, help!

Original: Cloud: Aeris!
Dialogue: Aeris!

Original: Cloud: Aeris, this way.
Dialogue: Aeris, this way.

Original: Aeris: Cloud, hurry.
Dialogue: Cloud, hurry.

Original: Aeris: We'll get outside through the hole in the roof. Jump off that beam, and we should be able to make it through to the roof.
Dialogue: We'll get outside through the hole in the roof. Jump off that beam, and we should be able to make it through to the roof.

Original: Aeris: Ha, ha...... They're looking for me again.
Dialogue: Ha, ha...... They're looking for me again.

Original: Cloud: You mean it's not the first time they've been after you?
Dialogue: You mean it's not the first time they've been after you?

Original: Aeris: ...no.
Cloud: They're the Turks.
Dialogue: They're the Turks.

Original: Aeris: Hmmm......
Dialogue: Hmmm......

Original: Cloud: The Turks are an organization in Shinra. They scout for possible candidates for SOLDIER.
Dialogue: The Turks are an organization in Shinra. They scout for possible candidates for SOLDIER.

Original: Aeris: This violently? I thought they were kidnapping someone.
Dialogue: This violently? I thought they were kidnapping someone.

Original: Cloud: They're also involved in a lot of dirty stuff on the side. Spying, murder...you know.
Dialogue: They're also involved in a lot of dirty stuff on the side. Spying, murder...you know.

Original: Aeris: They look like it.
Dialogue: They look like it.

Original: Cloud: But, why're they after you? There must be a reason, right?
Dialogue: But, why're they after you? There must be a reason, right?

Original: Aeris: No, not really. I think they believe I have what it takes to be in SOLDIER!
Dialogue: No, not really. I think they believe I have what it takes to be in SOLDIER!

Original: Cloud: Maybe you do. You want to join?
Dialogue: Maybe you do. You want to join?

Original: Aeris: I don't know... But I don't want to get caught by THOSE people!
Dialogue: I don't know... But I don't want to get caught by THOSE people!

Original: Cloud: Then, let's go!
Dialogue: Then, let's go!

Original: Aeris: Wait... Wait, I said!
Dialogue: Wait... Wait, I said!

Original: Aeris: Puff... wheeze...Slow......down... Don't leave me......
Dialogue: Puff... wheeze...Slow......down... Don't leave me......

Original: Cloud: Funny... I thought you were cut out to be in SOLDIER?
Dialogue: Funny... I thought you were cut out to be in SOLDIER?

Original: Aeris: Oh! You're terrible!
Dialogue: Oh! You're terrible!

Original: Aeris: Hey......Cloud. Were you...ever in SOLDIER?
Dialogue: Hey......Cloud. Were you...ever in SOLDIER?

Original: Cloud: ......
Cloud: ...I used to be. How did you guess?
Dialogue: ...I used to be. How did you guess?

Original: Aeris: ...Your eyes. They have a strange glow...
Dialogue: ...Your eyes. They have a strange glow...

Original: Cloud: That's the sign of those who have been infused with Mako... A mark of SOLDIER. But, how did you know about that?
Dialogue: That's the sign of those who have been infused with Mako... A mark of SOLDIER. But, how did you know about that?

Original: Aeris: ......Oh, nothing.
Dialogue: ......Oh, nothing.

Original: Cloud: Nothing...?
Dialogue: Nothing...?

Original: Aeris: Right, nothing!
Dialogue: Right, nothing!

Original: Aeris: Come on, let's go! Bodyguard!
Dialogue: Come on, let's go! Bodyguard!

Original: Aeris: Whew! Finally made it off! Now what...
Dialogue: Whew! Finally made it off! Now what...

Original: Aeris: My house is over here. Hurry before he comes.
Dialogue: My house is over here. Hurry before he comes.

Original: Aeris: I'm home, mom.
Dialogue: I'm home, mom.

Original: Aeris: This is Cloud. My bodyguard.
Dialogue: This is Cloud. My bodyguard.

Original: Elmyra: Bodyguard......? You mean you were followed again!?
Dialogue: Bodyguard......? You mean you were followed again!?

Original: Elmyra: Are you all right!? You're not hurt, are you!?
Dialogue: Are you all right!? You're not hurt, are you!?

Original: Aeris: I'm all right. I had Cloud with me.
Dialogue: I'm all right. I had Cloud with me.

Original: Elmyra: Thank you, Cloud.
Dialogue: Thank you, Cloud.

Original: Aeris: So what are you going to do now?
Dialogue: So what are you going to do now?

Original: Cloud: ...Is Sector 7 far from here? I want to go to Tifa's bar.
Dialogue: ...Is Sector 7 far from here? I want to go to Tifa's bar.

Original: Aeris: Is Tifa......a girl?
Dialogue: Is Tifa......a girl?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Aeris: A girl...friend?
Dialogue: A girl...friend?

Original: Cloud: Girlfriend?
Dialogue: Girlfriend?

Original: Aeris: Hee hee hee...... You don't have to get THAT upset...
Dialogue: Hee hee hee...... You don't have to get THAT upset...

Original: Aeris: Oh, how nice.
Dialogue: Oh, how nice.

Original: Aeris: Well, that's...nice. Let's see, Sector 7? I'll show you the way.
Dialogue: Well, that's...nice. Let's see, Sector 7? I'll show you the way.

Original: Cloud: You gotta be kidding. Why do you want to put yourself in danger again?
Dialogue: You gotta be kidding. Why do you want to put yourself in danger again?

Original: Aeris: I'm used to it.
Dialogue: I'm used to it.

Original: Cloud: Used to it!?
Dialogue: Used to it!?

Original: Cloud: ......Well, don't know... getting help from a girl...
Dialogue: ......Well, don't know... getting help from a girl...

Original: Aeris: A girl!! What do you mean by that!?
Dialogue: A girl!! What do you mean by that!?

Original: Aeris: You expect me to just sit by and listen, after hearing you say something like that!?
Dialogue: You expect me to just sit by and listen, after hearing you say something like that!?

Original: Aeris: Mom! I'm taking Cloud to Sector 7. I'll be back in a while.
Dialogue: Mom! I'm taking Cloud to Sector 7. I'll be back in a while.

Original: Elmyra: But dear...I give up. You never listen once you've made up your mind. But if you must go,why don't you go tomorrow? It's getting late now.
Dialogue: But dear...I give up. You never listen once you've made up your mind. But if you must go,why don't you go tomorrow? It's getting late now.

Original: Aeris: Yeah, you're right, mom.
Dialogue: Yeah, you're right, mom.

Original: Elmyra: Aeris, please go and make the bed.
Dialogue: Aeris, please go and make the bed.

Original: Elmyra: That glow in your eyes... you're from SOLDIER, right?
Dialogue: That glow in your eyes... you're from SOLDIER, right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah. Rather I used to be...
Dialogue: Yeah. Rather I used to be...

Original: Elmyra: ...... I don't know how to say this, but...Would you please leave here, tonight? Without telling Aeris.
Dialogue: ...... I don't know how to say this, but...Would you please leave here, tonight? Without telling Aeris.

Original: Elmyra: SOLDIER...the last thing Aeris needs is to get her feelings hurt again...
Dialogue: SOLDIER...the last thing Aeris needs is to get her feelings hurt again...

Original: Aeris: You need to go through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. Sector 6 is a little dangerous so you'd better get some rest tonight.
Dialogue: You need to go through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. Sector 6 is a little dangerous so you'd better get some rest tonight.

Original: Aeris: Cloud... Good night.
Dialogue: Cloud... Good night.

Original: Cloud: Oh, man...
Dialogue: Oh, man...

Original: Grey text: ...seem pretty tired......
Dialogue: ...seem pretty tired......

Original: Cloud (in flashback): .........!?
Grey text: I haven't slept in a bed like this ...in a long time.
Dialogue: I haven't slept in a bed like this ...in a long time.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): ...Oh, yeah.
Dialogue: ...Oh, yeah.

Original: Grey text: Ever since that time.
Dialogue: Ever since that time.

Original: Cloud's mother: My, how you've grown. I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.
Dialogue: My, how you've grown. I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): ...Not really.
Dialogue: ...Not really.

Original: Cloud's mother: ...I'm worried about you. There are a lot of temptations in the city... I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down and had a nice girlfriend.
Dialogue: ...I'm worried about you. There are a lot of temptations in the city... I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down and had a nice girlfriend.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): ...I'm all right.
Dialogue: ...I'm all right.

Original: Cloud's mother: You should have... an older girlfriend, one that'll take care of you. I think that would be the perfect type for you.
Dialogue: You should have... an older girlfriend, one that'll take care of you. I think that would be the perfect type for you.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): ......I'm not interested.
Dialogue: ......I'm not interested.

Original: Cloud: ...I must've fallen asleep.
Dialogue: ...I must've fallen asleep.

Original: Cloud: Sector 7's past Sector 6... I should be all right by myself...
Dialogue: Sector 7's past Sector 6... I should be all right by myself...

Original: Aeris: Cloud! I thought the Turks came back! Get some rest!
Dialogue: Cloud! I thought the Turks came back! Get some rest!

Original: Cloud: Can't get caught this time...
Dialogue: Can't get caught this time...

Original: Cloud: Through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. I should be able to do it alone...
Dialogue: Through Sector 6 to get to Sector 7. I should be able to do it alone...

Original: Aeris: You're up bright and early.
Dialogue: You're up bright and early.

Original: Cloud: How could I ask you to go along when I knew it would be dangerous?
Dialogue: How could I ask you to go along when I knew it would be dangerous?

Original: Aeris: Are you done?
Dialogue: Are you done?

Original: Aeris: You have to go through the slum in Sector 6 to get to Tifa's 7th Heaven. I'll take you there. Come on!
Dialogue: You have to go through the slum in Sector 6 to get to Tifa's 7th Heaven. I'll take you there. Come on!

Original: Aeris: The gate to Sector 7's in there.
Dialogue: The gate to Sector 7's in there.

Original: Cloud: Thanks. I guess this is goodbye. You gonna be all right going home?
Dialogue: Thanks. I guess this is goodbye. You gonna be all right going home?

Original: Aeris: Oh no! 'What ever will I do!?' ...isn't that what you want me to say?
Dialogue: Oh no! 'What ever will I do!?' ...isn't that what you want me to say?

Original: Aeris: Isn't that a little out of the way?
Dialogue: Isn't that a little out of the way?

Original: Cloud: Yeah, I guess so.
Dialogue: Yeah, I guess so.

Original: Aeris: I could do that. But won't I be in your way?
Dialogue: I could do that. But won't I be in your way?

Original: Cloud: What do you mean in the way?
Dialogue: What do you mean in the way?

Original: Aeris: Nothing!
Dialogue: Nothing!

Original: Aeris: Can we take a break?
Dialogue: Can we take a break?

Original: Aeris: I can't believe it's still here.
Dialogue: I can't believe it's still here.

Original: Aeris: Cloud, over here!
Dialogue: Cloud, over here!

Original: Aeris: What rank were you?
Dialogue: What rank were you?

Original: Cloud: Rank?
Dialogue: Rank?

Original: Aeris: You know, in SOLDIER.
Dialogue: You know, in SOLDIER.

Original: Cloud: Oh, I was... First Class.
Dialogue: Oh, I was... First Class.

Original: Aeris: Just the same as him.
Dialogue: Just the same as him.

Original: Cloud: The same as who?
Dialogue: The same as who?

Original: Aeris: My first boyfriend.
Dialogue: My first boyfriend.

Original: Cloud: You were...serious?
Dialogue: You were...serious?

Original: Aeris: No. But I liked him for a while.
Dialogue: No. But I liked him for a while.

Original: Cloud: I probably knew him. What was his name?
Dialogue: I probably knew him. What was his name?

Original: Aeris: It doesn't really matter.
Dialogue: It doesn't really matter.

Original: Cloud: Huh? Hey, back there......
Dialogue: Huh? Hey, back there......

Original: Cloud: Tifa!?
Dialogue: Tifa!?

Original: Aeris: That girl in the cart was Tifa? Where was she going? She looked kind of odd...
Dialogue: That girl in the cart was Tifa? Where was she going? She looked kind of odd...

Original: Cloud: Wait! I'll go on alone! You go home!
Dialogue: Wait! I'll go on alone! You go home!

Original: Aeris: This place is scary in a lot of ways. Especially for a girl. So we've got to find Tifa fast.
Dialogue: This place is scary in a lot of ways. Especially for a girl. So we've got to find Tifa fast.

Original: Aeris: This is Don Corneo's mansion. He's a big shot here in Wall Market. Listen, the Don's not interested in men. So just get the hell outta here.
Dialogue: This is Don Corneo's mansion. He's a big shot here in Wall Market. Listen, the Don's not interested in men. So just get the hell outta here.

Original: NPC: Welcome!! Even unpopular dweebs, like you may meet their destiny here!! You looking for a girlfriend too?
Dialogue: Welcome!! Even unpopular dweebs, like you may meet their destiny here!! You looking for a girlfriend too?

Original: NPC: Hey, you're pretty fast. Tifa's our newest girl. But, unfortunately, she's having an interview right now. Here at the Honey Bee Inn, it's customary for all the new girls to be taken to Don Corneo's mansion. Don Corneo's a famous dilettante. Now he wants to settle down and is in the market for a bride.
Dialogue: Hey, you're pretty fast. Tifa's our newest girl. But, unfortunately, she's having an interview right now. Here at the Honey Bee Inn, it's customary for all the new girls to be taken to Don Corneo's mansion. Don Corneo's a famous dilettante. Now he wants to settle down and is in the market for a bride.

Original: NPC: Hmm...Seems to like it just fine. Good for you.
Dialogue: Hmm...Seems to like it just fine. Good for you.

Original: Guard: This is the mansion of Don Corneo, the most powerful man in Wall Market. Look, the Don's not into men. So don't let me catch you around here again...
Dialogue: This is the mansion of Don Corneo, the most powerful man in Wall Market. Look, the Don's not into men. So don't let me catch you around here again...

Original: Guard: Hey, and you got another cute one with you!
Dialogue: Hey, and you got another cute one with you!

Original: Aeris: Hey, this look's like the Don's mansion. I'll go take a look. I'll tell Tifa about you.
Dialogue: Hey, this look's like the Don's mansion. I'll go take a look. I'll tell Tifa about you.

Original: Cloud: No!! You can't!!
Dialogue: No!! You can't!!

Original: Aeris: Why?
Dialogue: Why?

Original: Cloud: You DO know...what kind of... place this is, don't you?
Dialogue: You DO know...what kind of... place this is, don't you?

Original: Aeris: Then what am I supposed to do? You want to go in with me?
Dialogue: Then what am I supposed to do? You want to go in with me?

Original: Cloud: Well being a man, that'll be pretty hard. Besides if I bust in there, it'll cause too much commotion. But, I just can't let you go in alone... Oh, man......
Dialogue: Well being a man, that'll be pretty hard. Besides if I bust in there, it'll cause too much commotion. But, I just can't let you go in alone... Oh, man......

Original: Cloud: First...we need to find out if Tifa's alright...
Dialogue: First...we need to find out if Tifa's alright...

Original: Cloud: What's so funny, Aeris?
Dialogue: What's so funny, Aeris?

Original: Aeris: Cloud, why don't you dress up like a girl? It's the only way.
Dialogue: Cloud, why don't you dress up like a girl? It's the only way.

Original: Cloud: WHAT!?
Dialogue: WHAT!?

Original: Aeris: Just wait. I've got a cute friend I want to bring.
Dialogue: Just wait. I've got a cute friend I want to bring.

Original: Cloud: Aeris! I can't......
Dialogue: Aeris! I can't......

Original: Aeris: You ARE worried about Tifa, aren't you? Then come on, hurry!
Dialogue: You ARE worried about Tifa, aren't you? Then come on, hurry!

Original: Guard: A friend, huh...? Sounds pretty good to me. That'll make the Don happy, too. Who knows, maybe I can......heeee, hee hee.
Dialogue: A friend, huh...? Sounds pretty good to me. That'll make the Don happy, too. Who knows, maybe I can......heeee, hee hee.

Original: Aeris: Excuse me! I'd like to get a dress.
Dialogue: Excuse me! I'd like to get a dress.

Original: Clerk: Umm, it might take a little time. Will that be all right?
Dialogue: Umm, it might take a little time. Will that be all right?

Original: Aeris: What's the problem?
Dialogue: What's the problem?

Original: Clerk: Well, my father, the owner, has been in a slump lately. You see, he makes all the dresses.
Dialogue: Well, my father, the owner, has been in a slump lately. You see, he makes all the dresses.

Original: Aeris: And, where is your father?
Dialogue: And, where is your father?

Original: Clerk: He's probably plastered at the bar.
Dialogue: He's probably plastered at the bar.

Original: Aeris: So... You're saying we can't get a dress unless we do something about your father?
Dialogue: So... You're saying we can't get a dress unless we do something about your father?

Original: Clerk: Yes, I'm sorry. He's caused so much trouble.! You'd help me bring him back?
Dialogue: Yes, I'm sorry. He's caused so much trouble. ! You'd help me bring him back?

Original: Aeris: Well, if we don't do something, we don't get a dress, right?
Dialogue: Well, if we don't do something, we don't get a dress, right?

Original: Clerk: Really!? Please help my crazy old dad. I just don't know what to do anymore...
Dialogue: Really!? Please help my crazy old dad. I just don't know what to do anymore...

Original: Aeris: All right, we'll do something. Let's go, Cloud!
Dialogue: All right, we'll do something. Let's go, Cloud!

Original: Clerk: So how did it go?
Dialogue: So how did it go?

Original: Cloud: We couldn't find him yet.
Dialogue: We couldn't find him yet.

Original: Aeris: Excuse us, are you the father of the girl at the Clothing Store?
Dialogue: Excuse us, are you the father of the girl at the Clothing Store?

Original: Owner: I own the Clothes Shop... but I ain't your father.
Dialogue: I own the Clothes Shop... but I ain't your father.

Original: Aeris: I didn't say that......
Dialogue: I didn't say that......

Original: Cloud: Make me some clothes.
Dialogue: Make me some clothes.

Original: Owner: I don't make men's clothes. And I don't feel like makin' anything right now.
Dialogue: I don't make men's clothes. And I don't feel like makin' anything right now.

Original: Aeris: Cloud, you wait over there for a second. I'll try and (Upon talking to him.
Dialogue: Cloud, you wait over there for a second. I'll try and (Upon talking to him.

Original: Owner: Why don't you go over there and have something to drink.
Dialogue: Why don't you go over there and have something to drink.

Original: Aeris: You know, Mister. He always said that just once, he'd like to dress up like a girl. So, that's why I wanted a cute dress for him...
Dialogue: You know, Mister. He always said that just once, he'd like to dress up like a girl. So, that's why I wanted a cute dress for him...

Original: Owner: What!? A tough lookin guy like that?
Dialogue: What!? A tough lookin guy like that?

Original: Aeris: So, how 'bout it? Will you make him one?
Dialogue: So, how 'bout it? Will you make him one?

Original: Owner: ...might be interesting. I was gettin' a little bored just makin' regular clothes.
Dialogue: ...might be interesting. I was gettin' a little bored just makin' regular clothes.

Original: Aeris: Then you'll do it for us?
Dialogue: Then you'll do it for us?

Original: Owner: Yeah, all right. What kind of dress you want?
Dialogue: Yeah, all right. What kind of dress you want?

Original: Aeris: Something...
Dialogue: Something...

Original: Aeris: And something...
Dialogue: And something...

Original: Owner: Hmm, got it. Y'know I got a friend that has the same taste as him. I'll go (Upon talking to him.
Dialogue: Hmm, got it. Y'know I got a friend that has the same taste as him. I'll go (Upon talking to him.

Original: Owner: Hey, hold on. Wait till I get an image in my head. Gulp...ummm, that's good.
Dialogue: Hey, hold on. Wait till I get an image in my head. Gulp...ummm, that's good.

Original: Clerk: Looks like everything went well. He's been making the dress ever since he came back.
Dialogue: Looks like everything went well. He's been making the dress ever since he came back.

Original: Owner: Oh, you're here. It's ready. Go try it on.
Dialogue: Oh, you're here. It's ready. Go try it on.

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Cotton Dress"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Cotton Dress"!

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Satin Dress"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Satin Dress"!

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Silk Dress"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Silk Dress"!

Original: Cloud: How......do you put this on?
Dialogue: How......do you put this on?

Original: Cloud: Whoa! What are you doing!
Dialogue: Whoa! What are you doing!

Original: Aeris: It's still not right. A wig! That's what you need!
Dialogue: It's still not right. A wig! That's what you need!

Original: Owner: Umm, I thought you might, so I talked to my friend about getting one. You know the gym? You'll find a lot of people there like you. Go and (Upon talking to them.
Dialogue: Umm, I thought you might, so I talked to my friend about getting one. You know the gym? You'll find a lot of people there like you. Go and (Upon talking to them.

Original: Cloud: ...'like you'? Aeris, what did you tell him?
Dialogue: ...'like you'? Aeris, what did you tell him?

Original: Aeris: Does it matter? Anyhow, we got a pretty dress!
Dialogue: Does it matter? Anyhow, we got a pretty dress!

Original: Clerk: So? Were you able to get the wig?
Dialogue: So? Were you able to get the wig?

Original: Owner: So, how was it? Were you able to see him?
Dialogue: So, how was it? Were you able to see him?

Original: NPC 1: You the one...... Who wants to be cute?
Dialogue: You the one...... Who wants to be cute?

Original: Cloud: Cute?
Dialogue: Cute?

Original: Aeris: Right. And about the wig...
Dialogue: Right. And about the wig...

Original: NPC 1: Yeah, I heard. But it'll cost ya.
Dialogue: Yeah, I heard. But it'll cost ya.

Original: NPC 2: Urrrrgh!!! Big Bro!! The only way you're gonna get cuter is if you can beat Big Bro!!
Dialogue: Urrrrgh!!! Big Bro!! The only way you're gonna get cuter is if you can beat Big Bro!!

Original: NPCs: That's right! So, you've got to compete with us!
Dialogue: That's right! So, you've got to compete with us!

Original: NPC 2: You're right. Let's do squats.
Dialogue: You're right. Let's do squats.

Original: NPC 3: All right! We'll beat you out of this gym!
Dialogue: All right! We'll beat you out of this gym!

Original: Cloud: Are you...?
Dialogue: Are you...?

Original: Aeris: THE beautiful Bro?
Dialogue: THE beautiful Bro?

Original: NPC 1: What? You didn't know? Always running around here sayin' Big Bro' this, Big Bro' that... Never mind that, come over here. No, I'll explain the rules. From the ready position, push
Dialogue: What? You didn't know? Always running around here sayin' Big Bro' this, Big Bro' that... Never mind that, come over here. No, I'll explain the rules. From the ready position, push

Original: NPC 1: Then I'll explain it again.
Dialogue: Then I'll explain it again.

Original: NPC 1: Whoever has the most squats after 30 seconds gets the wig.
Dialogue: Whoever has the most squats after 30 seconds gets the wig.

Original: NPC 2: I'm not going to lose. Big Bro's wig is MINE!!
Dialogue: I'm not going to lose. Big Bro's wig is MINE!!

Original: NPC 1: Just be quiet... It's not fair for you to start right away, So, you want some practice?
Dialogue: Just be quiet... It's not fair for you to start right away, So, you want some practice?

Original: NPC 1: Then, start practicing!
Dialogue: Then, start practicing!

Original: NPC 1: You had X squats.
Dialogue: You had X squats.

Original: NPC 1: Now let's begin the real thing. Start!
Dialogue: Now let's begin the real thing. Start!

Original: NPC 1: He had Y squats and you had X squats.
Dialogue: He had Y squats and you had X squats.

Original: NPC 1: Sorry You lose. Since the old man from the clothing store asked me, I can't keep it from you, so... Oh, now where did I put it? All right then. Stupid! What kinda place is that to hide it in!? Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone! Sorry...you should still be able to use it if you disinfect it first.
Dialogue: Sorry You lose. Since the old man from the clothing store asked me, I can't keep it from you, so... Oh, now where did I put it? All right then. Stupid! What kinda place is that to hide it in!? Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone! Sorry...you should still be able to use it if you disinfect it first.

Original: NPC 1: Good job. Here's a hand-me-down.
Dialogue: Good job. Here's a hand-me-down.

Original: NPC 2: Hey, Bro I...I was supposed to get that.
Dialogue: Hey, Bro I...I was supposed to get that.

Original: NPC 1: Shut up! You have no room to talk, tying with a beginner like him!!
Dialogue: Shut up! You have no room to talk, tying with a beginner like him!!

Original: NPC 2: Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!
Dialogue: Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!

Original: NPC 1: You're really something. Okay, I'm a man of my word, here you are.
Dialogue: You're really something. Okay, I'm a man of my word, here you are.

Original: NPC 2: Big Bro I'm so mad I'm so so so---mad!
Dialogue: Big Bro I'm so mad I'm so so so---mad!

Original: NPC 1: Shut up! Don't cry, just because you lost!
Dialogue: Shut up! Don't cry, just because you lost!

Original: NPC 2: Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!
Dialogue: Uuuuhh, Bro's fists of steel cut to the bone!

Original: NPC 1: Take care of it.
Dialogue: Take care of it.

Original: NPCs: Big Bro Get a hold of yourself.
Dialogue: Big Bro Get a hold of yourself.

Original: NPC: Hey man. Got a minute? I need to talk...man to man.
Dialogue: Hey man. Got a minute? I need to talk...man to man.

Original: Cloud: ......
NPC: Really! I really appreciate it. ......I'm sorry but, young lady? Would you turn the other way, for a second?
Dialogue: Really! I really appreciate it. ......I'm sorry but, young lady? Would you turn the other way, for a second?

Original: Aeris: Why......?
Cloud: ......Aeris.
Dialogue: ......Aeris.

Original: Aeris: Gosh!
Dialogue: Gosh!

Original: NPC: I'm sorry, lady. Now here's the thing. Do you know that vending machine in the Inn? I'm itchin' to know what they're selling in it. I just can't ask a girl to go get it. What? Why don't I buy it myself? Well to tell you the truth, I got in a fight with the guy at the Inn and can't go there anymore. Come on, so how 'bout it?
Dialogue: I'm sorry, lady. Now here's the thing. Do you know that vending machine in the Inn? I'm itchin' to know what they're selling in it. I just can't ask a girl to go get it. What? Why don't I buy it myself? Well to tell you the truth, I got in a fight with the guy at the Inn and can't go there anymore. Come on, so how 'bout it?

Original: Cloud: ......
NPC: Good, thanks. I'll be waitin' here when you're done.
Dialogue: Good, thanks. I'll be waitin' here when you're done.

Original: NPC: Sorry about that. Just forget it.
Dialogue: Sorry about that. Just forget it.

Original: Aeris: Finished?
Dialogue: Finished?

Original: NPC: Sorry about that. Just forget it.
Dialogue: Sorry about that. Just forget it.

Original: NPC: Good luck.
Dialogue: Good luck.

Original: NPC: How was it?
Dialogue: How was it?

Original: Cloud: Not yet.
Dialogue: Not yet.

Original: NPC: Hmm, I'm countin' on you.
Dialogue: Hmm, I'm countin' on you.

Original: Innkeep: Welcome. It'll be 10 Gil per night.
Dialogue: Welcome. It'll be 10 Gil per night.

Original: Cloud: He means this?
Dialogue: He means this?

Original: Cloud: I don't have enough money. I'll get him the other one.
Dialogue: I don't have enough money. I'll get him the other one.

Original: Innkeeper: Thank you very much. Please come again.
Dialogue: Thank you very much. Please come again.

Original: Innkeeper: You don't have enough money.
Dialogue: You don't have enough money.

Original: Innkeeper: All right then......, please come again.
Dialogue: All right then......, please come again.

Original: Cloud: I got it.
Dialogue: I got it.

Original: NPC: Oh, really!! Hey!
Dialogue: Oh, really!! Hey!

Original: Aeris: Geez.
Dialogue: Geez.

Original: NPC: And, what was it?
Dialogue: And, what was it?

Original: NPC: A protein drink set. That jerk. I'm gonna do so much more business than him, his head'll spin. Thanks, bud. I'm motivated now. Take this, it's not much......
Dialogue: A protein drink set. That jerk. I'm gonna do so much more business than him, his head'll spin. Thanks, bud. I'm motivated now. Take this, it's not much......

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Diamond Tiara"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Diamond Tiara"!

Original: NPC: A Stamina Drink Set. That jerk. I'm gonna do so much more business than him, his head'll spin. Thanks, bud. I'm motivated now. Take this, it's not much......
Dialogue: A Stamina Drink Set. That jerk. I'm gonna do so much more business than him, his head'll spin. Thanks, bud. I'm motivated now. Take this, it's not much......

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Ruby Tiara"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Ruby Tiara"!

Dialogue: The Queen's Room

Dialogue: Paste, paste, paste... (Oh God...here's another one of those guys. You know, the delicate type. Just ignore him, just ignore him.)

Dialogue: Fluff, fluff, fluff... (Hmm...! I guess he doesn't realize his position. I feel sorry for him. Just ignore him, just ignore him.)

Dialogue: Pita, pita, pita... (God, what a pest! All right, get out of here! You dog...) (That's it, I'll name him 'pooch'.)

Dialogue: Mix, mix, mix...... (What should I do... Is he following me? Really? What if he follows me home...?) (Poochy'll do it, I'm sure of it...)

Original: NPC: Shake, shake, shake... (You think he's after me? Really? This guy makes me sick... And his eyes are weird too...) (Yeah, don't hurt these guys' feelings. Let's at least say 'hi' to him.)
Dialogue: Shake, shake, shake... (You think he's after me? Really? This guy makes me sick... And his eyes are weird too...) (Yeah, don't hurt these guys' feelings. Let's at least say 'hi' to him.)

Dialogue: Uhh...... Hel...Hello. What a nice day, today.

Dialogue: By the way, I haven't introduced myself yet. I'm Cloud, a jack of all trades.

Dialogue: Oh, yeah...? Welcome, Cloud. (Gross! Don't get carried away, remember your name is 'Pooch!')

Original: NPC: BYE!! (Phew - I'm safe now...)
Dialogue: BYE!! (Phew - I'm safe now...)

Dialogue: Eyaaah! Don't!

Dialogue: Eyaaah! Don't watch!!

Dialogue: Hmm, hmm, hmm...... Ohhh, I just can't seem to lose weight. Hmm, hmm, hmm... Sir!! You can't come in here. (Yuk......a pervert...)

Dialogue: Oh my!! (...You're still here? Oh well, good timing anyway.) Hey, what do you think about me?

Original: NPC: NO WAY! I'M SO SHOCKED!!
Dialogue: NO WAY! I'M SO SHOCKED!!

Original: NPC: Oh my!! Are you embarrassed? (Man!! Why are you so moody...)
Dialogue: Oh my!! Are you embarrassed? (Man!! Why are you so moody...)

Original: NPC: Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm...... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm... Phew...... ...it's so tiring. Oh!! Is something the matter?
Dialogue: Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm...... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm... Hmm, hmm, hmm, hmm... Phew...... ...it's so tiring. Oh!! Is something the matter?

Dialogue: Hmph......!! Listen you, not that it matters, but you sure do know how to make people mad.

Dialogue: Looks like this room's being used.

Dialogue: Use directional buttons to look around

Original: Cloud: Looks like it's unoccupied.
Dialogue: Looks like it's unoccupied.

Dialogue: I'll take this room.

Dialogue: All right. Now all we have to do is enter the room. You're not going to have a change of heart, are you?

Original: NPC: Oh, don't be angry with me... (Geez...this one's probably the violent type...) All right, please.
Dialogue: Oh, don't be angry with me... (Geez...this one's probably the violent type...) All right, please.

Original: NPC: There you are. Enjoy yourself (You moody creepo!)
Dialogue: There you are. Enjoy yourself (You moody creepo!)

Dialogue: I wonder if they'd change it if I asked.

Dialogue: I've changed my mind... ......I want to change rooms.

Original: NPC: Oh, yes sir. (So indecisive...) All right, please.
Dialogue: Oh, yes sir. (So indecisive...) All right, please.

Original: Cloud: Hmm......? You......? What are you doing in a place like this?
Dialogue: Hmm......? You......? What are you doing in a place like this?

Original: NPC: That's what I want to ask you. Should you be foolin' around here? You think problems will just go away just thinkin' about them? Oh no! Help! Someone...! Hurry! You can't change anything by just sitting back and looking at it.
Dialogue: That's what I want to ask you. Should you be foolin' around here? You think problems will just go away just thinkin' about them? Oh no! Help! Someone...! Hurry! You can't change anything by just sitting back and looking at it.

Original: Cloud: What are you saying?
Dialogue: What are you saying?

Dialogue: It's started moving.

Original: Cloud: What has?
Dialogue: What has?

Original: NPC: Wake up! rub, rub, rub... rub, rub, rub, rub... thump...pound... thump...pound... poik...poik... ...squish.
Dialogue: Wake up! rub, rub, rub... rub, rub, rub, rub... thump...pound... thump...pound... poik...poik... ...squish.

Original: Cloud: Uh...OW...!!
On-screen: Cloud's HP/MP Restored!
Dialogue: Cloud's HP/MP Restored!

Dialogue: Wake up!! Wake up!! Phew, I'm so relieved.

Dialogue: Bubby!! I heard you collapsed.

Original: Mukki: No, no, no. Don't get so uptight.
Dialogue: No, no, no. Don't get so uptight.

Dialogue: Hmm...? They say youth is so long but so short. Let's give this next one your best shot.

Original: Mukki: Time's up. Bye, bubby.
Dialogue: Time's up. Bye, bubby.

Dialogue: Don't get depressed over a thing like this. It happens to me all the time.

Dialogue: I'm so sorry... There's a lot of 'adult' things going on... For your inconvenience, Please take this, okay?

Dialogue: Received Key Item "Lingerie"!

Dialogue: What, this rag? For me!? I just don't get it.

Dialogue: This way, please.

Dialogue: Shall we begin? I guess since you chose this room, that would mean you... Hate being lonely?

Dialogue: I'm always alone.

Dialogue: I don't want to talk right now.

Dialogue: All right, all right. (...geez, you're so moody!) Come on, everyone's waiting.

Dialogue: Here they are. All right, everyone.

Dialogue: Wassup!! (Smile, smile, smile...)

Dialogue: Oh man... What should I do...?

Dialogue: I've got no time to mess around with you. Outta my way!

Dialogue: Looks like I'm always going to be facing crises all my life...

Dialogue: ...heave...pant... Don't be so embarrassed! Loosen up, bubby! ...heave...pant... Let's wash off all our sweat and dirt together!

Original: NPC: Wassup!!
Dialogue: Wassup!!

Dialogue: Bubby! You're the intimate type, huh!!

Original: Mukki: ...heave...pant... Wow!! Would ya look at that!
Dialogue: ...heave...pant... Wow!! Would ya look at that!

Dialogue: Isn't bathing great...? It soothes your heart.

Dialogue: How is it, bubby!? Feels good, huh?

Dialogue: I don't feel good. Let me out...

Original: Cloud: Too stuffy in here...
Dialogue: Too stuffy in here...

Dialogue: You'll get used to it. Try counting to ten.

Original: Cloud: Ten... Nine...
Dialogue: Ten... Nine...

Dialogue: Hey bubby, how old are you?

Original: Cloud: Eight... Twenty one...
Dialogue: Eight... Twenty one...

Original: Mukki: You're less than half my age. I'm so jealous. So how 'bout it...? Do you wanna join my "Young bubby's" group?
Dialogue: You're less than half my age. I'm so jealous. So how 'bout it...? Do you wanna join my "Young bubby's" group?

Original: Cloud: Seven... Six... Maybe in another life.
Dialogue: Seven... Six... Maybe in another life.

Original: Cloud: Seven... Six... Not to be rude or anything, but could you go do someone else?
Dialogue: Seven... Six... Not to be rude or anything, but could you go do someone else?

Original: Mukki: Well, if that's how you feel...too bad. We have a trip planned at a cabin out in the country.
Dialogue: Well, if that's how you feel...too bad. We have a trip planned at a cabin out in the country.

Original: Cloud: Five... Four... Three... Two... One... Alright, that's ten. I'm gettin' out.
Dialogue: Five... Four... Three... Two... One... Alright, that's ten. I'm gettin' out.

Original: Mukki: Why don't you stick around and play a bit? Daddy's so lonely...
Dialogue: Why don't you stick around and play a bit? Daddy's so lonely...

Dialogue: Bubby!! This is important to me. Here's a memento of our time together!

Dialogue: Received Key Item "Bikini briefs"!

Dialogue: Hope we meet again!

Dialogue: This is SOME underwear... I'm supposed to wear this...? Well, if it's to save Tifa... I guess there's no way around.

Dialogue: If I were to dress up like a woman... Then I've got to really prepare carefully. Seems like I could put makeup on here.

Dialogue: I have a favor to ask of you. Can you put makeup on me too?

Dialogue: ...paste, paste, paste...... Oh...my......

Dialogue: OK, b-y-e!

Dialogue: Uh, sir!! It's almost closing time... So, please remember any personal belongings.

Original: Aeris: Hey!! Cloud!!
Dialogue: Hey!! Cloud!!

Original: NPC: I bought some pretty flowers from Aeris. 500 gil, a little expensive. Well, at least I got her name.
Dialogue: I bought some pretty flowers from Aeris. 500 gil, a little expensive. Well, at least I got her name.

Original: NPC: Uuuuuuh! I want flowers too! But, I get so nervous in front of cute girls... It just seems natural to get cautious...
Dialogue: Uuuuuuh! I want flowers too! But, I get so nervous in front of cute girls... It just seems natural to get cautious...

Original: Owner: Looks like you're all set. Now try it on, and let's see how it fits.
Dialogue: Looks like you're all set. Now try it on, and let's see how it fits.

Original: Clerk: Looks like you got it. So try it on for size.
Dialogue: Looks like you got it. So try it on for size.

Original: Aeris: Aren't you going to change?
Dialogue: Aren't you going to change?

Original: Owner: Hmm, not bad. This may be a new business for me.
Dialogue: Hmm, not bad. This may be a new business for me.

Original: Clerk: Yeah, you're right. Should we try it? Thanks for showing us something new. My father's got his motivation back now, So the dress is on the house.
Dialogue: Yeah, you're right. Should we try it? Thanks for showing us something new. My father's got his motivation back now, So the dress is on the house.

Original: Aeris: Walk more nicely like...this. Miss Cloud.
Dialogue: Walk more nicely like...this. Miss Cloud.

Original: Cloud: ...What do you mean 'nicely'?
Dialogue: ...What do you mean 'nicely'?

Original: Aeris: Oh you're so cute, Miss Cloud.
Dialogue: Oh you're so cute, Miss Cloud.

Original: Aeris: Aaah, I want one. Do you have one that'll look good on me too?
Dialogue: Aaah, I want one. Do you have one that'll look good on me too?

Original: Clerk: How's this?
Dialogue: How's this?

Original: Owner: How about that one?
Dialogue: How about that one?

Original: Clerk: Father, what are you talking about? This one's much better.
Dialogue: Father, what are you talking about? This one's much better.

Original: Owner: No, what are you saying? This one.
Dialogue: No, what are you saying? This one.

Original: Aeris: ...I want THIS one.
Dialogue: ...I want THIS one.

Original: Clerk: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Owner: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Aeris: I'm going to go change.
Dialogue: I'm going to go change.

Original: Aeris: ......No peeking!
Dialogue: ......No peeking!

Original: Aeris: So? How do I look?
Dialogue: So? How do I look?

Original: Aeris: Oh, you're no fun!
Dialogue: Oh, you're no fun!

Original: Owner: Hmm, good. It looks good on you.
Dialogue: Hmm, good. It looks good on you.

Original: Owner: ...Hmm. It's REALLY somethin'.
Dialogue: ...Hmm. It's REALLY somethin'.

Original: Cloud: What's wrong, Aeris?
Dialogue: What's wrong, Aeris?

Original: Aeris: ...What is it? Are you going outside like that? I mean, that's okay with me, but...
Dialogue: ...What is it? Are you going outside like that? I mean, that's okay with me, but...

Original: Cloud: ...Oh, yeah.
Dialogue: ...Oh, yeah.

Original: Aeris: Get a hold of yourself, Ms. Cloud.
Dialogue: Get a hold of yourself, Ms. Cloud.

Original: NPC: Yeow!! Hey, Princess!!
Dialogue: Yeow!! Hey, Princess!!

Original: NPC: Ummm, not quite there.
Dialogue: Ummm, not quite there.

Original: NPC: Ehhhh, so so.
Dialogue: Ehhhh, so so.

Original: NPC: Hmm, pretty good.
Dialogue: Hmm, pretty good.

Original: Guard: Damn!! Your friend's hot, too! Come in, come in!! Two ladies coming through!!
Dialogue: Damn!! Your friend's hot, too! Come in, come in!! Two ladies coming through!!

Original: NPC: Hey, ladies. I'll go and let the Don know you're here. Wait here. Don't go wandering around...
Dialogue: Hey, ladies. I'll go and let the Don know you're here. Wait here. Don't go wandering around...

Original: Aeris: Now's our chance. Let's find Tifa.
Dialogue: Now's our chance. Let's find Tifa.

Original: Aeris: I wonder where she is...
Dialogue: I wonder where she is...

Original: On-screen: Closed...
Dialogue: Closed...

Original: On-screen: Office of The Don Corneo Keep Out!
Dialogue: Office of The Don Corneo Keep Out!

Original: Aeris: ...Tifa?
Dialogue: ...Tifa?

Original: Aeris: Nice to meet you. I'm Aeris. Cloud's told me a lot about you.
Dialogue: Nice to meet you. I'm Aeris. Cloud's told me a lot about you.

Original: Tifa: ...And you are? Hey you're the one with Cloud in the park...
Dialogue: ...And you are? Hey you're the one with Cloud in the park...

Original: Aeris: Right, with Cloud.
Dialogue: Right, with Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Oh......
Aeris: Don't worry. We just met. It's nothing.
Dialogue: Don't worry. We just met. It's nothing.

Original: Tifa: What do you mean, 'Don't worry'...about what?
Dialogue: What do you mean, 'Don't worry'...about what?

Original: Tifa: No, don't misunderstand. Cloud and I grew up together. Nothing more.
Dialogue: No, don't misunderstand. Cloud and I grew up together. Nothing more.

Original: Aeris: Poor Cloud, having to stand here and listen to both of us call him nothing.
Dialogue: Poor Cloud, having to stand here and listen to both of us call him nothing.

Original: Aeris: Right, Cloud?
Dialogue: Right, Cloud?

Original: Tifa: Cloud?
Dialogue: Cloud?

Original: Aeris: Embarrassed? Come on, speak up!
Dialogue: Embarrassed? Come on, speak up!

Original: Tifa: Cloud!?
Dialogue: Cloud!?

Original: Tifa: Why are you dressed like that!? And what are you doing here!? Forget that, what happened to you after the fall!? Are you hurt!?
Dialogue: Why are you dressed like that!? And what are you doing here!? Forget that, what happened to you after the fall!? Are you hurt!?

Original: Cloud: Hey, give me a chance to answer.
Dialogue: Hey, give me a chance to answer.

Original: Cloud: I'm dressed like this...... because there was no other way to get in here.
Dialogue: I'm dressed like this...... because there was no other way to get in here.

Original: Cloud: I'm all right. Aeris helped me out.
Dialogue: I'm all right. Aeris helped me out.

Original: Tifa: Oh, Aeris did...
Dialogue: Oh, Aeris did...

Original: Cloud: Tifa, explain. What are you doing in a place like this?
Dialogue: Tifa, explain. What are you doing in a place like this?

Original: Tifa: Yeah, ummm......
Dialogue: Yeah, ummm......

Original: Aeris: Ahem!! I'll just plug my ears.
Dialogue: Ahem!! I'll just plug my ears.

Original: Aeris: Please, go on with your private conversation.
Dialogue: Please, go on with your private conversation.

Original: Aeris: Hey, what's the secret?
Dialogue: Hey, what's the secret?

Original: Tifa: ...I'm glad you're OK.
Dialogue: ...I'm glad you're OK.

Original: Cloud: Thanks. What happened?
Dialogue: Thanks. What happened?

Original: Tifa: When we got back from the Number 5 reactor, there was this weird man. So Barret caught him and squeezed some information out of him.
Dialogue: When we got back from the Number 5 reactor, there was this weird man. So Barret caught him and squeezed some information out of him.

Original: Cloud: That's when the Don's name popped up.
Dialogue: That's when the Don's name popped up.

Original: Tifa: Right, Don Corneo. Barret told me to leave the lech alone... But something's been bothering me.
Dialogue: Right, Don Corneo. Barret told me to leave the lech alone... But something's been bothering me.

Original: Cloud: I see. So you wanted to get the story straight from Corneo's mouth.
Dialogue: I see. So you wanted to get the story straight from Corneo's mouth.

Original: Tifa: So I made it here, but now I'm in a bind. Corneo is looking for a bride. Everyday, he gets three girls, chooses one of them, and then... ...and, well...... Anyway, I have to be the girl ...or I'm out for tonight.

Dialogue: No, that's not what I meant! NO, STOP! Just, just wait a second!!

Shinra's trying to crush a small rebel group called AVALANCHE, and want to infiltrate their hideout. Shinra's trying to crush a small rebel group called AVALANCHE, and want to infiltrate their hideout. And they're really going to crush them...literally, By breaking the support holding up the plate above them.

Dialogue: DAMMIT ALL TO HELL!!!!

Original: Barret: What the hell's it all for!?
Dialogue: What the hell's it all for!?

Original: Barret: ARGGHHHH!!!
Dialogue: ARGGHHHH!!!

Original: Cloud: Hey, Barret!
Dialogue: Hey, Barret!

Original: Tifa: Barret!
Dialogue: Barret!

Original: Barret: ARGGHHHH!!!
Dialogue: ARGGHHHH!!!

Original: Cloud: Hey!
Dialogue: Hey!

Original: Tifa: Barret, stop... Please stop, Barret.
Dialogue: Barret, stop... Please stop, Barret.

Original: Barret: URGHHHH!!!
Dialogue: URGHHHH!!!

Original: Barret: God damn...
Dialogue: God damn...

Original: Barret: Marlene...
Dialogue: Marlene...

Original: Tifa: Marlene is... I think Marlene is safe.
Dialogue: Marlene is... I think Marlene is safe.

Original: Barret: ......huh?
Tifa: Right before they took Aeris, she said, "Don't worry, she's all right." She was probably talking about Marlene.
Dialogue: Right before they took Aeris, she said, "Don't worry, she's all right." She was probably talking about Marlene.

Original: Barret: R, really!?
Dialogue: R, really!?

Original: Tifa: But...
Dialogue: But...

Original: Barret: Biggs...... Wedge... Jessie......
Dialogue: Biggs...... Wedge... Jessie......

Original: Cloud: All three of them were in the pillar.
Dialogue: All three of them were in the pillar.

Original: Barret: Think I don't know that? But...we, all of us fought together. I don't wanna think of them as dead!
Dialogue: Think I don't know that? But...we, all of us fought together. I don't wanna think of them as dead!

Original: Tifa: ...and the other people in Sector 7.
Dialogue: ...and the other people in Sector 7.

Original: Barret: This is all screwed up! They destroyed an entire village just to get to us! They killed so many people...
Dialogue: This is all screwed up! They destroyed an entire village just to get to us! They killed so many people...

Original: Tifa: ...are you saying it's our fault? Because AVALANCHE was here? Innocent people lost their lives because of us?
Dialogue: ...are you saying it's our fault? Because AVALANCHE was here? Innocent people lost their lives because of us?

Original: Barret: No, Tifa! That ain't it! Hell no!! It ain't us! It's the damn Shinra! It's never been nobody but the Shinra! They're evil and destroyin' our planet just to... build their power and line their own damn pockets with gold! If we don't get rid of them, they're gonna kill this planet! Our fight ain't never gonna be over until we get rid of them!!
Dialogue: No, Tifa! That ain't it! Hell no!! It ain't us! It's the damn Shinra! It's never been nobody but the Shinra! They're evil and destroyin' our planet just to... build their power and line their own damn pockets with gold! If we don't get rid of them, they're gonna kill this planet! Our fight ain't never gonna be over until we get rid of them!!

Original: Tifa: .........I don't know.
Dialogue: .........I don't know.

Original: Barret: What don't you know!? You don't believe me?
Dialogue: What don't you know!? You don't believe me?

Original: Tifa: It's not that. I'm not sure about...me. My feelings.
Dialogue: It's not that. I'm not sure about...me. My feelings.

Original: Barret: An'what about you?
Dialogue: An'what about you?

Original: Barret: Yo!
Dialogue: Yo!

Original: Barret: Where's he think he's goin'?
Dialogue: Where's he think he's goin'?

Original: Tifa: Oh! Aeris!
Dialogue: Oh! Aeris!

Original: Barret: Oh yeah, that girl. What's up with her?
Dialogue: Oh yeah, that girl. What's up with her?

Original: Tifa: ...I don't really know... But she's the one I left Marlene with.
Dialogue: ...I don't really know... But she's the one I left Marlene with.

Original: Barret: Damn! Marlene!!
Dialogue: Damn! Marlene!!

Original: Barret: Tifa. There ain't no turnin' back now.
Dialogue: Tifa. There ain't no turnin' back now.

Original: Barret: Cloud! Take me to Marlene!
Dialogue: Cloud! Take me to Marlene!

Original: Tifa: You're going to help Aeris?
Dialogue: You're going to help Aeris?

Original: Cloud: Yeah... But before that, there's something I want to know.
Dialogue: Yeah... But before that, there's something I want to know.

Original: Tifa: What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Cloud: ...it's about the Ancients.
Dialogue: ...it's about the Ancients.

Original: On-screen: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!
Dialogue: In my veins courses the blood of the Ancients. I am one of the rightful heirs to this planet!

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth...?
Dialogue: Sephiroth...?

Original: Tifa: Are you all right?
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Original: Barret: Pull it together, man!
Dialogue: Pull it together, man!

Original: Elmyra: Cloud......wasn't it? It's about Aeris, isn't it?
Dialogue: Cloud......wasn't it? It's about Aeris, isn't it?

Original: Cloud: ...Sorry. The Shinra have her.
Dialogue: ...Sorry. The Shinra have her.

Original: Elmyra: I know. They took her from here.
Dialogue: I know. They took her from here.

Original: Cloud: They were here?
Dialogue: They were here?

Original: Elmyra: That's what Aeris wanted...
Dialogue: That's what Aeris wanted...

Original: Cloud: Why is Shinra after Aeris?
Dialogue: Why is Shinra after Aeris?

Original: Elmyra: Aeris is an Ancient. The sole survivor.
Dialogue: Aeris is an Ancient. The sole survivor.

Original: Barret: ...What did you say? But, aren't you her mother?
Dialogue: ...What did you say? But, aren't you her mother?

Original: Elmyra: ...Not her real mother. Oh...it must have been 15 years ago...
Dialogue: ...Not her real mother. Oh...it must have been 15 years ago...

Original: Elmyra: ...during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai. One day, I went to the station because I got a letter saying he was coming home on leave. My husband never came back. I wonder if something happened to him? No, I'm sure his leave was just canceled. I went to the station everyday. Then, one day.........
Dialogue: ...during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai. One day, I went to the station because I got a letter saying he was coming home on leave. My husband never came back. I wonder if something happened to him? No, I'm sure his leave was just canceled. I went to the station everyday. Then, one day.........

Original: Elmyra: You used to see this sort of thing a lot during the war. Her last words were, "Please take Aeris somewhere safe." My husband never came back. I had no child. I was probably lonely. So I decided to take her home with me.
Dialogue: You used to see this sort of thing a lot during the war. Her last words were, "Please take Aeris somewhere safe." My husband never came back. I had no child. I was probably lonely. So I decided to take her home with me.

Original: Elmyra: Aeris and I became close very quickly.That child loved to talk. She used to talk to me about everything. She told me she escaped from some kind of research laboratory somewhere. And that her mother had already returned to the planet, so she wasn't lonely...and many other things.
Dialogue: Aeris and I became close very quickly.That child loved to talk. She used to talk to me about everything. She told me she escaped from some kind of research laboratory somewhere. And that her mother had already returned to the planet, so she wasn't lonely...and many other things.

Original: Barret: Returned to the planet?
Dialogue: Returned to the planet?

Original: Elmyra: I didn't know what she meant. I asked if she meant a star in the sky, But she said it was this planet... She was a mysterious child in many ways.
Dialogue: I didn't know what she meant. I asked if she meant a star in the sky, But she said it was this planet... She was a mysterious child in many ways.

Original: Aeris: Mom. Please don't cry.
Dialogue: Mom. Please don't cry.

Original: Elmyra: Aeris just blurted that out all of a sudden. When I asked her if something happened...
Dialogue: Aeris just blurted that out all of a sudden. When I asked her if something happened...

Original: Aeris: Someone dear to you has just died. His spirit was coming to see you, but he already returned to the planet.
Dialogue: Someone dear to you has just died. His spirit was coming to see you, but he already returned to the planet.

Original: Elmyra: At that time I didn't believe her. But... Several days later... We received a notice saying my husband died... ...and that's how it was. A lot had happened, but we were happy. Until one day...
Dialogue: At that time I didn't believe her. But... Several days later... We received a notice saying my husband died... ...and that's how it was. A lot had happened, but we were happy. Until one day...

Original: Tseng: We want you to return Aeris to us. We've been searching for her for a long time.
Dialogue: We want you to return Aeris to us. We've been searching for her for a long time.

Original: Aeris: No! Never!
Dialogue: No! Never!

Original: Tseng: Aeris, you're a very special child. You are of special blood. Your real mother was an 'Ancient'.
Dialogue: Aeris, you're a very special child. You are of special blood. Your real mother was an 'Ancient'.

Original: Elmyra: Of course I heard it. That she was an 'Ancient'.
Dialogue: Of course I heard it. That she was an 'Ancient'.

Original: Tseng: The Ancients will lead us to a land of supreme happiness. Aeris will be able to bring happiness to all those in the slums. That is why Shinra would like Aeris's cooperation......
Dialogue: The Ancients will lead us to a land of supreme happiness. Aeris will be able to bring happiness to all those in the slums. That is why Shinra would like Aeris's cooperation......

Original: Aeris: He's wrong! I'm not an Ancient! I'm not!
Dialogue: He's wrong! I'm not an Ancient! I'm not!

Original: Tseng: But Aeris, surely you hear voices sometimes when you're all alone?
Dialogue: But Aeris, surely you hear voices sometimes when you're all alone?

Original: Aeris: No, I don't!
Dialogue: No, I don't!

Original: Elmyra: But I knew. I knew about her mysterious powers... She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.
Dialogue: But I knew. I knew about her mysterious powers... She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.

Original: Cloud: It's amazing how she's avoided the Shinra for all these years...
Dialogue: It's amazing how she's avoided the Shinra for all these years...
