Original: Elmyra: The Shinra needed her, So I guess they wouldn't harm her.
Dialogue: The Shinra needed her, So I guess they wouldn't harm her.

Original: Tifa: But why now......
Dialogue: But why now......

Original: Elmyra: She brought a little girl here with her. On the way here, Tseng found them. She probably couldn't get away fast enough. She decided to go to the Shinra in exchange for the little girl's safety.
Dialogue: She brought a little girl here with her. On the way here, Tseng found them. She probably couldn't get away fast enough. She decided to go to the Shinra in exchange for the little girl's safety.

Original: Cloud: Must be Marlene.
Dialogue: Must be Marlene.

Original: Barret: Marlene!! Aeris was caught because of Marlene!?
Dialogue: Marlene!! Aeris was caught because of Marlene!?

Original: Barret: I'm sorry. Marlene's my daughter. I'm ...really...sorry...
Dialogue: I'm sorry. Marlene's my daughter. I'm ...really...sorry...

Original: Elmyra: You're her father!? How in the world could you ever leave a child alone like that!?
Dialogue: You're her father!? How in the world could you ever leave a child alone like that!?

Original: Barret: ...please don't start with that. I think about it all the time. What would happen to Marlene, if I... But you gotta understand somethin'... ...I don't got an answer. I wanna be with Marlene... But I gotta fight. 'Cause if I don't...the planet's gonna die. So I'm gonna keep fightin'! But, I'm worried 'bout Marlene. I really just wanna be with her...always. See? I'm goin' in circles, now.
Dialogue: ...please don't start with that. I think about it all the time. What would happen to Marlene, if I... But you gotta understand somethin'... ...I don't got an answer. I wanna be with Marlene... But I gotta fight. 'Cause if I don't...the planet's gonna die. So I'm gonna keep fightin'! But, I'm worried 'bout Marlene. I really just wanna be with her...always. See? I'm goin' in circles, now.

Original: Elmyra: ...I think I understand what you're saying... She's upstairs asleep, Why don't you go and see her.
Dialogue: ...I think I understand what you're saying... She's upstairs asleep, Why don't you go and see her.

Original: Tifa: It's my fault... I was the one who got Aeris involved in this.
Dialogue: It's my fault... I was the one who got Aeris involved in this.

Original: Elmyra: Don't say that. Aeris doesn't think that.
Dialogue: Don't say that. Aeris doesn't think that.

Original: Tifa: I feel so depressed.
Dialogue: I feel so depressed.

Original: Elmyra: ...sigh...
Dialogue: ...sigh...

Original: Barret: I'm so glad...... I'm so glad you're all right...
Dialogue: I'm so glad...... I'm so glad you're all right...

Original: Marlene: Daddy, don't cry. Your whiskers hurt!
Dialogue: Daddy, don't cry. Your whiskers hurt!

Original: Barret: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Barret: You gonna go help Aeris, right? She's done so much for me...
Dialogue: You gonna go help Aeris, right? She's done so much for me...

Original: Barret: If it's the Shinra you're dealin' with, I can't just sit here! I'm comin', too!
Dialogue: If it's the Shinra you're dealin' with, I can't just sit here! I'm comin', too!

Original: Marlene: Guess what? Guess what? Aeris was asking me lots of questions. Like what kind of person Cloud is. I bet she likes you, Cloud!
Dialogue: Guess what? Guess what? Aeris was asking me lots of questions. Like what kind of person Cloud is. I bet she likes you, Cloud!

Original: Marlene: Stupid!
Dialogue: Stupid!

Original: Marlene: I won't tell Tifa.
Dialogue: I won't tell Tifa.

Original: Cloud: Looks like I could get some rest here...
Dialogue: Looks like I could get some rest here...

Original: Tifa: You're going after Aeris, right?
Dialogue: You're going after Aeris, right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: I'm coming with you.
Dialogue: I'm coming with you.

Original: Cloud: We're going right into Shinra Headquarters. ...You gotta be prepared for the worst.
Dialogue: We're going right into Shinra Headquarters. ...You gotta be prepared for the worst.

Original: Tifa: I know. Right now, I feel I have to push myself to the limit. If I stayed here...I'll go crazy.
Dialogue: I know. Right now, I feel I have to push myself to the limit. If I stayed here...I'll go crazy.

Original: Barret: Sorry, but can you take care of Marlene a bit longer?
Dialogue: Sorry, but can you take care of Marlene a bit longer?

Original: Elmyra: Yes, I don't mind.
Dialogue: Yes, I don't mind.

Original: Barret: This place is dangerous now. You better go somewhere else.
Dialogue: This place is dangerous now. You better go somewhere else.

Original: Elmyra: ...You're right. But promise me that you'll come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.
Dialogue: ...You're right. But promise me that you'll come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.

Original: Tifa: How do we get to the Shinra Building?
Dialogue: How do we get to the Shinra Building?

Original: Barret: There ain't no train that goes up there anymore...
Dialogue: There ain't no train that goes up there anymore...

Original: Tifa: Well, let's just go to Wall Market. We might be able to find something there.
Dialogue: Well, let's just go to Wall Market. We might be able to find something there.

Original: Elmyra: I mean it, come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.
Dialogue: I mean it, come back to her. Don't get yourself killed.

Original: Marlene: Daddy, Tifa, Cloud! Please bring Aeris back!
Dialogue: Daddy, Tifa, Cloud! Please bring Aeris back!

Original: NPC: You goin' up to the plate? You better have a Battery.
Dialogue: You goin' up to the plate? You better have a Battery.

Original: Cloud: You're gonna sell me something you just found?
Dialogue: You're gonna sell me something you just found?

Original: NPC: Hey, you knew? But I repaired it, so it's all right.
Dialogue: Hey, you knew? But I repaired it, so it's all right.

Original: Cloud: Why do I need a battery to climb up to the plate?
Dialogue: Why do I need a battery to climb up to the plate?

Original: NPC: You'll find out when you get there. How 'bout 100 Gil for each?
Dialogue: You'll find out when you get there. How 'bout 100 Gil for each?

Original: Cloud: ......
On-screen: Received "Batteries"!
Dialogue: Received "Batteries"!

Original: NPC: Hmm, looks like you're a little short, son. Come back again.
Dialogue: Hmm, looks like you're a little short, son. Come back again.

Original: NPC: All right then, go see for yourself. You'll be back again.
Dialogue: All right then, go see for yourself. You'll be back again.

Original: Kid: Wanna see somethin' awesome? Follow me!
Dialogue: Wanna see somethin' awesome? Follow me!

Original: Kid 1: Everyone climbed up this wire. Looks scary......Brrr.
Dialogue: Everyone climbed up this wire. Looks scary......Brrr.

Original: Tifa: Can we climb it?
Dialogue: Can we climb it?

Original: Kid 1: Yeah. It leads to the Upper World.
Dialogue: Yeah. It leads to the Upper World.

Original: Barret: Awright! We'll climb this wire!
Dialogue: Awright! We'll climb this wire!

Original: Cloud: There's no way we can do this. You know how far it goes up?
Dialogue: There's no way we can do this. You know how far it goes up?

Original: Barret: There IS a way! Look! What's that look like?
Dialogue: There IS a way! Look! What's that look like?

Original: Cloud: Just a normal wire.
Dialogue: Just a normal wire.

Original: Barret: Oh yeah? Well to me it looks like a golden shiny wire of hope.
Dialogue: Oh yeah? Well to me it looks like a golden shiny wire of hope.

Original: Tifa: You're right. This is the only way to save Aeris...
Dialogue: You're right. This is the only way to save Aeris...

Original: Cloud: Ok, that was a bad analogy, but, Barret, I understand how you feel.
Dialogue: Ok, that was a bad analogy, but, Barret, I understand how you feel.

Original: Cloud: Let's go!
Dialogue: Let's go!

Original: Kid 2: Oh man! This is horrible...
Dialogue: Oh man! This is horrible...

Original: Kid 3: Hey, scary, huh? Dad told me that it's the Shinra's doing.
Dialogue: Hey, scary, huh? Dad told me that it's the Shinra's doing.

Original: Cloud: ...maybe if I put a battery in... The propeller might work.
Dialogue: ...maybe if I put a battery in... The propeller might work.

Original: Cloud: It might work if I put a battery in it.
Dialogue: It might work if I put a battery in it.

Original: Cloud: I guess I'll just have to believe the shopkeeper.
Dialogue: I guess I'll just have to believe the shopkeeper.

Original: Cloud: Need a battery here, too.
Dialogue: Need a battery here, too.

Original: Cloud: Looks like the only way is to jump onto that bar. Should make it if I jump before it comes too close. (use OK button to jump)
Dialogue: Looks like the only way is to jump onto that bar. Should make it if I jump before it comes too close. (use OK button to jump)

Original: Cloud: Jumped too soon...
Dialogue: Jumped too soon...

Original: Cloud: Jumped too late...
Dialogue: Jumped too late...

Original: Barret: Hey, you oughta know this building well.
Dialogue: Hey, you oughta know this building well.

Original: Cloud: ...Not really, now that I think about it, This's the first time I've ever been to the Headquarters.
Dialogue: ...Not really, now that I think about it, This's the first time I've ever been to the Headquarters.

Original: Barret: I heard about this place before. Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees. Must be where they took Aeris. The security's pretty light now. Awright, let's go!!
Dialogue: I heard about this place before. Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees. Must be where they took Aeris. The security's pretty light now. Awright, let's go!!

Original: Tifa: Wait a second! You're not thinking of just going right through the main entrance, are you?
Dialogue: Wait a second! You're not thinking of just going right through the main entrance, are you?

Original: Barret: Well what else does it look like!? I'm gonna kick some Shinra butt and......
Dialogue: Well what else does it look like!? I'm gonna kick some Shinra butt and......

Original: Tifa: That's not going to work! We've got to find another way...
Dialogue: That's not going to work! We've got to find another way...

Original: Barret: Ain't gonna be no other way! If we keep wastin' time like this, Aeris'll...
Dialogue: Ain't gonna be no other way! If we keep wastin' time like this, Aeris'll...

Original: Tifa: I know that! But if we get caught here... Hey, Cloud. ...What should we do?
Dialogue: I know that! But if we get caught here... Hey, Cloud. ...What should we do?

Original: Barret: That's more like it! C'mon, let's go!!
Dialogue: That's more like it! C'mon, let's go!!

Original: Tifa: See? Let's be careful and find a different route!
Dialogue: See? Let's be careful and find a different route!

Original: Receptionist: Excuse me! If you don't have an appointment, you'll just have to...
Dialogue: Excuse me! If you don't have an appointment, you'll just have to...

Original: Barret: Don't need no appointment... This is a 'mergency! Anyone who don't wanna get their face bashed in better git outta the way!! Yaagghh!
Dialogue: Don't need no appointment... This is a 'mergency! Anyone who don't wanna get their face bashed in better git outta the way!! Yaagghh!

Original: Barret: Let's go to the top!
Dialogue: Let's go to the top!

Original: Cloud: Nothing. Have to find another way up, I guess...
Dialogue: Nothing. Have to find another way up, I guess...

Original: Tifa: ......What's wrong?
Dialogue: ......What's wrong?

Original: Cloud: I didn't want to start a ruckus till we saved Aeris. I should have known that was impossible though...
Dialogue: I didn't want to start a ruckus till we saved Aeris. I should have known that was impossible though...

Original: Barret: Heh, heh, heh.
Dialogue: Heh, heh, heh.

Original: Cloud: What is it? You're givin' me the willies.
Dialogue: What is it? You're givin' me the willies.

Original: Barret: So there are times when even you fight for other people. I am impressed.
Dialogue: So there are times when even you fight for other people. I am impressed.

Original: Cloud: Who cares if you're impressed...?
Dialogue: Who cares if you're impressed...?

Original: Barret: Y'know,I ain't so good at sayin' this,but... Sorry...for lotsa things.
Dialogue: Y'know,I ain't so good at sayin' this,but... Sorry...for lotsa things.

Original: Barret: Wh, what the!?
Dialogue: Wh, what the!?

Original: Tifa: Look!
Dialogue: Look!

Original: Barret: DA-MN...!
Dialogue: DA-MN...!

Original: Barret: I don't care where, Cloud! Just stop it!
Dialogue: I don't care where, Cloud! Just stop it!

Original: Tifa: What's going on!?
Dialogue: What's going on!?

Original: NPC: Oh man!!
Dialogue: Oh man!!

Original: NPC: No, uh, that's all right. My mistake. I'm, uh, not getting on.
Dialogue: No, uh, that's all right. My mistake. I'm, uh, not getting on.

Original: NPC: You, you're still driving...? Uh, I'll pass again.
Dialogue: You, you're still driving...? Uh, I'll pass again.

Original: NPC: Oh man!!
Dialogue: Oh man!!

Original: Barret: Yo... You really gonna take these stairs all the way up?
Dialogue: Yo... You really gonna take these stairs all the way up?

Original: Tifa: Well we've got to get to Aeris to help her somehow.
Dialogue: Well we've got to get to Aeris to help her somehow.

Original: Barret: Talk about out of the way...
Dialogue: Talk about out of the way...

Original: Tifa: I don't have time to argue with you! I'm going!
Dialogue: I don't have time to argue with you! I'm going!

Original: Barret: Y, yo Tifa! Don't go off alone!
Dialogue: Y, yo Tifa! Don't go off alone!

Original: Tifa: Wait a minute, Cloud!
Dialogue: Wait a minute, Cloud!

Original: Barret: Don't know... Why...the hell... We gotta...climb...
Dialogue: Don't know... Why...the hell... We gotta...climb...

Original: Cloud: ...because we don't want to start a commotion until we've saved Aeris.
Dialogue: ...because we don't want to start a commotion until we've saved Aeris.

Original: Cloud: I doubt that's possible though...
Dialogue: I doubt that's possible though...

Original: Barret: ...heh heh heh.
Dialogue: ...heh heh heh.

Original: Cloud: Knock it off. You're giving me the creeps.
Dialogue: Knock it off. You're giving me the creeps.

Original: Barret: So even you will fight for someone else. I had you figured wrong I guess.
Dialogue: So even you will fight for someone else. I had you figured wrong I guess.

Original: Cloud: Who cares what you figured!
Dialogue: Who cares what you figured!

Original: Barret: I'm just sayin' mebbe I was wrong...
Dialogue: I'm just sayin' mebbe I was wrong...

Original: Tifa: heh heh heh......
Dialogue: heh heh heh......

Original: Cloud: What's that supposed to mean, Tifa?
Dialogue: What's that supposed to mean, Tifa?

Original: Barret: ...how much farther do these stairs go on?
Dialogue: ...how much farther do these stairs go on?

Original: Tifa: Why don't you ask them?
Dialogue: Why don't you ask them?

Original: Barret: It's not one of them endless stairways or somethin', d'ya think?
Dialogue: It's not one of them endless stairways or somethin', d'ya think?

Original: Tifa: Of course not!!
Dialogue: Of course not!!

Original: Barret: Right...couldn't be that...
Dialogue: Right...couldn't be that...

Original: Barret: Are we there yet?
Dialogue: Are we there yet?

Original: Tifa: Not yet.
Dialogue: Not yet.

Original: Barret: ...there yet?
Dialogue: ...there yet?

Original: Tifa: I said not yet!
Dialogue: I said not yet!

Original: Barret: Yo...
Dialogue: Yo...

Original: Tifa: Look, don't even ask! We're way way way way far away from being there, ok!?
Dialogue: Look, don't even ask! We're way way way way far away from being there, ok!?

Original: Barret: Damn, man! I've had it! I'm going back!
Dialogue: Damn, man! I've had it! I'm going back!

Original: Tifa: And take just as long going down as you did coming up?
Dialogue: And take just as long going down as you did coming up?

Original: Tifa: C'mon, Barret. Pull it together!
Dialogue: C'mon, Barret. Pull it together!

Original: Barret: Yeah, well all I know is I'm just flesh 'n' blood... 'cept for this arm of mine. Don't treat me like I'm some ex-member of SOLDIER or somethin'......
Dialogue: Yeah, well all I know is I'm just flesh 'n' blood... 'cept for this arm of mine. Don't treat me like I'm some ex-member of SOLDIER or somethin'......

Original: Tifa: What about me!? I'm human too! Oh, do what you want, I'm going on!
Dialogue: What about me!? I'm human too! Oh, do what you want, I'm going on!

Original: Tifa: Yaah! Barret! You go first!
Dialogue: Yaah! Barret! You go first!

Original: Barret: What're ya ignorant? I didn't mean that...
Dialogue: What're ya ignorant? I didn't mean that...

Original: Tifa: All right, all right!
Dialogue: All right, all right!

Original: Tifa: Cloud, you go on ahead too!!
Dialogue: Cloud, you go on ahead too!!

Original: Barret: Yo... What floor is this?
Dialogue: Yo... What floor is this?

Original: Tifa: ...I gave up counting.
Dialogue: ...I gave up counting.

Original: Barret: Why they gotta build these buildings so damn tall?
Dialogue: Why they gotta build these buildings so damn tall?

Original: Barret: That Shinra... They're just no damn good.
Dialogue: That Shinra... They're just no damn good.

Original: Barret: huff... Man, I'm beat...
Dialogue: huff... Man, I'm beat...

Original: Barret: Marlene, Daddy wanted to see your face one more time...
Dialogue: Marlene, Daddy wanted to see your face one more time...

Original: Tifa: Would you stop acting like a retard and climb!?
Dialogue: Would you stop acting like a retard and climb!?

Original: Tifa: It's just a bit more!
Dialogue: It's just a bit more!

Original: Tifa: ...maybe.
Dialogue: ...maybe.

Original: Barret: F...finally... M...made it... N...never wanna see... no more stairs the rest of my life...
Dialogue: F...finally... M...made it... N...never wanna see... no more stairs the rest of my life...

Original: Tifa: huff...puff... this really takes it out of you... But this is it. We'd better get ready...!
Dialogue: huff...puff... this really takes it out of you... But this is it. We'd better get ready...!

Original: Barret: Hey Cloud! You come all this way, you thinkin' of goin' back down to the 1st floor?
Dialogue: Hey Cloud! You come all this way, you thinkin' of goin' back down to the 1st floor?

Original: Barret: We ain't got no time for that! Stop messin' around, boy!
Dialogue: We ain't got no time for that! Stop messin' around, boy!

Original: Barret: Yeah, that's right! Let's go on then!
Dialogue: Yeah, that's right! Let's go on then!

Original: Guard: Destroy the intruders!
Dialogue: Destroy the intruders!

Original: Cloud: What's this?
Dialogue: What's this?

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Keycard 60"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Keycard 60"!

Original: On-screen: You don't have a Card Key
Dialogue: You don't have a Card Key

Original: Tifa: I hope Aeris is all right.
Dialogue: I hope Aeris is all right.

Original: Barret: This is the real thing. Don't let your guard down.
Dialogue: This is the real thing. Don't let your guard down.

Original: Guard: What're you doing here!? No unauthorized people are allowed here!! People like you don't belong here! Go on, get out!
Dialogue: What're you doing here!? No unauthorized people are allowed here!! People like you don't belong here! Go on, get out!

Original: Barret: Lookit that, all them guards is runnin' around. Cloud, you go on ahead and signal us when it's safe to come.
Dialogue: Lookit that, all them guards is runnin' around. Cloud, you go on ahead and signal us when it's safe to come.

Original: Barret: When those guards turn around, MOVE!
Dialogue: When those guards turn around, MOVE!

Original: Tifa: Stay in the shadows!
Dialogue: Stay in the shadows!

Original: On-screen: Wait for the soldiers to let down their guard, then push the [O] button to signal the others!
Dialogue: Wait for the soldiers to let down their guard, then push the [O] button to signal the others!

Original: Barret: Ok! We gonna rock!
Dialogue: Ok! We gonna rock!

Original: Tifa: Remember, we're here to save Aeris.
Dialogue: Remember, we're here to save Aeris.

Original: Barret: Hell, I know that!
Dialogue: Hell, I know that!

Original: Guard: Hey there! What do you think you're doing there!?
Dialogue: Hey there! What do you think you're doing there!?

Original: Barret: What the hell're ya doin'? Come on gotta do it again!
Dialogue: What the hell're ya doin'? Come on gotta do it again!

Original: Barret: I shoulda known it'd turn out like this... If I'd known it'd be like this in the first place...
Dialogue: I shoulda known it'd turn out like this... If I'd known it'd be like this in the first place...

Original: Tifa: Shhh! Now let's move on.
Dialogue: Shhh! Now let's move on.

Original: NPC: The hell are you? What're you doin' around here?
Dialogue: The hell are you? What're you doin' around here?

Original: NPC: Aeris? How did you know that name? You must be...!? Aeris, you mean that kid. The receptionist. Yeah, I was startin' to worry 'bout her myself. And so another rival appears on the scene, eh? You mean, she's not? It's someone else?
Dialogue: Aeris? How did you know that name? You must be...!? Aeris, you mean that kid. The receptionist. Yeah, I was startin' to worry 'bout her myself. And so another rival appears on the scene, eh? You mean, she's not? It's someone else?

Original: NPC: Oh, I see. So you must be that whatcha call it... Shinra, Inc. Repair Division!! You know, it looks like this building is starting to fall apart. This door was just pushed open. You ought to fix this right away. Oh yeah, and take a look on the other floors too. I'll give you this.
Dialogue: Oh, I see. So you must be that whatcha call it... Shinra, Inc. Repair Division!! You know, it looks like this building is starting to fall apart. This door was just pushed open. You ought to fix this right away. Oh yeah, and take a look on the other floors too. I'll give you this.

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Keycard 62"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Keycard 62"!

Original: NPC: This door is stuck wide open. Better fix this right away.
Dialogue: This door is stuck wide open. Better fix this right away.

Original: Hart: How do you do? This is the Midgar Mayor's Office. Mayor Domino is in his office. I am the Deputy Mayor. If you should have any questions feel free to ask me...
Dialogue: How do you do? This is the Midgar Mayor's Office. Mayor Domino is in his office. I am the Deputy Mayor. If you should have any questions feel free to ask me...

Original: Domino: Hmm? Oh, and who might you be? You all must be those...ahem... Me? I'm Domino, the Mayor of Midgar. Actually, I'm Mayor in name only. The city and everything in it is really run by Shinra, Inc. My only real job is watching over Shinra's documents... Me! The Mayor! A librarian! Ohh...... You want to get upstairs? I tell you what, if you can guess the password, I'll give you my keycard. Yes, that's it. Guess the password and I'll give you my keycard! Get it on the first try and I'll even throw in a special item!
Dialogue: Hmm? Oh, and who might you be? You all must be those...ahem... Me? I'm Domino, the Mayor of Midgar. Actually, I'm Mayor in name only. The city and everything in it is really run by Shinra, Inc. My only real job is watching over Shinra's documents... Me! The Mayor! A librarian! Ohh...... You want to get upstairs? I tell you what, if you can guess the password, I'll give you my keycard. Yes, that's it. Guess the password and I'll give you my keycard! Get it on the first try and I'll even throw in a special item!

Original: Hart: Did you speak with the Mayor? What? A password? Oh, I get it... He's got way too much time on his hands. But you can't really blame him, Everything in Midgar is controlled by President Shinra. Maybe I can help you.
Dialogue: Did you speak with the Mayor? What? A password? Oh, I get it... He's got way too much time on his hands. But you can't really blame him, Everything in Midgar is controlled by President Shinra. Maybe I can help you.

Original: Hart: What do you want to know?
Dialogue: What do you want to know?

Original: Hart: What can I do for you?
Dialogue: What can I do for you?

Original: Hart: Sure, sure. All right. As a public servant, it's my job to serve the needs of the people. So here's a hint...
Dialogue: Sure, sure. All right. As a public servant, it's my job to serve the needs of the people. So here's a hint...

Original: Hart: ...for 500 gil.
Dialogue: ...for 500 gil.

Original: Hart: ...for 1000 gil.
Dialogue: ...for 1000 gil.

Original: Hart: ...for 2000 gil.
Dialogue: ...for 2000 gil.

Original: Hart: Hey now! You're a bit short. I'm sure even item stores in the slums don't give credit nowadays.
Dialogue: Hey now! You're a bit short. I'm sure even item stores in the slums don't give credit nowadays.

Original: Hart: Oh, my...well, Thank you very much.
Dialogue: Oh, my...well, Thank you very much.

Original: Hart: Now listen. On this floor are four research libraries for four different sections of Shinra, Inc.... Parts of the password are hidden in each of the libraries. Pay careful attention to the files in each room. The name of each library is written on the plaque outside the door.
Dialogue: Now listen. On this floor are four research libraries for four different sections of Shinra, Inc.... Parts of the password are hidden in each of the libraries. Pay careful attention to the files in each room. The name of each library is written on the plaque outside the door.

Original: Hart: Now, in each library will be one file mixed in from another library. Look carefully at the numbers on each file.
Dialogue: Now, in each library will be one file mixed in from another library. Look carefully at the numbers on each file.

Original: Hart: There is a number at the beginning of each file name. Of course there's a number even on the files that don't belong in that library. Match the number with the letters in the title of the file. If the file starts with a 4, then check the fourth letter and... well, you get the idea.
Dialogue: There is a number at the beginning of each file name. Of course there's a number even on the files that don't belong in that library. Match the number with the letters in the title of the file. If the file starts with a 4, then check the fourth letter and... well, you get the idea.

Original: Hart: ...I see. Then, I guess that's that. Good luck finding it on your own. If you still can't find it. I'll just be right over here. Ready to tell you anytime...
Dialogue: ...I see. Then, I guess that's that. Good luck finding it on your own. If you still can't find it. I'll just be right over here. Ready to tell you anytime...

Original: On-screen: Shinra, Inc. Peace Preservation/ Weapon Dev. Research Library
Dialogue: Shinra, Inc. Peace Preservation/ Weapon Dev. Research Library

Original: On-screen: Shinra, Inc. Space Dev. Research Library
Dialogue: Shinra, Inc. Space Dev. Research Library

Original: On-screen: Shinra, Inc. Urban Dev. Research Library
Dialogue: Shinra, Inc. Urban Dev. Research Library

Original: On-screen: Shinra, Inc. Scientific Research Library
Dialogue: Shinra, Inc. Scientific Research Library

Original: On-screen: This is the Public Order/Weapon Development Library. Return materials where you found them. Do not mix materials from other libraries.
Dialogue: This is the Public Order/Weapon Development Library. Return materials where you found them. Do not mix materials from other libraries.

Original: On-screen: This is the Space Dev Research Library. Click on the plate in front of each library to see which it is.
Dialogue: This is the Space Dev Research Library. Click on the plate in front of each library to see which it is.

Original: On-screen: Materials are non-circulating! It is forbidden to remove any materials from this floor.
Dialogue: Materials are non-circulating! It is forbidden to remove any materials from this floor.

Original: On-screen: This is the Scientific Research Library. Materials for the... Urban Dev. Library Peace/Weapon Dev. Library Space Dev. Library are held in their respective libraries...
Dialogue: This is the Scientific Research Library. Materials for the... Urban Dev. Library Peace/Weapon Dev. Library Space Dev. Library are held in their respective libraries...

Original: Domino: Got it? Then tell me. So, what's the password?
Dialogue: Got it? Then tell me. So, what's the password?

Original: Domino: BEST!! God, I love the sound of that! BEST!! I AM the best...ME!! No matter what anyone else says, you'd better believe it.
Dialogue: BEST!! God, I love the sound of that! BEST!! I AM the best...ME!! No matter what anyone else says, you'd better believe it.

Original: Domino: KING!! God, I love the sound of that! KING!! President Shinra sucks! I should be King of Midgar!
Dialogue: KING!! God, I love the sound of that! KING!! President Shinra sucks! I should be King of Midgar!

Original: Domino: BOMB!! God, I love the sound of that! BOMB!! I'm so angry, I'm like a walking time bomb waiting to explode!
Dialogue: BOMB!! God, I love the sound of that! BOMB!! I'm so angry, I'm like a walking time bomb waiting to explode!

Original: Domino: MAKO!! God, I love the sound of that! MAKO! If I had a lot more of it, I would be a real Mayor!
Dialogue: MAKO!! God, I love the sound of that! MAKO! If I had a lot more of it, I would be a real Mayor!

Original: Domino: Nope! You're ALL wrong! It's a much better word than that! Try again!
Dialogue: Nope! You're ALL wrong! It's a much better word than that! Try again!

Original: Domino: ......hmm. Well, ok. Here, take it.
Dialogue: ......hmm. Well, ok. Here, take it.

Original: On-screen: Received "Keycard 65"!
Dialogue: Received "Keycard 65"!

Original: Domino: I never thought you'd get it on the first try... Just goes to show you can't judge a book by its cover. Oh well, a promise is a promise. Take this, too.
Dialogue: I never thought you'd get it on the first try... Just goes to show you can't judge a book by its cover. Oh well, a promise is a promise. Take this, too.

Original: On-screen: Received "Elemental" Materia!
Dialogue: Received "Elemental" Materia!

Original: Domino: What...is it full already? Come back again when it's empty.
Dialogue: What...is it full already? Come back again when it's empty.

Original: Domino: Hmm. It appears you're not completely stupid. Fine then, take this.
Dialogue: Hmm. It appears you're not completely stupid. Fine then, take this.

Original: On-screen: Received "Elixir"!
Dialogue: Received "Elixir"!

Original: Domino: I see... I think for you...this would be best. Then, I have this to give the lot of you.
Dialogue: I see... I think for you...this would be best. Then, I have this to give the lot of you.

Original: On-screen: Received "Ether"!
Dialogue: Received "Ether"!

Original: Domino: Hoo boy! You finally got it...? You all really don't like to use your heads, do you? ......What the hey. Here, just take it anyway.
Dialogue: Hoo boy! You finally got it...? You all really don't like to use your heads, do you? ......What the hey. Here, just take it anyway.

Original: On-screen: Received "Potion"!
Dialogue: Received "Potion"!

Original: Domino: Why would I do something like this, you ask? To mess with them, of course! Shinra's been torturing me forever. That's why I was a little rough on you all just now. Now go up there and really make them suffer. This ought to make us even! Heh heh heh......
Dialogue: Why would I do something like this, you ask? To mess with them, of course! Shinra's been torturing me forever. That's why I was a little rough on you all just now. Now go up there and really make them suffer. This ought to make us even! Heh heh heh......

Original: Domino: But my card will only get you to the 65th floor. Can you believe how they treat me? ...ME! Like some common employee...
Dialogue: But my card will only get you to the 65th floor. Can you believe how they treat me? ...ME! Like some common employee...

Original: Hart: If you run into President Shinra please don't tell him about this. I can't be a partner to anymore trouble for Shinra.
Dialogue: If you run into President Shinra please don't tell him about this. I can't be a partner to anymore trouble for Shinra.

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Midgar Parts"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Midgar Parts"!

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Keycard 66"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Keycard 66"!

Original: Cloud: A model of Midgar...born from Mako sucked right out of the earth.
Dialogue: A model of Midgar...born from Mako sucked right out of the earth.

Original: Cloud: Parts of the model are missing...
Dialogue: Parts of the model are missing...

Original: Cloud: ...Sounds like something opened up...
Dialogue: ...Sounds like something opened up...

Original: Cloud: Midgar...born from Mako energy which was sucked right out of the earth. A model of the city... When construction of Sector 6 finishes, Shinra's plan will be complete. That must be why he took Aeris...
Dialogue: Midgar...born from Mako energy which was sucked right out of the earth. A model of the city... When construction of Sector 6 finishes, Shinra's plan will be complete. That must be why he took Aeris...

Original: Barret: Geez--! That's a lotta suits!
Dialogue: Geez--! That's a lotta suits!

Original: Reeve: We have the damage estimates for Sector 7. Considering those factories we already set up and all the investments, the damage is estimated at approximately 10 Billion gil...
Dialogue: We have the damage estimates for Sector 7. Considering those factories we already set up and all the investments, the damage is estimated at approximately 10 Billion gil...

Original: Reeve: The estimated cost to rebuild Sector 7 is...
Dialogue: The estimated cost to rebuild Sector 7 is...

Original: President Shinra: We're not rebuilding.
Dialogue: We're not rebuilding.

Original: Reeve: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: President Shinra: We're leaving Sector 7 as it is. And restarting the Neo-Midgar plan.
Dialogue: We're leaving Sector 7 as it is. And restarting the Neo-Midgar plan.

Original: Reeve: ...then the Ancients?
Dialogue: ...then the Ancients?

Original: President Shinra: The Promised Land will soon be ours.
Dialogue: The Promised Land will soon be ours.

Original: President Shinra: I want you to raise the Mako rates 15% in every area.
Dialogue: I want you to raise the Mako rates 15% in every area.

Original: Palmer: Rate hike! Rate hike! Tra, la, la! And please include our Space Program in the budget!
Dialogue: Rate hike! Rate hike! Tra, la, la! And please include our Space Program in the budget!

Original: President Shinra: Reeve and Scarlet will divide the extra income from the rate increase.
Dialogue: Reeve and Scarlet will divide the extra income from the rate increase.

Original: Palmer: Oh man!
Dialogue: Oh man!

Original: Reeve: Sir. If you raise the rates, the people will lose confidence...
Dialogue: Sir. If you raise the rates, the people will lose confidence...

Original: President Shinra: It'll be all right. The ignorant citizens won't lose confidence, they'll trust Shinra, Inc. even more.
Dialogue: It'll be all right. The ignorant citizens won't lose confidence, they'll trust Shinra, Inc. even more.

Original: Heidegger: Ha ha ha! After all, we're the ones who saved Sector 7 from AVALANCHE!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! After all, we're the ones who saved Sector 7 from AVALANCHE!

Original: Barret: That dirty #$*$^
Dialogue: That dirty #$*$^

Original: President Shinra: Hojo. How's the girl?
Dialogue: Hojo. How's the girl?

Original: Hojo: As a specimen, she is inferior to her mother. I'm still in the process of comparing her to her mother, Ifalna, but for now the difference is 18%.
Dialogue: As a specimen, she is inferior to her mother. I'm still in the process of comparing her to her mother, Ifalna, but for now the difference is 18 %.

Original: President Shinra: How long will the research take?
Dialogue: How long will the research take?

Original: Hojo: Probably 120 years. It's probably impossible to finish in our lifetime. Or in the lifetime of the specimen too, for that matter.
Dialogue: Probably 120 years. It's probably impossible to finish in our lifetime. Or in the lifetime of the specimen too, for that matter.

Original: Hojo: That's why we're thinking of breeding her. Then we could create one that could withstand our research for a long time.
Dialogue: That's why we're thinking of breeding her. Then we could create one that could withstand our research for a long time.

Original: President Shinra: What about the Promised Land? Won't it hinder our plans?
Dialogue: What about the Promised Land? Won't it hinder our plans?

Original: Hojo: That's what I need to plan. The mother is strong... and yet has her weaknesses.
Dialogue: That's what I need to plan. The mother is strong... and yet has her weaknesses.

Original: President Shinra: That concludes our meeting.
Dialogue: That concludes our meeting.

Original: Scarlet: Something stinks...
Dialogue: Something stinks...

Original: Cloud: They were talking about Aeris...right?
Dialogue: They were talking about Aeris...right?

Original: Barret: I dunno.
Dialogue: I dunno.

Original: Tifa: Probably.
Dialogue: Probably.

Original: Cloud: Let's follow 'em.
Dialogue: Let's follow 'em.

Original: Cloud: Hojo...huh...?
Dialogue: Hojo...huh...?

Original: Barret: I remember him. That Hojo guy. He's in charge of the Shinra's Science Department. Cloud, don't you know him?
Dialogue: I remember him. That Hojo guy. He's in charge of the Shinra's Science Department. Cloud, don't you know him?

Original: Cloud: This is the first time I've actually ever seen him. So...that's what he looks like...
Dialogue: This is the first time I've actually ever seen him. So...that's what he looks like...

Original: NPC: Let's see... The specimen Hojo asked me for is...
Dialogue: Let's see... The specimen Hojo asked me for is...

Original: NPC: Is this today's specimen?
Dialogue: Is this today's specimen?

Original: Hojo: Yes. We're starting right away. Raise it to the upper level.
Dialogue: Yes. We're starting right away. Raise it to the upper level.

Original: Hojo: My precious specimen...
Dialogue: My precious specimen...

Original: Tifa: Precious specimen...? Is it going to be used for a biological experiment?
Dialogue: Precious specimen...? Is it going to be used for a biological experiment?

Original: Cloud: Jenova... Jenova... Sephiroth's... So...they've brought it here.
Dialogue: Jenova... Jenova... Sephiroth's... So...they've brought it here.

Original: Tifa: Cloud, be strong!
Dialogue: Cloud, be strong!

Original: Cloud: Did you see it?
Dialogue: Did you see it?

Original: Barret: See what?
Dialogue: See what?

Original: Cloud: It's moving......still alive?
Dialogue: It's moving......still alive?

Original: Barret: Where's its $#&*&@ head? This whole thing's stupid. Let's keep goin'.
Dialogue: Where's its $#&*&@ head? This whole thing's stupid. Let's keep goin'.

Original: NPC: That elevator back there is only to transport Specimens. You can't use it. It would be a lot easier if it led to the 68 Floor Research Lab.
Dialogue: That elevator back there is only to transport Specimens. You can't use it. It would be a lot easier if it led to the 68 Floor Research Lab.

Original: Cloud: Aeris!
Dialogue: Aeris!

Original: Hojo: Aeris? Oh, is that her name? What do you want?
Dialogue: Aeris? Oh, is that her name? What do you want?

Original: Cloud: We're taking Aeris back.
Dialogue: We're taking Aeris back.

Original: Hojo: Outsiders......
Dialogue: Outsiders......

Original: Barret: Shoulda noticed it earlier, you...
Dialogue: Shoulda noticed it earlier, you...

Original: Hojo: There's so many frivolous things in this world.
Dialogue: There's so many frivolous things in this world.

Original: Hojo: Are you going to kill me? I don't think you should. The equipment here is extremely delicate. Without me, who could operate it? Hmm?
Dialogue: Are you going to kill me? I don't think you should. The equipment here is extremely delicate. Without me, who could operate it? Hmm?

Original: Cloud: Ugh.
Dialogue: Ugh.

Original: Hojo: That's right. I recommend you think things out logically before you make any rash moves.
Dialogue: That's right. I recommend you think things out logically before you make any rash moves.

Original: Hojo: Now, bring in the Specimen!
Dialogue: Now, bring in the Specimen!

Original: Aeris: Cloud, help!
Dialogue: Cloud, help!

Original: Cloud: What do you think you're doin'?
Dialogue: What do you think you're doin'?

Original: Hojo: Lending a helping hand to an endangered species... Both of them are on the brink of extinction... If I don't help, all these animals will disappear.
Dialogue: Lending a helping hand to an endangered species... Both of them are on the brink of extinction... If I don't help, all these animals will disappear.

Original: Tifa: ...animal? That's terrible! Aeris is a human being!
Dialogue: ...animal? That's terrible! Aeris is a human being!

Original: Barret: You're gonna pay!
Dialogue: You're gonna pay!

Original: Cloud: Barret! Can't you do anything?
Dialogue: Barret! Can't you do anything?

Original: Barret: Awright!! Step back!
Dialogue: Awright!! Step back!

Original: Hojo: Stop!!
Dialogue: Stop!!

Original: Hojo: Wh...what are you do-- Oh! My precious specimens...
Dialogue: Wh...what are you do-- Oh! My precious specimens...

Original: Cloud: Now's our chance to get Aeris!
Dialogue: Now's our chance to get Aeris!

Original: Aeris: Thanks, Cloud.
Dialogue: Thanks, Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Cloud...what's wrong?
Dialogue: Cloud...what's wrong?

Original: Cloud: ...The elevator is moving.
Dialogue: ...The elevator is moving.

Original: Hojo: This is no ordinary specimen. This is a very ferocious specimen!
Dialogue: This is no ordinary specimen. This is a very ferocious specimen!

Original: Red: He's rather strong. I'll help you all out.
Dialogue: He's rather strong. I'll help you all out.

Original: Tifa: It talked!?
Dialogue: It talked!?

Original: Red: I'll talk as much as you want later, Miss.
Dialogue: I'll talk as much as you want later, Miss.

Original: Cloud: We'll take care of that monster. Somebody take Aeris somewhere safe...
Dialogue: We'll take care of that monster. Somebody take Aeris somewhere safe...

Original: Cloud: What's your name?
Dialogue: What's your name?

Original: Red: Hojo has named me, Red XIII. A name with no meaning whatsoever to me. Call me whatever you wish.
Dialogue: Hojo has named me, Red XIII. A name with no meaning whatsoever to me. Call me whatever you wish.

Original: Cloud: Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: Cloud: Aeris, you all right?
Dialogue: Aeris, you all right?

Original: Tifa: She seems all right, ...in many ways.
Dialogue: She seems all right, ...in many ways.

Original: Red XIII: I have a right to choose, too. I don't like two-legged things.
Dialogue: I have a right to choose, too. I don't like two-legged things.

Original: Barret: What are you?
Dialogue: What are you?

Original: Red XIII: An informed question. But difficult to answer. I am what you see.
Dialogue: An informed question. But difficult to answer. I am what you see.

Original: Red XIII: ...You must have many questions, but first, let's get out of here. I'll lead the way.
Dialogue: ...You must have many questions, but first, let's get out of here. I'll lead the way.

Original: Aeris: Cloud... so you did come for me.
Dialogue: Cloud... so you did come for me.

Original: Red XIII: I apologize for what happened back there. I was merely acting to throw Hojo off guard......
Dialogue: I apologize for what happened back there. I was merely acting to throw Hojo off guard......

Original: Barret: Now we've saved Aeris, ain't no need to be in this buildin'! So let's get the hell outta here!
Dialogue: Now we've saved Aeris, ain't no need to be in this buildin'! So let's get the hell outta here!

Original: Cloud: If all five of us go together, we'll be noticed. Let's break up in two groups.
Dialogue: If all five of us go together, we'll be noticed. Let's break up in two groups.

Original: On-screen: Press the (MENU) button to access the Menu. Press the (CANCEL) button for Change Party. Press the (OK) button when finished.
Dialogue: Press the (MENU) button to access the Menu. Press the (CANCEL) button for Change Party. Press the (OK) button when finished.

Original: Aeris: I'll see you later!! We'll be waiting at the 66th Floor Elevator.
Dialogue: I'll see you later!! We'll be waiting at the 66th Floor Elevator.

Original: Tifa: We'll be going first! Meet at the 66th Floor Elevator.
Dialogue: We'll be going first! Meet at the 66th Floor Elevator.

Original: Barret: Later! Meet up at the 66th Floor Elevator!
Dialogue: Later! Meet up at the 66th Floor Elevator!

Original: Red XIII: Don't be late. Do you know where the Elevator is? The 66th Floor!
Dialogue: Don't be late. Do you know where the Elevator is? The 66th Floor!

Original: NPC: No! Please don't kill me. I only did what Hojo told me to do. To prove it to you...here, this is the key card to the 68th Floor. Would I be doing this if I was the enemy?
Dialogue: No! Please don't kill me. I only did what Hojo told me to do. To prove it to you...here, this is the key card to the 68th Floor. Would I be doing this if I was the enemy?

Original: On-screen: Received Key Item "Keycard 68"!
Dialogue: Received Key Item "Keycard 68"!

Original: Barret: Where you goin'? Everyone's waitin' at the 66th Floor Elevator.
Dialogue: Where you goin'? Everyone's waitin' at the 66th Floor Elevator.

Original: Tifa: Where are you going? Everyone's waiting for us at the 66th Floor Elevator.
Dialogue: Where are you going? Everyone's waiting for us at the 66th Floor Elevator.

Original: Aeris: Not that way! Everyone's on the 66th Floor Elevator.
Dialogue: Not that way! Everyone's on the 66th Floor Elevator.

Original: Cloud: H, hey! What is it?
Dialogue: H, hey! What is it?

Original: Rude: Would you press 'Up' please?
Dialogue: Would you press 'Up' please?

Original: Cloud: Turks? Must be a trap...
Dialogue: Turks? Must be a trap...

Original: Tseng: It must have been a real thrill for you... Did you enjoy it?
Dialogue: It must have been a real thrill for you... Did you enjoy it?

Original: Cloud: Ggh...
Dialogue: Ggh...

Original: Cloud: You all got caught, too?
Dialogue: You all got caught, too?

Original: Cloud: Where is Aeris!?
Dialogue: Where is Aeris!?

Original: President Shinra: In a safe place. She's the last surviving Ancient...
Dialogue: In a safe place. She's the last surviving Ancient...

Original: President Shinra: Don't you know? They called themselves the Cetra, and lived thousands of years ago. Now they are just a forgotten page in history.
Dialogue: Don't you know? They called themselves the Cetra, and lived thousands of years ago. Now they are just a forgotten page in history.

Original: Red XIII: Cetra...That girl, is she a survivor of the Cetra?
Dialogue: Cetra...That girl, is she a survivor of the Cetra?

Original: President Shinra: Cetra, or the Ancients will show us the way to the 'Promised Land.' I'm expecting a lot out of her.
Dialogue: Cetra, or the Ancients will show us the way to the 'Promised Land.' I'm expecting a lot out of her.

Original: Red XIII: The Promised Land? Isn't that just a legend?
Dialogue: The Promised Land? Isn't that just a legend?

Original: President Shinra: Even so, it's just too appealing to not to pursue. It's been said the Promised Land is very fertile. ...If the land is fertile...
Dialogue: Even so, it's just too appealing to not to pursue. It's been said the Promised Land is very fertile. ...If the land is fertile...

Original: Barret: Then there's gotta be Mako!
Dialogue: Then there's gotta be Mako!

Original: President Shinra: Exactly. That is why our money sucking Mako Reactor is necessary. The abundant Mako will just come out on its own. That is where Neo-Midgar will be built. Shinra's new glory...
Dialogue: Exactly. That is why our money sucking Mako Reactor is necessary. The abundant Mako will just come out on its own. That is where Neo-Midgar will be built. Shinra's new glory...

Original: Barret: @$#*^%! Quit dreamin'!
Dialogue: @$#*^%! Quit dreamin'!

Original: President Shinra: Oh really, don't you know? These days all it takes for your dreams to come true is money and power.
Dialogue: Oh really, don't you know? These days all it takes for your dreams to come true is money and power.

Original: President Shinra: Well, that is all for our meeting.
Dialogue: Well, that is all for our meeting.

Original: Rude: Come on! Outta his way!
Dialogue: Come on! Outta his way!

Original: Barret: Hold it! I got a lot I wanna say to you!
Dialogue: Hold it! I got a lot I wanna say to you!

Original: President Shinra: If you need something else... talk to my secretary.
Dialogue: If you need something else... talk to my secretary.

Original: Tifa: Psst (Can we get out?)
Dialogue: Psst (Can we get out?)

Original: Tifa: Psst (Cloud, you're so brave!)
Dialogue: Psst (Cloud, you're so brave!)

Original: Tifa: Psst (Don't give up!)
Dialogue: Psst (Don't give up!)

Original: Barret: Hey!
Dialogue: Hey!

Original: Barret: Aeris is an Ancient and the real name of the Ancients is Cetra. The Ancients know where the Promised Land is and the Shinra is searching for that Promised Land.
Dialogue: Aeris is an Ancient and the real name of the Ancients is Cetra. The Ancients know where the Promised Land is and the Shinra is searching for that Promised Land.

Original: Barret: I only heard stories 'bout the Promised Land. I don't know if it really exists. Is that right?
Dialogue: I only heard stories 'bout the Promised Land. I don't know if it really exists. Is that right?

Original: Barret: The Shinra believe that the Promised Land is full of Mako energy. Which means, if the Shinra get there, they'll suck up all the Mako energy. ...and the land'll wither away. The Planet's gonna get weaker.
Dialogue: The Shinra believe that the Promised Land is full of Mako energy. Which means, if the Shinra get there, they'll suck up all the Mako energy. ...and the land'll wither away. The Planet's gonna get weaker.

Original: Barret: I can't just leave 'em be. I'm recruitin'new members!! Me, Tifa, Cloud... and Aeris too. How 'bout you?
Dialogue: I can't just leave 'em be. I'm recruitin'new members!! Me, Tifa, Cloud... and Aeris too. How 'bout you?

Original: Barret: You're so damn boring.
Dialogue: You're so damn boring.

Original: Red XIII: ............Grandpa.
Barret: Grandpa!? Ha, ha, ha...... Grandpa, hmm......ha, ha, ha......
Dialogue: Grandpa!? Ha, ha, ha...... Grandpa, hmm......ha, ha, ha......

Original: Red XIII: What's so funny?
Dialogue: What's so funny?

Original: Barret: Nothin'......ha, ha
Dialogue: Nothin'......ha, ha

Original: Aeris: Cloud, are you there?
Dialogue: Cloud, are you there?

Original: Cloud: Aeris!? You safe?
Dialogue: Aeris!? You safe?

Original: Aeris: Yeah, I'm all right. I knew that Cloud would come for me.
Dialogue: Yeah, I'm all right. I knew that Cloud would come for me.

Original: Cloud: Hey, I'm your bodyguard, right?
Dialogue: Hey, I'm your bodyguard, right?

Original: Aeris: The deal was for one date, right?
Dialogue: The deal was for one date, right?

Original: Tifa: ............oh, I get it.
Aeris: ...!? Tifa! Tifa, you're there too!
Dialogue: ...!? Tifa! Tifa, you're there too!

Original: Tifa: EXCUSE me.
Dialogue: EXCUSE me.

Original: Tifa: You know, Aeris. I have a question.
Dialogue: You know, Aeris. I have a question.

Original: Aeris: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Tifa: Does the Promised Land really exist?
Dialogue: Does the Promised Land really exist?

Original: Aeris: ...I don't know.
Dialogue: ...I don't know.

Original: Aeris: All I know is... The Cetra were born from the Planet, speak with the Planet, and unlock the Planet. And......then... The Cetra will return to the Promised Land. A land that promises supreme happiness.
Dialogue: All I know is... The Cetra were born from the Planet, speak with the Planet, and unlock the Planet. And......then... The Cetra will return to the Promised Land. A land that promises supreme happiness.

Original: Tifa: ...What does that mean?
Dialogue: ...What does that mean?

Original: Aeris: More than words......I don't know.
Dialogue: More than words......I don't know.

Original: Cloud: ...Speak with the Planet?
Dialogue: ...Speak with the Planet?

Original: Tifa: Just what does the Planet say?
Dialogue: Just what does the Planet say?

Original: Aeris: It's full of people and noisy. That's why I can't make out what they are saying.
Dialogue: It's full of people and noisy. That's why I can't make out what they are saying.

Original: Cloud: You hear it now?
Dialogue: You hear it now?

Original: Aeris: I, I only heard it at the Church in the Slums. Mother said that Midgar was no longer safe. That is...my real mother.
Dialogue: I, I only heard it at the Church in the Slums. Mother said that Midgar was no longer safe. That is...my real mother.

Original: Aeris: Someday I'll get out of Midgar... Speak with the Planet and find my Promised Land. ...That's what mom said. I thought I would stop hearing her voice as I grew up, but...
Dialogue: Someday I'll get out of Midgar... Speak with the Planet and find my Promised Land. ...That's what mom said. I thought I would stop hearing her voice as I grew up, but...

Original: Cloud: The door's open... When did it open?
Dialogue: The door's open... When did it open?

Original: Cloud: What's happened?
Dialogue: What's happened?

Original: Cloud: Tifa... Wake up!
Dialogue: Tifa... Wake up!

Original: Tifa: What's wrong?
Dialogue: What's wrong?

Original: Cloud: Something's wrong. Look outside.
Dialogue: Something's wrong. Look outside.

Original: Tifa: I wonder what happened...
Dialogue: I wonder what happened...

Original: Cloud: He should have the key on him...
Dialogue: He should have the key on him...

Original: Cloud: Come on, Tifa, get Aeris. I'll go help Barret and the others.
Dialogue: Come on, Tifa, get Aeris. I'll go help Barret and the others.

Original: Tifa: This's kinda eerie...
Dialogue: This's kinda eerie...

Original: Aeris: Must've been attacked by...
Dialogue: Must've been attacked by...

Original: Cloud: Barret, Red XIII ...come with me. Something's wrong.
Dialogue: Barret, Red XIII ...come with me. Something's wrong.

Original: Barret: How'd you get in? Why's the door open!?
Dialogue: How'd you get in? Why's the door open!?

Original: Barret: The hell's goin' on!?
Dialogue: The hell's goin' on!?

Original: Red XIII: No human could've done this.
Dialogue: No human could've done this.

Original: Red XIII: I'll go on ahead.
Dialogue: I'll go on ahead.

Original: Barret: I'll clean up back here, so you guys go ahead. And don't get caught by Shinra!
Dialogue: I'll clean up back here, so you guys go ahead. And don't get caught by Shinra!

Original: Tifa: Come on, let's follow Red XIII!
Dialogue: Come on, let's follow Red XIII!

Original: Cloud: ...Did it get away? Jenova...?
Dialogue: ...Did it get away? Jenova...?

Original: Red XIII: Jenova Specimen... Looks like it went to the upper floor using that elevator for the specimens.
Dialogue: Jenova Specimen... Looks like it went to the upper floor using that elevator for the specimens.

Original: Red XIII: It looks like it leads up...
Dialogue: It looks like it leads up...

Original: Barret: He's dead... The leader of Shinra, Inc. is dead...
Dialogue: He's dead... The leader of Shinra, Inc. is dead...

Original: Tifa: Then this sword must be...!?
Dialogue: Then this sword must be...!?

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth's!!
Dialogue: Sephiroth's!!

Original: Tifa: ...Sephiroth is alive?
Dialogue: ...Sephiroth is alive?

Original: Cloud: ...Looks like it. Only Sephiroth can use that sword.
Dialogue: ...Looks like it. Only Sephiroth can use that sword.

Original: Barret: Who cares who did it!? This is the end of the Shinra now!
Dialogue: Who cares who did it!? This is the end of the Shinra now!

Original: Palmer: Uh!
Dialogue: Uh!

Original: Palmer: P, p, p, please, don't kill me!
Dialogue: P, p, p, please, don't kill me!

Original: Cloud: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Palmer: Se...Sephiroth. Sephiroth came.
Dialogue: Se...Sephiroth. Sephiroth came.

Original: Cloud: Did you see him? Did you see Sephiroth?
Dialogue: Did you see him? Did you see Sephiroth?

Original: Palmer: Yeah, I saw him! I saw him with my own eyes!
Dialogue: Yeah, I saw him! I saw him with my own eyes!

Original: Cloud: You really saw him?
Dialogue: You really saw him?

Original: Palmer: Uh! Would I lie to you at a time like this!? And I heard his voice too!
Dialogue: Uh! Would I lie to you at a time like this!? And I heard his voice too!

Original: Palmer: Um, he was saying something about not letting us have the Promised Land.
Dialogue: Um, he was saying something about not letting us have the Promised Land.

Original: Tifa: Then what? Does that mean that the Promised Land really exists and that Sephiroth's here to save it from Shinra?
Dialogue: Then what? Does that mean that the Promised Land really exists and that Sephiroth's here to save it from Shinra?

Original: Barret: So he's a good guy then?
Dialogue: So he's a good guy then?

Original: Cloud: Save the Promised Land? A good guy? No way!! It's not that simple! I know him! Sephiroth's mission is different!
Dialogue: Save the Promised Land? A good guy? No way!! It's not that simple! I know him! Sephiroth's mission is different!

Original: Barret: Rufus! &*%$! I forgot about him!
Dialogue: Rufus! &*%$! I forgot about him!

Original: Tifa: Who's that?
Dialogue: Who's that?

Original: Barret: Vice President Rufus. The President's son.
Dialogue: Vice President Rufus. The President's son.

Original: Barret: I heard that he's been assigned somewhere else for a long time...
Dialogue: I heard that he's been assigned somewhere else for a long time...

Original: Tifa: I wonder what kinda person he is...
Dialogue: I wonder what kinda person he is...

Original: Aeris: I've heard that no one's ever seen him bleed or cry.
Dialogue: I've heard that no one's ever seen him bleed or cry.

Original: Red XIII: I only know his name.
Dialogue: I only know his name.

Original: Rufus: So... So Sephiroth was actually here. ...By the way.
Dialogue: So... So Sephiroth was actually here. ...By the way.

Original: Rufus: Who are you guys?
Dialogue: Who are you guys?

Original: Cloud: I'm Cloud, former SOLDIER First Class!
Dialogue: I'm Cloud, former SOLDIER First Class!

Original: Barret: I'm from AVALANCHE!
Dialogue: I'm from AVALANCHE!

Original: Tifa: Same here!
Dialogue: Same here!

Original: Aeris: ...a flower girl from the slums.
Dialogue: ...a flower girl from the slums.

Original: Red XIII: ...a research specimen.
Dialogue: ...a research specimen.

Original: Rufus: What a crew.
Dialogue: What a crew.

Original: Rufus: Well, I'm Rufus. The President of Shinra, Inc.
Dialogue: Well, I'm Rufus. The President of Shinra, Inc.

Original: Barret: You only President, 'cause yer old man died!
Dialogue: You only President, 'cause yer old man died!

Original: Rufus: That's right. I'll let you hear my new appointment speech.
Dialogue: That's right. I'll let you hear my new appointment speech.

Original: Rufus: ...Old man tried to control the world with money. It seems to have been working. The population thought that Shinra would protect them. Work at Shinra, get your pay. If a terrorist attacks, the Shinra army will help you. It looks perfect on the outside.
Dialogue: ...Old man tried to control the world with money. It seems to have been working. The population thought that Shinra would protect them. Work at Shinra, get your pay. If a terrorist attacks, the Shinra army will help you. It looks perfect on the outside.

Original: Rufus: But, I do things differently. I'll control the world with fear. It takes too much to do it like my old man. A little fear will control the minds of the common people. There's no reason to waste money on them.
Dialogue: But, I do things differently. I'll control the world with fear. It takes too much to do it like my old man. A little fear will control the minds of the common people. There's no reason to waste money on them.

Original: Tifa: He likes to make speeches just like his father.
Dialogue: He likes to make speeches just like his father.

Original: Cloud: Get outta this building with Aeris!
Dialogue: Get outta this building with Aeris!

Original: Barret: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Cloud: I'll explain later! Barret! This is the real crisis for the Planet!
Dialogue: I'll explain later! Barret! This is the real crisis for the Planet!

Original: Barret: The hell's that supposed to mean?
Dialogue: The hell's that supposed to mean?

Original: Cloud: I'll tell you later! Just take my word for it now! I'll go after I take care of him!
Dialogue: I'll tell you later! Just take my word for it now! I'll go after I take care of him!

Original: Barret: Awright, Cloud!
Dialogue: Awright, Cloud!

Original: Aeris: Cloud... I just thought of something.
Dialogue: Cloud... I just thought of something.

Original: Tifa: ...I'll wait for Cloud! Everyone, get to the elevator!
Dialogue: ...I'll wait for Cloud! Everyone, get to the elevator!

Original: Aeris: Hmm, it's going to get pretty ugly from here on. We should check on our equipment.
Dialogue: Hmm, it's going to get pretty ugly from here on. We should check on our equipment.

Original: On-screen: Cloud and Tifa's Materia...
Dialogue: Cloud and Tifa's Materia...

Original: On-screen: Access Menu with [Triangle] button Remove Materia from other members with [Square] End with the (START) button.
Dialogue: Access Menu with [Triangle] button Remove Materia from other members with [Square] End with the (START) button.

Original: Rufus: Why do you want to fight me?
Dialogue: Why do you want to fight me?

Original: Cloud: You seek the Promised Land and Sephiroth.
Dialogue: You seek the Promised Land and Sephiroth.

Original: Rufus: Hm, exactly.
Dialogue: Hm, exactly.

Original: Rufus: Mm? Did you know that Sephiroth is an Ancient?
Dialogue: Mm? Did you know that Sephiroth is an Ancient?

Original: Cloud: ...A lot has happened. Anyway, I can't let either you or Sephiroth have the Promised Land!
Dialogue: ...A lot has happened. Anyway, I can't let either you or Sephiroth have the Promised Land!

Original: Rufus: I see. I guess this means we won't become friends.
Dialogue: I see. I guess this means we won't become friends.

Original: Rufus: Heh, Heh, Heh...
Dialogue: Heh, Heh, Heh...

Original: Rufus: Heh... That's all for today...
Dialogue: Heh... That's all for today...

Original: Tifa: Where's Rufus?
Dialogue: Where's Rufus?

Original: Cloud: I couldn't finish 'em. Looks like this's gonna get complicated.
Dialogue: I couldn't finish 'em. Looks like this's gonna get complicated.

Original: Aeris: Quickly, we have to get out of here...
Dialogue: Quickly, we have to get out of here...

Original: Aeris: Quickly, we can escape this way...
Dialogue: Quickly, we can escape this way...

Original: Aeris: Quickly! We'll escape out this way......
Dialogue: Quickly! We'll escape out this way......

Original: Barret: I'll go on ahead!
Dialogue: I'll go on ahead!

Original: Barret: *&^%(*... surrounded, huh? If I was alone this wouldn't be a thang but, I gotta reputation to protect.
Dialogue: *&^%(*... surrounded, huh? If I was alone this wouldn't be a thang but, I gotta reputation to protect.

Original: Aeris: You all get out while you can. It's not you they're after... it's me.
Dialogue: You all get out while you can. It's not you they're after... it's me.

Original: Barret: Yeah, well that ain't happenin'. You got caught up in this over Marlene. Now, it's my turn to watch out for you!
Dialogue: Yeah, well that ain't happenin'. You got caught up in this over Marlene. Now, it's my turn to watch out for you!

Original: Barret: Ok, playtime's over for you jackasses...
Dialogue: Ok, playtime's over for you jackasses...

Original: Aeris: ...thank you, Mr. Barret!
Dialogue: ...thank you, Mr. Barret!

Original: Barret: Who you callin' Mr. Barret? That don't sound right!
Dialogue: Who you callin' Mr. Barret? That don't sound right!

Original: Red XIII: Well then... If you are through talking, may I suggest that we think of a way to get out of here.
Dialogue: Well then... If you are through talking, may I suggest that we think of a way to get out of here.

Original: Barret: Huh? Oh, oh yeah... You a cold man. Just like someone else 'round here I know.
Dialogue: Huh? Oh, oh yeah... You a cold man. Just like someone else 'round here I know.

Original: Red XIII: Did you say something?
Dialogue: Did you say something?

Original: Barret: Notta thing. So what're we gonna do?
Dialogue: Notta thing. So what're we gonna do?

Original: Tifa: Barret!!
Dialogue: Barret!!

Original: Barret: Tifa! Where's Cloud?
Dialogue: Tifa! Where's Cloud?

Original: Tifa: Everyone, over here!
Dialogue: Everyone, over here!

Original: Barret: Huh? What's up? Where's Cloud?
Dialogue: Huh? What's up? Where's Cloud?

Original: Tifa: I'll tell you later! Hurry, Hurry!!
Dialogue: I'll tell you later! Hurry, Hurry!!

Original: On-screen: Control the bike with the [Directional buttons] and save your friends in the truck from the Shinra Pursuit Troops.
Dialogue: Control the bike with the [Directional buttons] and save your friends in the truck from the Shinra Pursuit Troops.

Original: Barret: Well, what do we do now?
Dialogue: Well, what do we do now?

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth is alive. I ...I have to settle the score.
Dialogue: Sephiroth is alive. I ...I have to settle the score.

Original: Barret: And that'll save the Planet?
Dialogue: And that'll save the Planet?

Original: Cloud: ...Seems like it.
Dialogue: ...Seems like it.

Original: Barret: Awright, I'm going!
Dialogue: Awright, I'm going!

Original: Aeris: I'll go too. ...I have things that I want to find out.
Dialogue: I'll go too. ...I have things that I want to find out.

Original: Cloud: About the Ancients?
Dialogue: About the Ancients?

Original: Aeris: ......Many things.
Dialogue: ......Many things.

Original: Tifa: I guess this's good bye, Midgar.
Dialogue: I guess this's good bye, Midgar.

Original: Barret: We told Aeris's mom to go somewhere safe, so Marlene should be safe too.
Dialogue: We told Aeris's mom to go somewhere safe, so Marlene should be safe too.

Original: Aeris: She said she didn't want to stay in Midgar anymore. ...Maybe it's for the best.
Dialogue: She said she didn't want to stay in Midgar anymore. ...Maybe it's for the best.

Original: Aeris: Stop it, Cloud! I'm worried too.
Dialogue: Stop it, Cloud! I'm worried too.

Original: Aeris: You know what? This is the first time I've ever left Midgar...
Dialogue: You know what? This is the first time I've ever left Midgar...

Original: Aeris: A little,...no, maybe a lot. But I have my bodyguard, right?
Dialogue: A little,...no, maybe a lot. But I have my bodyguard, right?

Original: Aeris: I thought you'd say that!
Dialogue: I thought you'd say that!

Original: Tifa: ...I guess this is the start of our journey...
Dialogue: ...I guess this is the start of our journey...

Original: Tifa: ...I don't know. But, I don't have anywhere else to go. So I guess it doesn't really matter whether I like to travel or not.
Dialogue: ...I don't know. But, I don't have anywhere else to go. So I guess it doesn't really matter whether I like to travel or not.

Original: Tifa: ......Mmm. But you know, it should be all right if you keep your promise.
Dialogue: ......Mmm. But you know, it should be all right if you keep your promise.

Original: Red XIII: I'm going back to my hometown. I'll go with you as far as that.
Dialogue: I'm going back to my hometown. I'll go with you as far as that.

Original: Cloud: Then...
Dialogue: Then...

Original: Barret: We need a group leader for our journey. 'Course only me could be the leader.
Dialogue: We need a group leader for our journey. 'Course only me could be the leader.

Original: Tifa: You think so...?
Dialogue: You think so...?

Original: Aeris: It would have to be Cloud.
Dialogue: It would have to be Cloud.

Original: Barret: ^#$^%......awright. Go Northeast to a town called Kalm. If something happens, we'll meet up there.
Dialogue: ^#$^%......awright. Go Northeast to a town called Kalm. If something happens, we'll meet up there.

Original: Barret: 'Sides, we can't have 5 people strolling down the fields. It's too dangerous. Split us into 2 parties...
Dialogue: Sides, we can't have 5 people strolling down the fields. It's too dangerous. Split us into 2 parties...

Original: Aeris: ...Unexpected
Dialogue: ...Unexpected

Original: Tifa: ...combination.
Dialogue: ...combination.

Original: Tifa: Well, have fun with just the guys.
Dialogue: Well, have fun with just the guys.

Original: Barret: ...Thought you'd do that.
Dialogue: ...Thought you'd do that.

Original: Barret: Later, at Kalm!
Dialogue: Later, at Kalm!

Original: Tifa: We'll see you at Kalm!
Dialogue: We'll see you at Kalm!

Original: Barret: Hey Cloud. If we keep going, we'll never get to Kalm.
Dialogue: Hey Cloud. If we keep going, we'll never get to Kalm.

Original: Tifa: Hey, Cloud. Wasn't Kalm right before this cavern?
Dialogue: Hey, Cloud. Wasn't Kalm right before this cavern?

Original: Red XIII: ...We won't get to Kalm even if we go through these caverns.
Dialogue: ...We won't get to Kalm even if we go through these caverns.

Original: Barret: Yo, wassup? Can't SOLDIER-man even lead the way?
Dialogue: Yo, wassup? Can't SOLDIER-man even lead the way?

Original: Tifa: Kalm should be closer to Midgar.
Dialogue: Kalm should be closer to Midgar.

Original: Aeris: Cloud! Are you lost!?
Dialogue: Cloud! Are you lost!?

Original: Red XIII: If we're planning to meet at Kalm, we should go back and look for it again.
Dialogue: If we're planning to meet at Kalm, we should go back and look for it again.

Original: Barret: This is Kalm.
Dialogue: This is Kalm.

Original: Aeris: We've reached Kalm.
Dialogue: We've reached Kalm.

Original: Tifa: So this is Kalm?
Dialogue: So this is Kalm?

Original: Red XIII: ......looks like we've reached Kalm.
Dialogue: ......looks like we've reached Kalm.

Original: Barret: Yo, I'll be waitin' at the inn... Hurry up and get your butt over there!
Dialogue: Yo, I'll be waitin' at the inn... Hurry up and get your butt over there!

Original: Aeris: I wonder if everyone's there already. Let's hurry over to the inn!
Dialogue: I wonder if everyone's there already. Let's hurry over to the inn!

Original: Tifa: Everyone's waiting at the inn. Let's go Cloud.
Dialogue: Everyone's waiting at the inn. Let's go Cloud.

Original: Red XIII: We're supposed to meet at the inn. ......Shall we go?
Dialogue: We're supposed to meet at the inn. ......Shall we go?

Original: Barret: Get over here!
Dialogue: Get over here!

Original: Aeris: Well then, I'll go on ahead.
Dialogue: Well then, I'll go on ahead.

Original: Tifa: Let's go Cloud.
Dialogue: Let's go Cloud.

Original: Red XIII: Let's go Cloud.
Dialogue: Let's go Cloud.

Original: Cloud: Barret and the others are waiting for us at the inn.
Dialogue: Barret and the others are waiting for us at the inn.

Original: Innkeeper: Mr...... Cloud? Your party is waiting for you on the 2nd floor.
Dialogue: Mr...... Cloud? Your party is waiting for you on the 2nd floor.

Original: Aeris: Cloud, you're late!
Dialogue: Cloud, you're late!

Original: On-screen: Can't reach it...
Dialogue: Can't reach it...

Original: Barret: Yo man, you're late!
Dialogue: Yo man, you're late!

Original: Cloud: Sorry to keep you waiting.
Dialogue: Sorry to keep you waiting.

Original: Aeris: Guess everyone's here now.
Dialogue: Guess everyone's here now.

Original: Barret: So let's hear your story...... You know, the one about Sephiroth and the crisis facing the planet. Let's hear it all.
Dialogue: So let's hear your story...... You know, the one about Sephiroth and the crisis facing the planet. Let's hear it all.

Original: Cloud: ......I used to want to be like Sephiroth, so I joined SOLDIER. After working with Sephiroth on several missions, we became friends.
Dialogue: ......I used to want to be like Sephiroth, so I joined SOLDIER. After working with Sephiroth on several missions, we became friends.

Original: Barret: You call that a friend?
Dialogue: You call that a friend?

Original: Cloud: Yeah, well...... He's older than me, and he hardly ever talked about himself.
Dialogue: Yeah, well...... He's older than me, and he hardly ever talked about himself.

Original: Cloud: So I guess you'd call him a war buddy...... We trusted each other. Until one day......
Dialogue: So I guess you'd call him a war buddy...... We trusted each other. Until one day......

Original: Aeris: ...one day?
Dialogue: ...one day?

Original: Cloud: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.
Dialogue: After the war it was SOLDIER's duty to put down any resistance against the Shinra.

Original: Cloud: ......that was 5 years ago. I was 16......
Dialogue: ......that was 5 years ago. I was 16......

Original: Cloud: It sure is raining hard.
Dialogue: It sure is raining hard.

Original: Cloud: Hey, how are you doing?
Dialogue: Hey, how are you doing?

Original: NPC 1: I'm all right.
Dialogue: I'm all right.

Original: Cloud: I wouldn't know... I've never had motion sickness.
Dialogue: I wouldn't know... I've never had motion sickness.

Original: Cloud: Everything okay?
Dialogue: Everything okay?

Original: Sephiroth: Hey.
Dialogue: Hey.

Original: Sephiroth: Settle down.
Dialogue: Settle down.

Original: Cloud: They gave me some new Materia. I can't wait to use it.
Dialogue: They gave me some new Materia. I can't wait to use it.

Original: Sephiroth: ...just like a kid.
Dialogue: ...just like a kid.

Original: Cloud: You going to brief us about this mission?
Dialogue: You going to brief us about this mission?

Original: Sephiroth: ...this isn't a typical mission.
Dialogue: ...this isn't a typical mission.

Original: Cloud: Good!
Dialogue: Good!

Original: Sephiroth: Why do you say that?
Dialogue: Why do you say that?

Original: Cloud: I joined SOLDIER so I could be like you. But by the time I made First Class, the war was already over. My big hopes of becoming a hero like you ended with the war. That's why I always sign up whenever there's a big mission. Kind of a way to prove myself.
Dialogue: I joined SOLDIER so I could be like you. But by the time I made First Class, the war was already over. My big hopes of becoming a hero like you ended with the war. That's why I always sign up whenever there's a big mission. Kind of a way to prove myself.

Original: Cloud: Say, how do you feel, MISTER Sephiroth?
Dialogue: Say, how do you feel, MISTER Sephiroth?

Original: Sephiroth: ...I thought you wanted a briefing?
Dialogue: ...I thought you wanted a briefing?

Original: Sephiroth: Our mission is to investigate an old Mako reactor. There have been reports of it malfunctioning, and producing brutal creatures. First, we will dispose of those creatures. Then, we'll locate the problem and neutralize it.
Dialogue: Our mission is to investigate an old Mako reactor. There have been reports of it malfunctioning, and producing brutal creatures. First, we will dispose of those creatures. Then, we'll locate the problem and neutralize it.

Original: Cloud: Brutal creatures... Where?
Dialogue: Brutal creatures... Where?

Original: Sephiroth: The Mako Reactor at Nibelheim.
Dialogue: The Mako Reactor at Nibelheim.

Original: Cloud: Nibelheim... That's where I'm from.
Dialogue: Nibelheim... That's where I'm from.

Original: Sephiroth: Hmm... hometown...
Dialogue: Hmm... hometown...

Original: NPC 2: Sir... s, something strange just crashed into our truck!
Dialogue: Sir... s, something strange just crashed into our truck!

Original: Sephiroth: That would be our Monster...
Dialogue: That would be our Monster...

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth's strength is unreal. He is far stronger in reality than any story you might have heard about him.
Dialogue: Sephiroth's strength is unreal. He is far stronger in reality than any story you might have heard about him.

Original: Aeris: So... Where do you come in?
Dialogue: So... Where do you come in?

Original: Cloud: Me? I was mesmerized by the way Sephiroth fought.
Dialogue: Me? I was mesmerized by the way Sephiroth fought.

Original: Cloud: ......and then we reached Nibelheim.
Dialogue: ......and then we reached Nibelheim.

Original: Sephiroth: How does it feel? It's your first time back to your hometown in a long time, right? So how does it feel? I wouldn't know because I don't have a hometown...
Dialogue: How does it feel? It's your first time back to your hometown in a long time, right? So how does it feel? I wouldn't know because I don't have a hometown...

Original: Cloud: Ummm... how 'bout your parents?
Dialogue: Ummm... how 'bout your parents?

Original: Sephiroth: My mother is Jenova. She died right after she gave birth to me. My father...
Dialogue: My mother is Jenova. She died right after she gave birth to me. My father...

Original: Sephiroth: What does it matter...? All right, let's go.
Dialogue: What does it matter...? All right, let's go.

Original: NPC: Psst... (You keep wandering around here and you'll get in trouble.)
Dialogue: Psst... (You keep wandering around here and you'll get in trouble.)

Original: NPC: It's so boring, being on watch.
Dialogue: It's so boring, being on watch.

Original: Cloud: Shall we practice?
Dialogue: Shall we practice?

Original: NPC: Practice... oh, you mean practice my pose. Does someone in SOLDIER always have to be careful about what other people think? ...How did it go?
Dialogue: Practice... oh, you mean practice my pose. Does someone in SOLDIER always have to be careful about what other people think? ...How did it go?

Original: NPC: ...Was it like this?
Dialogue: ...Was it like this?

Original: Cloud: Good job!
Dialogue: Good job!

Original: NPC: I really don't want to be in SOLDIER.
Dialogue: I really don't want to be in SOLDIER.

Original: Cloud: I'll come and talk to you once in a while. Just stick with it.
Dialogue: I'll come and talk to you once in a while. Just stick with it.

Original: Sephiroth: The Mako smell is pretty bad here.
Dialogue: The Mako smell is pretty bad here.

Original: Barret (over narration): You wait a minute!! Isn't that, um...? The name of Sephiroth's mother...
Dialogue: You wait a minute!! Isn't that, um...? The name of Sephiroth's mother...

Original: Barret: I remember Jenova. That's that damn headless spook livin' in the Shinra building.
Dialogue: I remember Jenova. That's that damn headless spook livin' in the Shinra building.

Original: Cloud: That's right.
Dialogue: That's right.

Original: Tifa: Barret, would you please let us hear what Cloud has to say? You can ask questions later.
Dialogue: Barret, would you please let us hear what Cloud has to say? You can ask questions later.

Original: Barret: Tifa, I was only......
Dialogue: Tifa, I was only......

Original: Tifa: Okay Cloud, continue.
Dialogue: Okay Cloud, continue.

Original: Aeris: It's a reunion of childhood pals!
Dialogue: It's a reunion of childhood pals!

Original: Cloud: ......I was really surprised with Tifa.
Dialogue: ......I was really surprised with Tifa.
