Original: Cloud (narrating): ...The town was quiet. Everyone must be staying in their houses, afraid to come out because of the monsters. No, maybe they're afraid of us...
Dialogue: ...The town was quiet. Everyone must be staying in their houses, afraid to come out because of the monsters. No, maybe they're afraid of us...

Original: Sephiroth: We leave for the reactor at dawn. Make sure you get to sleep early.
Dialogue: We leave for the reactor at dawn. Make sure you get to sleep early.

Original: Sephiroth: All we need is one lookout, so you others, get some rest.
Dialogue: All we need is one lookout, so you others, get some rest.

Original: Sephiroth: Oh, that's right... You may visit your family and friends.
Dialogue: Oh, that's right... You may visit your family and friends.

Original: NPC: I heard Sephiroth was coming and got my camera ready. I want a shot of Sephiroth and a monster.
Dialogue: I heard Sephiroth was coming and got my camera ready. I want a shot of Sephiroth and a monster.

Original: NPC: I don't take pictures with nobodys.
Dialogue: I don't take pictures with nobodys.

Original: NPC: All right... So big-headed...
Dialogue: All right... So big-headed...

Original: NPC: Hey? This guy's a real...
Dialogue: Hey? This guy's a real...

Original: NPC: You... Are you Cloud? Really? So that's how it is, huh? Gosh, Cloud, you've grown up to be a nice-looking lad.
Dialogue: You... Are you Cloud? Really? So that's how it is, huh? Gosh, Cloud, you've grown up to be a nice-looking lad.

Original: NPC: Let's do this, Cloud. Let me take a picture of you with Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Let's do this, Cloud. Let me take a picture of you with Sephiroth.

Original: NPC: OK, OK,...... So big-headed... You're just his assistant
Dialogue: OK, OK,...... So big-headed... You're just his assistant

Original: NPC: Man... I'm so nervous.
Dialogue: Man... I'm so nervous.

Original: NPC: Look, you never know when a monster's gonna show up, right?
Dialogue: Look, you never know when a monster's gonna show up, right?

Original: NPC: ...That's right. Don't blow your chance to become a hero...
Dialogue: ...That's right. Don't blow your chance to become a hero...

Original: NPC: Welcome. Hey? Aren't you...
Dialogue: Welcome. Hey? Aren't you...

Original: Cloud (narrating): ...Have I come here before? ...I don't remember.
Dialogue: ...Have I come here before? ...I don't remember.

Original: Barret (over narration): Now you're pissin' me off!! This don't matter, so get on with it!
Dialogue: Now you're pissin' me off!! This don't matter, so get on with it!

Original: Cloud: This Mansion...
Dialogue: This Mansion...

Original: Cloud: ...No, I'll come here later.
Dialogue: ...No, I'll come here later.

Original: Tifa's father: Hmm? You from Shinra?
Dialogue: Hmm? You from Shinra?

Original: Tifa's father: Geez... Big-headed young kid.
Dialogue: Geez... Big-headed young kid.

Original: Tifa's father: I'm the town's... ...... ......!? Aren't you Cloud? Don't you know me?
Dialogue: I'm the town's... ...... ......!? Aren't you Cloud? Don't you know me?

Original: Cloud: You're Tifa's...
Dialogue: You're Tifa's...

Original: Tifa's father: Right. I'm Tifa's father.
Dialogue: Right. I'm Tifa's father.

Original: Tifa's father: ...I want you to stay away from my daughter. We don't need the Shinra's help to protect our town!
Dialogue: ...I want you to stay away from my daughter. We don't need the Shinra's help to protect our town!

Original: Cloud (narrating): This is...... my house. It has nothing to do with that incident five years ago.
Dialogue: This is...... my house. It has nothing to do with that incident five years ago.

Original: Barret (over narration): Yo wait, I wanna hear.
Dialogue: Yo wait, I wanna hear.

Original: Aeris (over narration): Me too! It's been a long time, right?
Dialogue: Me too! It's been a long time, right?

Original: Barret (over narration): Tell us more! You saw your family, right?
Dialogue: Tell us more! You saw your family, right?

Original: Barret (over narration): Well I ain't gonna force ya...
Dialogue: Well I ain't gonna force ya...

Original: Cloud (narrating): I don't know if you could call it a 'family'...... My father... died when I was still very young. That's why my mom...... was living alone in this house.
Dialogue: I don't know if you could call it a 'family'...... My father... died when I was still very young. That's why my mom...... was living alone in this house.

Original: Cloud (over narration): Yeah, I saw my mom. My mom... she was a vibrant woman. Hadn't changed at all. But a few days later, she died... But when I saw her, she looked fine.
Dialogue: Yeah, I saw my mom. My mom... she was a vibrant woman. Hadn't changed at all. But a few days later, she died... But when I saw her, she looked fine.

Original: Cloud: Uh...?
Cloud's mom: Ye----s?
Cloud's mom: Cloud!? Welcome home, Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!? Welcome home, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: Hi, mom.
Dialogue: Hi, mom.

Original: Cloud's mom: Come, come... Let me take a look at you!
Dialogue: Come, come... Let me take a look at you!

Original: Cloud's mom: Hmmm...... You look so handsome. So this is a SOLDIER uniform?
Dialogue: Hmmm...... You look so handsome. So this is a SOLDIER uniform?

Original: Cloud: ......Mom, I...
Cloud's mom: My, how you've grown. I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.
Dialogue: My, how you've grown. I'll bet the girls never leave you alone.

Original: Cloud: ...Not really.
Dialogue: ...Not really.

Original: Cloud's mom: ...I'm worried about you. There are a lot of temptations in the city... I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down and had a nice girlfriend.
Dialogue: ...I'm worried about you. There are a lot of temptations in the city... I'd feel a lot better if you just settled down and had a nice girlfriend.

Original: Cloud: ...I'm all right.
Dialogue: ...I'm all right.

Original: Cloud's mom: You should have... an older girlfriend, one that'll take care of you. I think that would be the perfect type for you.
Dialogue: You should have... an older girlfriend, one that'll take care of you. I think that would be the perfect type for you.

Original: Cloud: ......I'm not interested.
Dialogue: ......I'm not interested.

Original: Cloud's mom: Are you eating right?
Dialogue: Are you eating right?

Original: Cloud: I'm all right. The Company takes care of me.
Dialogue: I'm all right. The Company takes care of me.

Original: Cloud's mom: Is that so? You can't cook, right? I was worried sick about how you were doing...
Dialogue: Is that so? You can't cook, right? I was worried sick about how you were doing...

Original: Cloud's mom: Cloud...?
Dialogue: Cloud...?

Original: Cloud's mom: You know, Cloud......
Dialogue: You know, Cloud......

Original: Cloud's mom: ......isn't that right, Cloud?
Dialogue: ......isn't that right, Cloud?

Original: Cloud's mom: I will always be your mother...
Dialogue: I will always be your mother...

Original: Cloud (narrating): ......Let's stop this......
Dialogue: ......Let's stop this......

Original: Cloud (narrating): Hey... I can't... remember much else. There's... nothing more to talk about.
Dialogue: Hey... I can't... remember much else. There's... nothing more to talk about.

Original: Aeris (over narration): That's all right, Cloud.
Dialogue: That's all right, Cloud.

Original: Tifa (over narration): Cloud...? Did you go into my house?
Dialogue: Cloud...? Did you go into my house?

Original: Cloud (narrating): I thought you might be home.
Dialogue: I thought you might be home.

Original: Cloud (narrating): I remember you weren't there.
Dialogue: I remember you weren't there.

Original: Tifa (over narration): Cloud...? Did you go into my room?
Dialogue: Cloud...? Did you go into my room?

Original: Tifa (over narration): Did you play my piano?
Dialogue: Did you play my piano?

Original: Cloud: ...Now how did this go?
Dialogue: ...Now how did this go?

Original: On-screen: It was Start button to finish.
Dialogue: It was Start button to finish.

Original: Cloud: I've heard this melody somewhere before. Managed to play well...
Dialogue: I've heard this melody somewhere before. Managed to play well...

Original: Cloud: I can read sheet music too, you know...... Ummm, let's see......
Dialogue: I can read sheet music too, you know...... Ummm, let's see......

Original: Cloud: Do... Re... Mi... Ti... La... Do... Re... Mi... So... Fa.. Do.. Re... Do... Forget...
Dialogue: Do... Re... Mi... Ti... La... Do... Re... Mi... So... Fa.. Do.. Re... Do... Forget...

Original: Cloud (narrating): The letter...
Dialogue: The letter...

Original: Tifa (over narration): Did you read it? My letter?
Dialogue: Did you read it? My letter?

Original: Tifa (over narration): Of course!
Dialogue: Of course!

Original: Tifa (over narration): Do you remember what it said...?
Dialogue: Do you remember what it said...?

Original: Tifa (over narration): Then, let's go on with the story about Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Then, let's go on with the story about Sephiroth.

Original: Cloud (over narration): I read it... It was a letter addressed to Tifa from the son of the guy that runs the General Store...
Dialogue: I read it... It was a letter addressed to Tifa from the son of the guy that runs the General Store...

Original: On-screen: Tifa, how are you? I just arrived in Midgar eight days ago. Yesterday, all of Nibelheim got together to welcome me. The only person that we couldn't get a hold of was Cloud. But everyone said he wasn't really that close to us. So even if we asked, he probably wouldn't have come anyway.
Dialogue: Tifa, how are you? I just arrived in Midgar eight days ago. Yesterday, all of Nibelheim got together to welcome me. The only person that we couldn't get a hold of was Cloud. But everyone said he wasn't really that close to us. So even if we asked, he probably wouldn't have come anyway.

Original: On-screen: Well, enough about him. Midgar is really something. But to tell the truth, I feel so behind on everything... so out of it. Even the rooms of people in the slums are clean. Right now I'm living in the slums, but I plan to move to a really nice room, like the ones I've seen in magazines, once I make some money. ...but, to do that, I guess I have to find a job first.
Dialogue: Well, enough about him. Midgar is really something. But to tell the truth, I feel so behind on everything... so out of it. Even the rooms of people in the slums are clean. Right now I'm living in the slums, but I plan to move to a really nice room, like the ones I've seen in magazines, once I make some money. ...but, to do that, I guess I have to find a job first.

Original: On-screen: That's right. I still haven't found a job yet. I lied to my parents and told them I found a great job with Shinra, Inc. I wonder if it's too late to go back. Sometimes I think I should've taken over my parents' store.
Dialogue: That's right. I still haven't found a job yet. I lied to my parents and told them I found a great job with Shinra, Inc. I wonder if it's too late to go back. Sometimes I think I should've taken over my parents' store.

Original: Tifa (over narration): Cloud... Do you remember all of it?
Dialogue: Cloud... Do you remember all of it?

Original: Tifa (over narration): Then, let's go on with the story about Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Then, let's go on with the story about Sephiroth.

Original: Tifa (over narration): Because there was some stuff about me...
Dialogue: Because there was some stuff about me...

Original: On-screen: I just made it here to Midgar but all I think about is Nibelheim. Hey, Tifa... Is that stupid old water tower still working? Is the old man at the Inn doing well? Are my parents still at the shop everyday? Have any monsters attacked? And most of all, how are you, Tifa? It feels like I haven't seen you for years.
Dialogue: I just made it here to Midgar but all I think about is Nibelheim. Hey, Tifa... Is that stupid old water tower still working? Is the old man at the Inn doing well? Are my parents still at the shop everyday? Have any monsters attacked? And most of all, how are you, Tifa? It feels like I haven't seen you for years.

Original: On-screen: We were all talking about you last night. Everyone likes you. But because everyone idolizes you, I couldn't very well stab them in the back. I always acted cool, but actually, I was just afraid of being jilted. Wow, if I keep writing like this, this'll become a love letter! So, I think I'll stop here. Take care. I'll write again. P.S. Write me back, okay?
Dialogue: We were all talking about you last night. Everyone likes you. But because everyone idolizes you, I couldn't very well stab them in the back. I always acted cool, but actually, I was just afraid of being jilted. Wow, if I keep writing like this, this'll become a love letter! So, I think I'll stop here. Take care. I'll write again. P.S. Write me back, okay?

Original: On-screen: Received "Orthopedic Underwear!"
Dialogue: Received "Orthopedic Underwear!"

Original: Tifa (over narration): Cloud!!!
Dialogue: Cloud!!!

Original: Tifa (over narration): ...Cloud. We're talking about something really important here.
Dialogue: ...Cloud. We're talking about something really important here.

Original: NPC 1: ...Oh, you're with the Shinra? Welcome.
Dialogue: ...Oh, you're with the Shinra? Welcome.

Original: NPC 1: Oh, I'm sorry! It's you, Cloud! I didn't recognize you.
Dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry! It's you, Cloud! I didn't recognize you.

Original: NPC 2: Shinra----?
Dialogue: Shinra----?

Original: NPC 3: Chinra---?
Dialogue: Chinra---?

Original: NPC 2: SOLDIER?
Dialogue: SOLDIER?

Original: NPC 3: Saltza?
Dialogue: Saltza?

Original: NPC 2: Are you going to kill the monsters?
Dialogue: Are you going to kill the monsters?

Original: NPC 3: ......are you going to?
Dialogue: ......are you going to?

Original: NPC 2: He's soooo cool!!
Dialogue: He's soooo cool!!

Original: NPC 3: Way cool!!
Dialogue: Way cool!!

Original: NPC 1: Cloud, you've grown to be a strong man.
Dialogue: Cloud, you've grown to be a strong man.

Original: NPC 2: Do your best.
Dialogue: Do your best.

Original: NPC 3: Do your best.
Dialogue: Do your best.

Original: NPC: So, what do you need, Cloud?
Dialogue: So, what do you need, Cloud?

Original: NPC: Yeah, he's upstairs.
Dialogue: Yeah, he's upstairs.

Original: NPC: It's all reserved for you Shinra people, so I don't mind. But, wouldn't you feel more comfortable staying at home?
Dialogue: It's all reserved for you Shinra people, so I don't mind. But, wouldn't you feel more comfortable staying at home?

Original: NPC: Now about the town... A lot of monsters have been appearing in the last 12 months. Other than that, there's not much change. Nothing much exciting happens in a little town like this. It was all right when they were building the reactor.
Dialogue: Now about the town... A lot of monsters have been appearing in the last 12 months. Other than that, there's not much change. Nothing much exciting happens in a little town like this. It was all right when they were building the reactor.

Original: NPC: ...while they were still building it. But once it was completed, it's been bad.
Dialogue: ...while they were still building it. But once it was completed, it's been bad.

Original: NPC: Anyhow we've got to get rid of the monsters... Then, we'll all be able to relax a little bit.
Dialogue: Anyhow we've got to get rid of the monsters... Then, we'll all be able to relax a little bit.

Original: (Upon talking to Zangan in the inn.)Zangan: ......Hmmmm
Dialogue: ......Hmmmm

Original: Zangan: Is Shinra here to get rid of the monsters?
Dialogue: Is Shinra here to get rid of the monsters?

Original: Cloud: And who are you?
Dialogue: And who are you?

Original: Zangan: I'm Zangan. I travel around the world teaching children martial arts. I have 128 students all over the world! In this town, a girl named Tifa is my student.
Dialogue: I'm Zangan. I travel around the world teaching children martial arts. I have 128 students all over the world! In this town, a girl named Tifa is my student.

Original: Cloud: Did you say Tifa?
Dialogue: Did you say Tifa?

Original: Zangan: Tifa has good sense. She'll be a powerful fighter.
Dialogue: Tifa has good sense. She'll be a powerful fighter.

Original: Zangan: I want to see some Shinra techniques. And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.
Dialogue: I want to see some Shinra techniques. And if you see anything you can use, you might want to incorporate some of my techniques.

Original: Zangan: Well, good luck.
Dialogue: Well, good luck.

Original: Cloud: What are you looking at?
Dialogue: What are you looking at?

Original: Sephiroth: ...This scenery...... I feel like I know this place.
Dialogue: ...This scenery...... I feel like I know this place.

Original: NPC: We're short one bed...
Dialogue: We're short one bed...

Original: Sephiroth: .........
Sephiroth: ...We have an early start tomorrow. You should get some sleep soon.
Dialogue: ...We have an early start tomorrow. You should get some sleep soon.

Original: Sephiroth: ...I'm not going to wake you up tomorrow.
Dialogue: ...I'm not going to wake you up tomorrow.

Original: Sephiroth: I've hired a guide to the Mako reactor. I've heard she's young, I hope we can rely on her...
Dialogue: I've hired a guide to the Mako reactor. I've heard she's young, I hope we can rely on her...

Original: NPC 1: Think they'd let me take a picture?
Dialogue: Think they'd let me take a picture?

Original: Tifa's father: If I knew this was going to happen, I would've made mountain climbing off limits...
Dialogue: If I knew this was going to happen, I would've made mountain climbing off limits...

Original: NPC 2: I was so nervous. I couldn't get any sleep...
Dialogue: I was so nervous. I couldn't get any sleep...

Original: NPC 3: ...Late again.
Dialogue: ...Late again.

Original: (Upon talking to Sephiroth in front of the exit to Mt. Nibel.)Sephiroth: Once the guide gets here, we're heading out.
Dialogue: Once the guide gets here, we're heading out.

Original: Tifa's father: Listen to me, Sephiroth. In case something happens...
Dialogue: Listen to me, Sephiroth. In case something happens...

Original: Sephiroth: ...Trust me.
Dialogue: ...Trust me.

Original: Tifa: I'll be all right, Dad! I have two men from SOLDIER with me.
Dialogue: I'll be all right, Dad! I have two men from SOLDIER with me.

Original: Tifa: I'm Tifa. Nice to meet you!
Dialogue: I'm Tifa. Nice to meet you!

Original: Cloud: Tifa! You're the guide?
Dialogue: Tifa! You're the guide?

Original: Tifa: That's right. I just happen to be the number one guide in this town.
Dialogue: That's right. I just happen to be the number one guide in this town.

Original: Cloud: It's too dangerous! I can't involve you in something like this!
Dialogue: It's too dangerous! I can't involve you in something like this!

Original: Sephiroth: Then there's no problem if you protect her.
Dialogue: Then there's no problem if you protect her.

Original: Sephiroth: ...Let's go.
Dialogue: ...Let's go.

Original: NPC: Ummm... Mr. Sephiroth! Please let me take one picture for a memento! Tifa, can you ask him for me too......?
Dialogue: Ummm... Mr. Sephiroth! Please let me take one picture for a memento! Tifa, can you ask him for me too......?

Original: NPC: Cheeeeese!
Dialogue: Cheeeeese!

Original: NPC: Great, thank you! I'll give each of you a copy once I get it developed!
Dialogue: Great, thank you! I'll give each of you a copy once I get it developed!

Original: Cloud (narrating): A Mako Reactor was built in Mt. Nibel. The cold air of the mountains of Nibel. It was no different...
Dialogue: A Mako Reactor was built in Mt. Nibel. The cold air of the mountains of Nibel. It was no different...

Original: Tifa's father: I hate myself for asking you this, but... Don't take your eyes off of Tifa! Hurry up and go back to her side!
Dialogue: I hate myself for asking you this, but... Don't take your eyes off of Tifa! Hurry up and go back to her side!

Original: Zangan: Oh? Did you come crying home?
Dialogue: Oh? Did you come crying home?

Original: Tifa: It gets harder from here! Follow me!
Dialogue: It gets harder from here! Follow me!

Original: Tifa: Uh... the bridge!!
Dialogue: Uh... the bridge!!

Original: Sephiroth: Everyone seems to be all right. Can we get back to where we were?
Dialogue: Everyone seems to be all right. Can we get back to where we were?

Original: Tifa: These caves are intertwined, just like an ant farm... Oh, and Sephiroth... There seems to be one person missing...
Dialogue: These caves are intertwined, just like an ant farm... Oh, and Sephiroth... There seems to be one person missing...

Original: Sephiroth: It may sound cold, but we've got no time to search for him. We can't go back now, so we must go on. We'll travel together from here.
Dialogue: It may sound cold, but we've got no time to search for him. We can't go back now, so we must go on. We'll travel together from here.

Original: Cloud: What's this?
Dialogue: What's this?

Original: Tifa: A mysteriously colored cave...
Dialogue: A mysteriously colored cave...

Original: Sephiroth: It must be the Mako energy. This mountain is especially abundant in it. That's why the Mako Reactor was built here.
Dialogue: It must be the Mako energy. This mountain is especially abundant in it. That's why the Mako Reactor was built here.

Original: Cloud: ...And what's this?
Dialogue: ...And what's this?

Original: Sephiroth: A Mako fountain. It's a miracle of nature.
Dialogue: A Mako fountain. It's a miracle of nature.

Original: Tifa: It's so beautiful...
Dialogue: It's so beautiful...

Original: Tifa: If the Mako Reactor continues to suck up the energy, this fountain will dry up too...
Dialogue: If the Mako Reactor continues to suck up the energy, this fountain will dry up too...

Original: Sephiroth: Materia. When you condense Mako energy, materia is produced. It's very rare to be able to see materia in its natural state.
Dialogue: Materia. When you condense Mako energy, materia is produced. It's very rare to be able to see materia in its natural state.

Original: Cloud: By the way... Why is it that when you use materia you can also use magic too?
Dialogue: By the way... Why is it that when you use materia you can also use magic too?

Original: Sephiroth: You were in SOLDIER and didn't even know that? ...the knowledge and wisdom of the Ancients is held in the materia. Anyone with this knowledge can freely use the powers of the Land and the Planet. That knowledge interacts between ourselves and the planet calling up magic...... or so they say.
Dialogue: You were in SOLDIER and didn't even know that? ...the knowledge and wisdom of the Ancients is held in the materia. Anyone with this knowledge can freely use the powers of the Land and the Planet. That knowledge interacts between ourselves and the planet calling up magic...... or so they say.

Original: Cloud: Magic...... a mysterious power...
Dialogue: Magic...... a mysterious power...

Original: Sephiroth: Ha, ha, ha!
Dialogue: Ha, ha, ha!

Original: Cloud: Did I say somethin' funny?
Dialogue: Did I say somethin' funny?

Original: Sephiroth: A man once told me never to use an unscientific term such as mysterious power! It shouldn't even be called 'magic'! I still remember how angry he was.
Dialogue: A man once told me never to use an unscientific term such as mysterious power! It shouldn't even be called 'magic'! I still remember how angry he was.

Original: Cloud: Who was that?
Dialogue: Who was that?

Original: Sephiroth: Hojo of Shinra, Inc. ... An inexperienced man assigned to take over the work of a great scientist. He was a walking mass of complexes.
Dialogue: Hojo of Shinra, Inc. ... An inexperienced man assigned to take over the work of a great scientist. He was a walking mass of complexes.

Original: Tifa: A Mako fountain... So this is where the knowledge of the Ancients is.
Dialogue: A Mako fountain... So this is where the knowledge of the Ancients is.

Original: Tifa: We finally made it. We sure took the long way though.
Dialogue: We finally made it. We sure took the long way though.

Original: Cloud: Tifa, you wait here.
Dialogue: Tifa, you wait here.

Original: Tifa: I'm going inside too! I wanna see!
Dialogue: I'm going inside too! I wanna see!

Original: Sephiroth: Only authorized people are allowed in. This place is full of Shinra's industrial secrets.
Dialogue: Only authorized people are allowed in. This place is full of Shinra's industrial secrets.

Original: Tifa: But!
Dialogue: But!

Original: Sephiroth: Take care of the lady.
Dialogue: Take care of the lady.

Original: Tifa: Mm, man! Better take real good care of me then!
Dialogue: Mm, man! Better take real good care of me then!

Original: Cloud: This is...... Jenova, right? The lock won't open...
Dialogue: This is...... Jenova, right? The lock won't open...

Original: Sephiroth: This is the reason for the malfunction. This part is broken. Cloud, close the valve.
Dialogue: This is the reason for the malfunction. This part is broken. Cloud, close the valve.

Original: Sephiroth: Why did it break...?
Dialogue: Why did it break...?

Original: Sephiroth: ...now I see, Hojo. But, even doing this, will never put you on the same level as Professor Gast. This is a system that condenses and freezes the Mako energy... that is, when it's working correctly. Now... what does Mako energy become when it's further condensed?
Dialogue: ...now I see, Hojo. But, even doing this, will never put you on the same level as Professor Gast. This is a system that condenses and freezes the Mako energy... that is, when it's working correctly. Now... what does Mako energy become when it's further condensed?

Original: Cloud: Uh, umm...... Oh yeah! It becomes a Materia.
Dialogue: Uh, umm...... Oh yeah! It becomes a Materia.

Original: Sephiroth: Right, normally. But Hojo put something else in there. ...Take a look.
Dialogue: Right, normally. But Hojo put something else in there. ...Take a look.

Original: Sephiroth: Look through the window.
Dialogue: Look through the window.

Original: Cloud: Wh... what is this!?
Dialogue: Wh... what is this!?

Original: Sephiroth: Normal members of SOLDIER are humans that have been showered with Mako. You're different from the others, but still human. But, what are they? They've been exposed to a high degree of Mako, far more than you.
Dialogue: Normal members of SOLDIER are humans that have been showered with Mako. You're different from the others, but still human. But, what are they? They've been exposed to a high degree of Mako, far more than you.

Original: Cloud: ...is this some kind of monster?
Dialogue: ...is this some kind of monster?

Original: Sephiroth: Exactly. And it's Hojo of Shinra that produced these monsters. Mutated living organisms produced by Mako energy. That's what these monster's really are.
Dialogue: Exactly. And it's Hojo of Shinra that produced these monsters. Mutated living organisms produced by Mako energy. That's what these monster's really are.

Original: Cloud: Normal members of SOLDIER? You mean you're different?
Dialogue: Normal members of SOLDIER? You mean you're different?

Original: Cloud: H... hey, Sephiroth!
Dialogue: H... hey, Sephiroth!

Original: Sephiroth: N... no...... ...Was I?
Sephiroth: ...Was I created this way too? Am I the same as all these monsters......
Dialogue: ...Was I created this way too? Am I the same as all these monsters......

Original: Cloud: ...Sephiroth.
Dialogue: ...Sephiroth.

Original: Sephiroth: You saw it! All of them... were humans...
Dialogue: You saw it! All of them... were humans...

Original: Cloud: Human!? No way!
Dialogue: Human!? No way!

Original: Sephiroth: ...I've always felt since I was small... That I was different from the others. Special, in some way. But... not like this...
Dialogue: ...I've always felt since I was small... That I was different from the others. Special, in some way. But... not like this...

Original: Cloud (narrating): Am I...... human? I didn't quite understand what Sephiroth was saying at that time. I was even more surprised by the fact that Shinra was producing monsters.
Dialogue: Am I...... human? I didn't quite understand what Sephiroth was saying at that time. I was even more surprised by the fact that Shinra was producing monsters.

Original: Cloud (narrating): The next day, Cloud wakes late and runs out to join Sephiroth and the two soldiers at the start of the mountain path, just past the mansion. A few of the townsfolk are hanging around, too.
Dialogue: The next day, Cloud wakes late and runs out to join Sephiroth and the two soldiers at the start of the mountain path, just past the mansion. A few of the townsfolk are hanging around, too.

Original: Barret: Damn, Shinra! The more I hear, the more I hate 'em!
Dialogue: Damn, Shinra! The more I hear, the more I hate 'em!

Original: Tifa: ......who would have ever thought the Mako Reactor held a secret like that.
Dialogue: ......who would have ever thought the Mako Reactor held a secret like that.

Original: Red XIII: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently. I think we should listen carefully to Cloud. Don't you think so Barret?
Dialogue: That would seem to explain the increase in the number of monsters recently. I think we should listen carefully to Cloud. Don't you think so Barret?

Original: Barret: (Why you talkin' to me!?)
Dialogue: (Why you talkin' to me!?)

Original: Barret: Yeah, mebbe so. Wanna take a breather here?
Dialogue: Yeah, mebbe so. Wanna take a breather here?

Original: Barret: ......I get it.
Dialogue: ......I get it.

Original: Barret: Hmph! Pokin' his damn nose in where it don't belong. Cloud! Why don't you finish that story?
Dialogue: Hmph! Pokin' his damn nose in where it don't belong. Cloud! Why don't you finish that story?

Original: Red XIII: (Phew......)
Aeris: Tifa... You were waiting outside then?
Dialogue: Tifa... You were waiting outside then?

Original: Tifa: ......Yes.
Cloud: We returned to Nibelheim. Sephiroth confined himself at the inn. He didn't even try to talk to me.
Dialogue: We returned to Nibelheim. Sephiroth confined himself at the inn. He didn't even try to talk to me.

Original: Tifa: Then all of a sudden he just disappeared, right?
Dialogue: Then all of a sudden he just disappeared, right?

Original: Cloud: We found him inside the biggest building in Nibelheim.
Dialogue: We found him inside the biggest building in Nibelheim.

Original: Tifa: The villagers used to call it Shinra mansion.
Dialogue: The villagers used to call it Shinra mansion.

Original: Cloud: Long ago, people from Shinra used to live in that mansion...
Dialogue: Long ago, people from Shinra used to live in that mansion...

Original: NPC: What's Sephiroth doing?
Dialogue: What's Sephiroth doing?

Original: Zangan: There's nothing that'll harm the town, right?
Dialogue: There's nothing that'll harm the town, right?

Original: Cloud:...Why do you ask?
Dialogue: ...Why do you ask?

Original: Zangan: The Shinra showed up to eliminate any information that could be an embarrassment to the company...
Dialogue: The Shinra showed up to eliminate any information that could be an embarrassment to the company...

Original: Zangan: you pick these things up when you travel as much as I do.
Dialogue: you pick these things up when you travel as much as I do.

Original: Cloud: It's Sephiroth. He would never do that.
Dialogue: It's Sephiroth. He would never do that.

Original: Zangan: ...Oh my. You sure do have faith.
Dialogue: ...Oh my. You sure do have faith.

Original: Tifa's father: Until we know that there's no danger, we're not moving.
Dialogue: Until we know that there's no danger, we're not moving.

Original: NPC: There's no sign of Sephiroth, but I know I saw him go into this room...
Dialogue: There's no sign of Sephiroth, but I know I saw him go into this room...

Original: Sephiroth: ...an organism that was apparently dead, was found in a 2000 year old geological stratum. Professor Gast named that organism, Jenova...
Dialogue: ...an organism that was apparently dead, was found in a 2000 year old geological stratum. Professor Gast named that organism, Jenova...

Original: Sephiroth: X Year, X Month, X Day. Jenova confirmed to be an Ancient... X Year, X Month, X Day. Jenova Project approved. The use of Mako Reactor 1 approved for use...
Dialogue: X Year, X Month, X Day. Jenova confirmed to be an Ancient... X Year, X Month, X Day. Jenova Project approved. The use of Mako Reactor 1 approved for use...

Original: Sephiroth: My mother's name is Jenova... Jenova Project... Is this just a coincidence?
Dialogue: My mother's name is Jenova... Jenova Project... Is this just a coincidence?

Original: Sephiroth: Professor Gast... Why didn't you tell me anything? ...Why did you die?
Dialogue: Professor Gast... Why didn't you tell me anything? ...Why did you die?

Original: Sephiroth: Let me be alone.
Dialogue: Let me be alone.

Original: Cloud (narrating): Sephiroth didn't come out of the Shinra Mansion... He continued to read as if he were possessed by something, and not once, did the light in the basement go out...
Dialogue: Sephiroth didn't come out of the Shinra Mansion... He continued to read as if he were possessed by something, and not once, did the light in the basement go out...

Original: NPC: Sephiroth seems different.
Dialogue: Sephiroth seems different.

Original: Sephiroth: Ha, ha, ha......
Dialogue: Ha, ha, ha......

Original: Sephiroth: Who is it!?
Dialogue: Who is it!?

Original: Sephiroth: Hmph... traitor.
Dialogue: Hmph... traitor.

Original: Cloud: Traitor?
Dialogue: Traitor?

Original: Sephiroth: You ignorant traitor. I'll tell you. This Planet originally belonged to the Cetra. Cetra was a itinerant race. They would migrate in, settle the Planet, then move on... At the end of their harsh, hard journey, they would find the Promised Land and supreme happiness.
Dialogue: You ignorant traitor. I'll tell you. This Planet originally belonged to the Cetra. Cetra was a itinerant race. They would migrate in, settle the Planet, then move on... At the end of their harsh, hard journey, they would find the Promised Land and supreme happiness.

Original: Sephiroth: But, those that disliked the journey appeared. Those who stopped their migrations built shelters and elected to lead an easier life. They took that which the Cetra and the planet had made without giving back one whit in return! Those are your ancestors.
Dialogue: But, those that disliked the journey appeared. Those who stopped their migrations built shelters and elected to lead an easier life. They took that which the Cetra and the planet had made without giving back one whit in return! Those are your ancestors.

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth...
Dialogue: Sephiroth...

Original: Sephiroth: Long ago, disaster struck this planet. Your ancestors escaped... They survived because they hid. The Planet was saved by sacrificing the Cetra. After that, your ancestors continued to increase. Now all that's left of the Cetra is in these reports.
Dialogue: Long ago, disaster struck this planet. Your ancestors escaped... They survived because they hid. The Planet was saved by sacrificing the Cetra. After that, your ancestors continued to increase. Now all that's left of the Cetra is in these reports.

Original: Cloud: What does that have to do with you?
Dialogue: What does that have to do with you?

Original: Sephiroth: Don't you get it? An Ancient named Jenova was found in the geological stratum of 2000 years ago. The Jenova Project.
Dialogue: Don't you get it? An Ancient named Jenova was found in the geological stratum of 2000 years ago. The Jenova Project.

Original: Sephiroth: The Jenova Project wanted to produce people with the powers of the Ancients...... no, the Cetra. ...I am the one that was produced.
Dialogue: The Jenova Project wanted to produce people with the powers of the Ancients...... no, the Cetra. ...I am the one that was produced.

Original: Cloud: Pr... produced!?
Dialogue: Pr... produced!?

Original: Sephiroth: Yes. Professor Gast, leader of the Jenova Project and genius scientist, produced me.
Dialogue: Yes. Professor Gast, leader of the Jenova Project and genius scientist, produced me.

Original: Cloud: How... how did he...?
Dialogue: How... how did he...?

Original: Cloud: Se... Sephiroth?
Dialogue: Se... Sephiroth?

Original: Sephiroth: Out of my way. I'm going to see my mother.
Dialogue: Out of my way. I'm going to see my mother.

Original: Zangan: He---y! Is anyone here?
Dialogue: He---y! Is anyone here?

Original: Zangan: Hey it's you! You're still sane, right?
Dialogue: Hey it's you! You're still sane, right?

Original: Zangan: Then come over here and help me! I'll check this house. You check that one over there!
Dialogue: Then come over here and help me! I'll check this house. You check that one over there!

Original: NPC: ...Hey, Ummm... Am I going to die?
Dialogue: ...Hey, Ummm... Am I going to die?

Original: NPC: ...Sephi... roth
Dialogue: ...Sephi... roth

Original: Cloud: Terrible... Sephiroth... This is too terrible...
Dialogue: Terrible... Sephiroth... This is too terrible...

Original: Tifa: Papa... Sephiroth!?
Dialogue: Papa... Sephiroth!?

Original: Tifa: Sephiroth did this to you, didn't he!?
Dialogue: Sephiroth did this to you, didn't he!?

Original: Tifa: Sephiroth... SOLDIER... Mako Reactors... Shinra... Everything! I hate them all!
Dialogue: Sephiroth... SOLDIER... Mako Reactors... Shinra... Everything! I hate them all!

Original: Sephiroth: Mother, I'm here to see you. Please, open this door.
Dialogue: Mother, I'm here to see you. Please, open this door.

Original: Tifa: How could you do that to papa and all the townspeople?
Dialogue: How could you do that to papa and all the townspeople?

Original: Tifa: ...You promised... You promised that you'd come...... when I was in trouble...
Dialogue: ...You promised... You promised that you'd come...... when I was in trouble...

Original: Sephiroth: Mother, let's take this planet back together. I've thought of a great idea. Let's go to the Promised Land.
Dialogue: Mother, let's take this planet back together. I've thought of a great idea. Let's go to the Promised Land.

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth... My family! My hometown! How could you do this to them!?
Dialogue: Sephiroth... My family! My hometown! How could you do this to them!?

Original: Sephiroth: Ha, ha, ha...... They've come again, mother. With her superior power, knowledge, and magic, Mother was destined to become the ruler of this Planet.
Dialogue: Ha, ha, ha...... They've come again, mother. With her superior power, knowledge, and magic, Mother was destined to become the ruler of this Planet.

Original: Sephiroth: But they... Those worthless creatures are stealing the planet from Mother
Dialogue: But they... Those worthless creatures are stealing the planet from Mother

Original: Sephiroth: But now I'm here with you so don't worry
Dialogue: But now I'm here with you so don't worry

Original: Cloud: What about MY sadness!? My family... friends... The sadness of having my hometown taken away from me!? It's the same as your sadness!
Dialogue: What about MY sadness!? My family... friends... The sadness of having my hometown taken away from me!? It's the same as your sadness!

Original: Sephiroth: Ha, ha, ha... my sadness? What do I have to be sad about? I am the chosen one. I have been chosen to be the leader of this Planet.
Dialogue: Ha, ha, ha... my sadness? What do I have to be sad about? I am the chosen one. I have been chosen to be the leader of this Planet.

Original: Sephiroth: I have orders to take this planet back from you stupid people for the Cetra. What am I supposed to be sad about?
Dialogue: I have orders to take this planet back from you stupid people for the Cetra. What am I supposed to be sad about?

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth... I trusted you... No, you're not the Sephiroth I used to know!
Dialogue: Sephiroth... I trusted you... No, you're not the Sephiroth I used to know!

Original: Cloud: ......and that's the end of my story.
Dialogue: ......and that's the end of my story.

Original: Barret: Wait a damn minute! Ain't there more?
Dialogue: Wait a damn minute! Ain't there more?

Original: Cloud: ......I don't remember.
Dialogue: ......I don't remember.

Original: Aeris: What happened to Sephiroth?
Dialogue: What happened to Sephiroth?

Original: Cloud: In terms of skill, I couldn't have killed him.
Dialogue: In terms of skill, I couldn't have killed him.

Original: Tifa: Official records state Sephiroth is dead. I read it in the newspaper.
Dialogue: Official records state Sephiroth is dead. I read it in the newspaper.

Original: Aeris: Shinra, Inc. owns the paper, so you can't rely on that information.
Dialogue: Shinra, Inc. owns the paper, so you can't rely on that information.

Original: Cloud: ......I want to know the truth. I want to know what happened then. I challenged Sephiroth and lived. Why didn't he kill me?
Dialogue: ......I want to know the truth. I want to know what happened then. I challenged Sephiroth and lived. Why didn't he kill me?

Original: Tifa: ......I'm alive, too.
Dialogue: ......I'm alive, too.

Original: Aeris: Seems like a lot of this doesn't make sense. What about Jenova? It was in the Shinra building, right?
Dialogue: Seems like a lot of this doesn't make sense. What about Jenova? It was in the Shinra building, right?

Original: Cloud: Shinra shipped it from Nibelheim to Midgar.
Dialogue: Shinra shipped it from Nibelheim to Midgar.

Original: Aeris: Did someone else carry it out after that? It was missing from the Shinra building.
Dialogue: Did someone else carry it out after that? It was missing from the Shinra building.

Original: Tifa: Sephiroth......?
Dialogue: Sephiroth......?

Original: Barret: Damn! Don't none of this make sense! I'm going, going, going, gone! And I'm leavin' the thinkin' to you!
Dialogue: Damn! Don't none of this make sense! I'm going, going, going, gone! And I'm leavin' the thinkin' to you!

Original: Barret: Yo, Cloud! Let's get a move on!
Dialogue: Yo, Cloud! Let's get a move on!

Original: Barret: Cloud, what's wrong? You just gonna stand there while Sephiroth heads for the Promised Land? I ain't lettin' Sephiroth or Shinra get to no Promised Land. If they do, then we're all screwed. Y'know what I'm sayin'!
Dialogue: Cloud, what's wrong? You just gonna stand there while Sephiroth heads for the Promised Land? I ain't lettin' Sephiroth or Shinra get to no Promised Land. If they do, then we're all screwed. Y'know what I'm sayin'!

Original: Barret: Y'all jes leave it to me!
Dialogue: Y'all jes leave it to me!

Original: Cloud: Oh brother......
Dialogue: Oh brother......

Original: Barret: Fine! That's good enough.
Dialogue: Fine! That's good enough.

Original: Barret: Yo, c'mon let's go!
Dialogue: Yo, c'mon let's go!

Original: Cloud: Oh brother......
Dialogue: Oh brother......

Original: Tifa: ......... Cloud...? How bad was I when Sephiroth cut me?
Dialogue: ......... Cloud...? How bad was I when Sephiroth cut me?

Original: Cloud: I thought you were a goner. ......I was really sad.
Dialogue: I thought you were a goner. ......I was really sad.

Original: Aeris: I... The Ancients...... Cetra...... Jenova...... Sephiroth and myself......
Dialogue: I... The Ancients...... Cetra...... Jenova...... Sephiroth and myself......

Original: Tifa: Let's go. Barret's waiting.
Dialogue: Let's go. Barret's waiting.

Original: Red XIII: What a fascinating story......
Dialogue: What a fascinating story......

Original: Barret: Yo, Cloud. Here.
Dialogue: Yo, Cloud. Here.

Original: Aeris: Cloud. Take this.
Dialogue: Cloud. Take this.

Original: Tifa: Oh, Cloud. Let me give you this.
Dialogue: Oh, Cloud. Let me give you this.

Original: On-screen: Received "PHS"!
Dialogue: Received "PHS"!

Original: On-screen: ( Changing party members ) Access the menu and select [PHS]. It can only be used on the World Map or at a Save Point.
Dialogue: ( Changing party members ) Access the menu and select [PHS]. It can only be used on the World Map or at a Save Point.

Original: Aeris: With [PHS], I can see you any time!
Dialogue: With [PHS], I can see you any time!

Original: Tifa: Just use [PHS], and you can contact any one of us easy.
Dialogue: Just use [PHS], and you can contact any one of us easy.

Original: Red XIII: [PHS], will put us in constant contact with each other.
Dialogue: [PHS], will put us in constant contact with each other.

Original: Barret: Awright then, we're outta here.
Dialogue: Awright then, we're outta here.

Original: Aeris: Well, I'll be going.
Dialogue: Well, I'll be going.

Original: Tifa: I'm going on ahead.
Dialogue: I'm going on ahead.

Original: Choco Bill: Thinking of crossing the marshes?
Dialogue: Thinking of crossing the marshes?

Original: Choco Bill: Hmm, then it'll probably be safer for you to get a Chocobo. That way you can zip through the marshes with the Chocobo. It's the only way to avoid being attacked by the Midgar Zolom.
Dialogue: Hmm, then it'll probably be safer for you to get a Chocobo. That way you can zip through the marshes with the Chocobo. It's the only way to avoid being attacked by the Midgar Zolom.

Original: Choco Bill: Midgar Zolom...? It's a serpent-like creature over 30 feet tall!! It picks up on footsteps that enter the marshes... And then, BAM!! It attacks!!!
Dialogue: Midgar Zolom...? It's a serpent-like creature over 30 feet tall!! It picks up on footsteps that enter the marshes... And then, BAM!! It attacks!!!

Original: Choco Bill: To avoid that, buy a Chocobo at the Choco Bill & Choco Billy Chocobo Farm. To purchase a Chocobo, please talk to my grandson. He's in the Chocobo stables at the far right end of the farm. By the way, there was another person heading towards the Marshes. Without a Chocobo, the Midgar Zolom probably got him. It was a man in a Black Cape.
Dialogue: To avoid that, buy a Chocobo at the Choco Bill & Choco Billy Chocobo Farm. To purchase a Chocobo, please talk to my grandson. He's in the Chocobo stables at the far right end of the farm. By the way, there was another person heading towards the Marshes. Without a Chocobo, the Midgar Zolom probably got him. It was a man in a Black Cape.

Original: Choco Bill: Hmm, then, I guess that's that.
Dialogue: Hmm, then, I guess that's that.

Original: Chole: Welcome.
Dialogue: Welcome.

Original: Choco Billy: Do you want a Chocobo?
Dialogue: Do you want a Chocobo?

Original: Cloud: Mmm......
Choco Billy: You old folks are out of luck!
Dialogue: You old folks are out of luck!

Original: Cloud: Old folks...?
Dialogue: Old folks...?

Original: Choco Billy: We're all out of Chocobos. I'm taking care of those ones out there for someone else. You know, if you really want a Chocobo, you should go out and catch one.
Dialogue: We're all out of Chocobos. I'm taking care of those ones out there for someone else. You know, if you really want a Chocobo, you should go out and catch one.

Original: Choco Billy: Want to know how to catch a Chocobo?
Dialogue: Want to know how to catch a Chocobo?

Original: Choco Billy: You see those claw prints out there? Wild Chocobo's will appear in those areas. But, if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They very cautious animals by nature.
Dialogue: You see those claw prints out there? Wild Chocobo's will appear in those areas. But, if you don't have 'Chocobo Lure' they won't come out. They very cautious animals by nature.

Original: Choco Billy: 'Chocobo Lure' is a type of materia which attracts Chocobos. If you equip this, they'll come to you. But, without it, they won't appear.
Dialogue: Chocobo Lure' is a type of materia which attracts Chocobos. If you equip this, they'll come to you. But, without it, they won't appear.

Original: Choco Billy: A wild Chocobo always appears with other monsters. But, you won't be able to catch it because of the monsters. That is why you must defeat the monsters first before you catch the Chocobo.
Dialogue: A wild Chocobo always appears with other monsters. But, you won't be able to catch it because of the monsters. That is why you must defeat the monsters first before you catch the Chocobo.

Original: Choco Billy: Also, wild Chocobos are really cautious. They'll run away from the slightest things. But, if you use 'Greens' They'll focus on that, and won't run away.
Dialogue: Also, wild Chocobos are really cautious. They'll run away from the slightest things. But, if you use 'Greens' They'll focus on that, and won't run away.

Original: Choco Billy: Whatever you do, don't make Chocobos angry. They're usually calm, but if you get them angry, you'll get hurt. Oh, and remember, once you get off a Chocobo, it'll escape.
Dialogue: Whatever you do, don't make Chocobos angry. They're usually calm, but if you get them angry, you'll get hurt. Oh, and remember, once you get off a Chocobo, it'll escape.

Original: Choco Billy: Well then, shall we get down to business? I'll sell you the 'Chocobo Lure' for 2000 gil, right now. You want it?
Dialogue: Well then, shall we get down to business? I'll sell you the 'Chocobo Lure' for 2000 gil, right now. You want it?

Original: Choco Billy: Thanks! It wouldn't hurt to buy some 'Greens' either. Oh, and how fast a Chocobo'll finish eating depends of what type of 'Greens' you feed them.
Dialogue: Thanks! It wouldn't hurt to buy some 'Greens' either. Oh, and how fast a Chocobo'll finish eating depends of what type of 'Greens' you feed them.

Original: Choco Billy: Mmmm, if you don't have it, you'll never catch one.
Dialogue: Mmmm, if you don't have it, you'll never catch one.

Original: Choco Billy: Oh, I'm so glad!
Dialogue: Oh, I'm so glad!

Original: Chole: Wasn't it really expensive? But don't be mad at my brother or Grandpa. Ever since dad and mom died, it's been like this...
Dialogue: Wasn't it really expensive? But don't be mad at my brother or Grandpa. Ever since dad and mom died, it's been like this...

Original: Cloud: Did Sephiroth... do this......?
Dialogue: Did Sephiroth... do this......?

Original: Barret: This Sephiroth guy's pretty strong, I'd say.
Dialogue: This Sephiroth guy's pretty strong, I'd say.

Original: Aeris: Our enemy is someone that could do this...?
Dialogue: Our enemy is someone that could do this...?

Original: Tifa: Amazing...
Dialogue: Amazing...

Original: Red XIII: It's a power that we should respect...
Dialogue: It's a power that we should respect...

Original: Rude: Just a second!
Dialogue: Just a second!

Original: Barret: Wh, who are you!?
Dialogue: Wh, who are you!?

Original: Aeris: By any chance, are you...?
Dialogue: By any chance, are you...?

Original: Tifa: Who are you?
Dialogue: Who are you?

Original: Red XIII: ...... I hoped I'd never see you again...
Dialogue: ...... I hoped I'd never see you again...

Original: Rude: Do you know who I am?
Dialogue: Do you know who I am?

Original: Rude: Well if you know, then this won't take long.
Dialogue: Well if you know, then this won't take long.

Original: Rude: ......I'm from the Turks. And don't you ever forget it.
Dialogue: ......I'm from the Turks. And don't you ever forget it.

Original: Rude: It's difficult to explain what the Turks do...
Dialogue: It's difficult to explain what the Turks do...

Original: Cloud: Kidnapping, right?
Dialogue: Kidnapping, right?

Original: Rude: To put it negatively... you could say that. ...But, that's not all there is to it, anymore.
Dialogue: To put it negatively... you could say that. ...But, that's not all there is to it, anymore.

Original: Elena: Sir! It's all right, Rude! I know you don't like speeches, so don't force it!
Dialogue: Sir! It's all right, Rude! I know you don't like speeches, so don't force it!

Original: Rude: ...Then Elena, explain.
Dialogue: ...Then Elena, explain.

Original: Elena: I'm the newest member of the Turks, Elena. Thanks to what you did to Reno, we're short of people. ...Although, because of that, I got promoted to the Turks, ...
Dialogue: I'm the newest member of the Turks, Elena. Thanks to what you did to Reno, we're short of people. ...Although, because of that, I got promoted to the Turks, ...

Original: Elena: In any case, our job is to find out where Sephiroth is headed. And to try and stop you every step of the way.
Dialogue: In any case, our job is to find out where Sephiroth is headed. And to try and stop you every step of the way.

Original: Elena: Wait a minute, it's the other way around... You're the ones that are getting in our way.
Dialogue: Wait a minute, it's the other way around... You're the ones that are getting in our way.

Original: Tseng: ...Elena. You talk too much.
Dialogue: ...Elena. You talk too much.

Original: Elena: Mr. Tseng!?
Dialogue: Mr. Tseng!?

Original: Tseng: No need to tell them about our orders.
Dialogue: No need to tell them about our orders.

Original: Elena: Sorry... Tseng.
Dialogue: Sorry... Tseng.

Original: Tseng: I thought I gave you other orders. Now go. Don't forget to file your report.
Dialogue: I thought I gave you other orders. Now go. Don't forget to file your report.

Original: Elena: Oh! Right! Very well, Rude and I will go after Sephiroth, who's heading for Junon Harbor!
Dialogue: Oh! Right! Very well, Rude and I will go after Sephiroth, who's heading for Junon Harbor!

Original: Tseng: ...Elena. You don't seem to understand.
Dialogue: ...Elena. You don't seem to understand.

Original: Elena: Oh! I'm, I'm sorry...
Dialogue: Oh! I'm, I'm sorry...

Original: Tseng: ...Go. Don't let Sephiroth get away.
Dialogue: ...Go. Don't let Sephiroth get away.

Original: Rude & Elena: Yes sir!
Dialogue: Yes sir!

Original: Rude: ...Reno said he wanted to see you after the injuries you gave him healed. He wants to show his affection for you all... with a new weapon.
Dialogue: ...Reno said he wanted to see you after the injuries you gave him healed. He wants to show his affection for you all... with a new weapon.

Original: Tseng: Well, then...
Dialogue: Well, then...

Original: Tseng: Aeris... Long time no see. Looks like you got away from the Shinra for a while, now that Sephiroth reappeared.
Dialogue: Aeris... Long time no see. Looks like you got away from the Shinra for a while, now that Sephiroth reappeared.

Original: Aeris: ...so what are you saying? That I should be grateful to Sephiroth?
Dialogue: ...so what are you saying? That I should be grateful to Sephiroth?

Original: Tseng: No... Well, I won't be seeing too much of you, so take care.
Dialogue: No... Well, I won't be seeing too much of you, so take care.

Original: Aeris: ...strange, hearing that from you.
Dialogue: ...strange, hearing that from you.

Original: Tseng: Well then, stay out of Shinra's way.
Dialogue: Well then, stay out of Shinra's way.

Original: Tseng: ...Where's Aeris? She's not with you?
Dialogue: ...Where's Aeris? She's not with you?

Original: Cloud: Aeris isn't with us. She's with the others.
Dialogue: Aeris isn't with us. She's with the others.

Original: Tseng: Oh... Then give her my regards.
Dialogue: Oh... Then give her my regards.

Original: Cloud: What happened to this town? It's so run-down...
Dialogue: What happened to this town? It's so run-down...

Original: NPC: HEY! This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator. Don't be snooping around here!!
Dialogue: HEY! This is Shinra, Inc.'s elevator. Don't be snooping around here!!

Original: Priscilla: He-y! Mr. Dolphin! My name is...... Pri-scil-la! Now you say it.
Dialogue: He-y! Mr. Dolphin! My name is...... Pri-scil-la! Now you say it.

Original: Priscilla: Who are you guys? Are you members of the Shinra, Inc.?
Dialogue: Who are you guys? Are you members of the Shinra, Inc.?

Original: Barret: No! You got it all wrong! We're fighting against the Shinra!
Dialogue: No! You got it all wrong! We're fighting against the Shinra!

Original: Tifa: No...stay calm...
Dialogue: No...stay calm...

Original: Aeris: No you're wrong! We have nothing to do with the Shinra.
Dialogue: No you're wrong! We have nothing to do with the Shinra.

Original: Red XIII: ...we don't get along well with the Shinra.
Dialogue: ...we don't get along well with the Shinra.

Original: Yuffie: Hey watch your mouth! We hate the Shinra!
Dialogue: Hey watch your mouth! We hate the Shinra!

Original: Cloud: ...that's how it is.
Dialogue: ...that's how it is.

Original: Priscilla: I don't believe you! Get out of here!
Dialogue: I don't believe you! Get out of here!

Original: Cloud: Great...
Dialogue: Great...

Original: Barret: Hey! Look at that!
Dialogue: Hey! Look at that!

Original: Tifa: Look at that!
Dialogue: Look at that!

Original: Aeris: What's that!?
Dialogue: What's that!?

Original: Red XIII: Hey! It's a monster!
Dialogue: Hey! It's a monster!

Original: Yuffie: Whoa, Gawd!
Dialogue: Whoa, Gawd!

Original: Priscilla: Be careful Mr.Dolphin!
Dialogue: Be careful Mr.Dolphin!

Original: Cloud: Hey! Hold on, we're coming!
Dialogue: Hey! Hold on, we're coming!

Original: (After defeating Bottomswell.)Cloud: This is bad... You don't think she's dead, do you?
Dialogue: This is bad... You don't think she's dead, do you?

Original: NPC: Priscilla!!
Dialogue: Priscilla!!

Original: NPC: Nope...she's not breathing...
Dialogue: Nope...she's not breathing...

Original: NPC: Hey, that's it! Young man, CPR, now!
Dialogue: Hey, that's it! Young man, CPR, now!

Original: Cloud: Mouth to mouth!?
Dialogue: Mouth to mouth!?

Original: Barret: C'mon Cloud.
Dialogue: C'mon Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Cloud, what are you going to do?
Dialogue: Cloud, what are you going to do?

Original: Aeris: Cloud, hurry!
Dialogue: Cloud, hurry!

Original: Red XIII: You know I can't.
Dialogue: You know I can't.

Original: Yuffie: Do it, Cloud!
Dialogue: Do it, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: But,... she's just a girl......
Dialogue: But,... she's just a girl......

Original: NPC: What? You don't know how? Come over here, I'll show you.
Dialogue: What? You don't know how? Come over here, I'll show you.

Original: Cloud: Guess I gotta do it...
Dialogue: Guess I gotta do it...

Original: NPC: Just take a deep breath, hold it in. Then breathe into her.
Dialogue: Just take a deep breath, hold it in. Then breathe into her.

Original: NPC: Hurry up and do it!
Dialogue: Hurry up and do it!

Original: On-screen: Push the
Dialogue: Push the

Original: Priscilla: Uh...ugh...
Dialogue: Uh...ugh...

Original: NPC: Hey hey! Priscilla, are you alright?
Dialogue: Hey hey! Priscilla, are you alright?

Original: NPC: Hey, come in for a while.
Dialogue: Hey, come in for a while.

Original: NPC: I heard what happened. You've done so much for Priscilla.
Dialogue: I heard what happened. You've done so much for Priscilla.

Original: NPC: You all must be tired. If you want to get some rest, stay here.
Dialogue: You all must be tired. If you want to get some rest, stay here.

Original: NPC: Make yourselves at home.
Dialogue: Make yourselves at home.

Original: Tifa: Take a rest?
Dialogue: Take a rest?

Original: Barret: I'm gonna relax for a while.
Dialogue: I'm gonna relax for a while.

Original: Aeris: Want to rest?
Dialogue: Want to rest?

Original: Red XIII: Shall we rest?
Dialogue: Shall we rest?

Original: Yuffie: Wanna rest?
Dialogue: Wanna rest?

Original: Cloud: Yeah...
Dialogue: Yeah...

Original: Cloud: Hmmm...
Dialogue: Hmmm...

Original: Grey text: ...That reminds me
Dialogue: ...That reminds me

Original: Cloud: You again? ...Who are you?
Dialogue: You again? ...Who are you?

Original: Grey text: ...You'll find out soon. ......But more importantly, 5 years ago...
Dialogue: ...You'll find out soon. ......But more importantly, 5 years ago...

Original: Cloud: 5 Years ago...Nibelheim?
Dialogue: 5 Years ago...Nibelheim?

Original: Grey text: When you went to Mt. Nibel then, Tifa was your guide, right?
Dialogue: When you went to Mt. Nibel then, Tifa was your guide, right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah...I was surprised.
Dialogue: Yeah...I was surprised.

Original: Grey text: But where was Tifa other than that?
Dialogue: But where was Tifa other than that?

Original: Cloud: ...I dunno.
Dialogue: ...I dunno.

Original: Grey text: It was a great chance for you two to see each other again.
Dialogue: It was a great chance for you two to see each other again.

Original: Cloud: ...You're right.
Dialogue: ...You're right.

Original: Grey text: Why couldn't you see each other alone?
Dialogue: Why couldn't you see each other alone?

Original: Cloud: ...I don't know. I can't remember clearly...
Dialogue: ...I don't know. I can't remember clearly...

Original: Grey text: Why don't you try asking Tifa?
Dialogue: Why don't you try asking Tifa?

Original: Cloud: ...Yeah.
Dialogue: ...Yeah.

Original: Grey text: Then, get up!
Dialogue: Then, get up!

Original: Tifa: Hey wake up. Wake up, Cloud!
Dialogue: Hey wake up. Wake up, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: Tifa... When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim, where were you?
Dialogue: Tifa... When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim, where were you?

Original: Tifa: ...We saw each other, right?
Dialogue: ...We saw each other, right?

Original: Cloud: The other time.
Dialogue: The other time.

Original: Tifa: No...it was 5 years ago. I don't remember. But, something seems strange outside. Cloud, come quick.
Dialogue: No...it was 5 years ago. I don't remember. But, something seems strange outside. Cloud, come quick.

Original: Tifa: Doesn't it seem a little strange? Everything getting so noisy all of a sudden...?
Dialogue: Doesn't it seem a little strange? Everything getting so noisy all of a sudden...?

Original: Aeris: I heard that girl regained consciousness.
Dialogue: I heard that girl regained consciousness.

Original: Barret: Seems like something's goin' on up there!
Dialogue: Seems like something's goin' on up there!

Original: Red XIII: Does this have something to do with the Shinra?
Dialogue: Does this have something to do with the Shinra?

Original: Yuffie: What's this loud music? It's giving me a headache!
Dialogue: What's this loud music? It's giving me a headache!

Original: Cloud: Are you all right now?
Dialogue: Are you all right now?

Original: Priscilla: Umm...thanks for helping...
Dialogue: Umm...thanks for helping...

Original: Priscilla: I'm sorry , I mistook you for one of those Shinra, Inc....
Dialogue: I'm sorry , I mistook you for one of those Shinra, Inc....

Original: Cloud: That's all right.
Dialogue: That's all right.

Original: Priscilla: I'll give you something SPECIAL!
Dialogue: I'll give you something SPECIAL!

Original: Priscilla: It's an amulet. Take good care of it, ok?
Dialogue: It's an amulet. Take good care of it, ok?

Original: On-screen: Received "Shiva" Materia!
Dialogue: Received "Shiva" Materia!

Original: Priscilla: It's at my house, so come by later to pick it up, ok?
Dialogue: It's at my house, so come by later to pick it up, ok?

Original: Barret: What's that music? It sure sounds lively.
Dialogue: What's that music? It sure sounds lively.

Original: Priscilla: I heard they're rehearsing the reception for the new Shinra president.
Dialogue: I heard they're rehearsing the reception for the new Shinra president.

Original: Barret: Rufus!? I gotta pay my respects.
Dialogue: Rufus!? I gotta pay my respects.

Original: Priscilla: Grandpa and grandma told me this beach was beautiful when they were small. But after the Shinra built that city above, the sun stopped shining here, and the water got polluted... I was raised on that story and hate Shinra so much, I could die!
Dialogue: Grandpa and grandma told me this beach was beautiful when they were small. But after the Shinra built that city above, the sun stopped shining here, and the water got polluted... I was raised on that story and hate Shinra so much, I could die!

Original: Aeris: You think Rufus is thinking about crossing the ocean from here, too? What? Does that mean Sephiroth already crossed the ocean?
Dialogue: You think Rufus is thinking about crossing the ocean from here, too? What? Does that mean Sephiroth already crossed the ocean?

Original: Red XIII: Cloud, didn't you finish Rufus off?
Dialogue: Cloud, didn't you finish Rufus off?

Original: Barret: We gotta get to the town up there... Mebbe we could climb the tower?
Dialogue: We gotta get to the town up there... Mebbe we could climb the tower?

Original: Priscilla: No! No! There's a high voltage current running underneath the tower. Don't wander near it, it's dangerous!
Dialogue: No! No! There's a high voltage current running underneath the tower. Don't wander near it, it's dangerous!

Original: Priscilla: But...you might be able to if Mr.Dolphin helps you. Follow me!
Dialogue: But...you might be able to if Mr.Dolphin helps you. Follow me!

Original: Tifa: High voltage tower...... I guess this means Cloud'll be all right.
Dialogue: High voltage tower...... I guess this means Cloud'll be all right.

Original: Aeris: Yeah, better leave it to Cloud!
Dialogue: Yeah, better leave it to Cloud!

Original: Red XIII: We're counting on you, Cloud
Dialogue: We're counting on you, Cloud

Original: Cloud: Hey!!
Dialogue: Hey!!

Original: Cloud: Wait a second!
Dialogue: Wait a second!

Original: Tifa: Don't you just hate this?
Dialogue: Don't you just hate this?

Original: Aeris: You're probably right.
Dialogue: You're probably right.

Original: Barret: Yeah, I'd like to take a good look at the new President of Shinra, Inc.!
Dialogue: Yeah, I'd like to take a good look at the new President of Shinra, Inc.!

Original: Red XIII: That looks like a Shinra soldier.
Dialogue: That looks like a Shinra soldier.

Original: Yuffie: Aren't you going to follow her?
Dialogue: Aren't you going to follow her?

Original: Priscilla: Wait a minute.
Dialogue: Wait a minute.

Original: Barret: Now ain't that something! I ain't never seen no Dolphin jump like that!
Dialogue: Now ain't that something! I ain't never seen no Dolphin jump like that!

Original: Priscilla: Pretty cool, huh? When I blow this whistle, Mr.Dolphin jumps for me.
Dialogue: Pretty cool, huh? When I blow this whistle, Mr.Dolphin jumps for me.

Original: Priscilla: Here!! This is for you, Cloud!
Dialogue: Here!! This is for you, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: A gift? What am I supposed to do with it!?
Dialogue: A gift? What am I supposed to do with it!?

Original: Priscilla: Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and Mr.Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!
Dialogue: Just go into the water, blow this whistle, and Mr.Dolphin'll jump you to the top of the pole!

Original: Cloud: Jump to the top of the pole?
Dialogue: Jump to the top of the pole?

Original: Priscilla: See that rod sticking out at the top? If you jump just right, you can climb to the top of the town.
Dialogue: See that rod sticking out at the top? If you jump just right, you can climb to the top of the town.

Original: Barret: Good luck Cloud! If you make it, we'll follow you!
Dialogue: Good luck Cloud! If you make it, we'll follow you!

Original: Barret: Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you. It'll break if it gets wet.
Dialogue: Whoa, I'll hold the PHS for you. It'll break if it gets wet.

Original: Priscilla: You wanna jump with Mr.Dolphin?
Dialogue: You wanna jump with Mr.Dolphin?

Original: Priscilla: Come back whenever you want to see Mr.Dolphin!
Dialogue: Come back whenever you want to see Mr.Dolphin!

Original: Priscilla: Did you drown? It gets deeper the farther you go out.
Dialogue: Did you drown? It gets deeper the farther you go out.

Original: Priscilla: There's high voltage running through the bottom of the tower. Don't go near it...
Dialogue: There's high voltage running through the bottom of the tower. Don't go near it...

Original: On-screen: Get out of the water?
Dialogue: Get out of the water?

Original: NPC: Hey! You still dressed like that!? Come 'ere!
Dialogue: Hey! You still dressed like that!? Come 'ere!

Original: NPC: Hey! Rookie!! Can't you hear me!! Come over here!
Dialogue: Hey! Rookie!! Can't you hear me!! Come over here!

Original: NPC: Here!! Get in the room!
Dialogue: Here!! Get in the room!

Original: NPC: Today's the big day when we welcome President Rufus! Hurry up and change!
Dialogue: Today's the big day when we welcome President Rufus! Hurry up and change!

Original: NPC: There's a uniform in the locker. Hurry and change!
Dialogue: There's a uniform in the locker. Hurry and change!

Original: Cloud: It's the Shinra uniform.
Dialogue: It's the Shinra uniform.

Original: Cloud: There's Shinra soldiers all around. Better not try anything dumb...
Dialogue: There's Shinra soldiers all around. Better not try anything dumb...

Original: NPC: Quit yappin'! Hurry up!
Dialogue: Quit yappin'! Hurry up!

Original: Cloud: Brings back memories...
Dialogue: Brings back memories...

Original: NPC: Quit yappin'! Hurry up!
Dialogue: Quit yappin'! Hurry up!

Original: Cloud: A Shinra uniform... I was so proud when I first put it on.
Dialogue: A Shinra uniform... I was so proud when I first put it on.

Original: Cloud: I wonder when it was... ...I couldn't stand wearing this thing anymore.
Dialogue: I wonder when it was... ...I couldn't stand wearing this thing anymore.

Original: NPC 1: Wow! You look good in it!
Dialogue: Wow! You look good in it!

Original: NPC 1: You remember the Greeting procedure, right!?
Dialogue: You remember the Greeting procedure, right!?

Original: NPC 1: ...the look on your face says you forgot. All right, I'll show you again! Do just like we do.
Dialogue: ...the look on your face says you forgot. All right, I'll show you again! Do just like we do.

Original: NPC 2: Commander!! We'll help too! This is how to do it!
Dialogue: Commander!! We'll help too! This is how to do it!

Original: NPC 3: We'll sing too!
Dialogue: We'll sing too!

Original: NPC 1: All right! Show 'em!!
Dialogue: All right! Show 'em!!

Original: NPC 2: Now, march!! This's the Welcoming March!
Dialogue: Now, march!! This's the Welcoming March!

Original: NPC 3: Then! I'll sing along with you!
Dialogue: Then! I'll sing along with you!

Original: NPC 3: Quietly--!! Aaaaah! Aaaaah! Hey, come on now. Now!
Dialogue: Quietly--!! Aaaaah! Aaaaah! Hey, come on now. Now!

Original: NPC 1: And...march--!! One, two...! Three, four!
Dialogue: And...march--!! One, two...! Three, four!

Original: Song (on-screen): Rufus--- Rufus Shinra----
Dialogue: Rufus--- Rufus Shinra----

Original: NPC 1: Got it!?
Dialogue: Got it!?

Original: NPC 1: All right! Once more!
Dialogue: All right! Once more!

Original: NPC 1: Good! Make sure you do well at the real parade!
Dialogue: Good! Make sure you do well at the real parade!

Original: NPC 4: Rufus has arrived! Preparation completed!
Dialogue: Rufus has arrived! Preparation completed!

Original: NPC 1: All right, show time! Don't disgrace yourselves!
Dialogue: All right, show time! Don't disgrace yourselves!

Original: NPC: Begin the Welcome Parade!
Dialogue: Begin the Welcome Parade!

Original: NPC: What? It's not time for our shift, yet. Just relax.
Dialogue: What? It's not time for our shift, yet. Just relax.

Original: Cloud: Uh...yea......
NPC 1: Oh...no...!! No one's here!
Dialogue: Oh...no...!! No one's here!

Original: NPC 1: Late---!?
Dialogue: Late---!?

Original: NPC 1: Hey! Rookie!! It's because you're running around like that!!
Dialogue: Hey! Rookie!! It's because you're running around like that!!

Original: NPC 2: Captain!! We'll take a short cut!
Dialogue: Captain!! We'll take a short cut!

Original: NPC 1: Right! Good idea. Get over here!!
Dialogue: Right! Good idea. Get over here!!

Original: NPC 1: Hey!! Don't get me any madder than I already am!
Dialogue: Hey!! Don't get me any madder than I already am!

Original: NPC 1: All right! You first!
Dialogue: All right! You first!

Original: NPC 1: I'll go first! Now you watch close and do as I do, rookie! Just sneak into the back of the line when you see an opening.
Dialogue: I'll go first! Now you watch close and do as I do, rookie! Just sneak into the back of the line when you see an opening.

Original: NPC 1: Now listen up! This parade's gonna be broadcast live on Shinra TV, around the world! If you look bad, the whole Junon army will look bad. Remember that and don't screw up!
Dialogue: Now listen up! This parade's gonna be broadcast live on Shinra TV, around the world! If you look bad, the whole Junon army will look bad. Remember that and don't screw up!

Original: NPC 1: OK! Jump in when I give you the sign!
Dialogue: OK! Jump in when I give you the sign!

Original: NPC 1: Just sneak in from the back! Don't mess up the row! And no matter what you do don't try to go in from the front!
Dialogue: Just sneak in from the back! Don't mess up the row! And no matter what you do don't try to go in from the front!

Original: NPC 1: All right!! Start marching!!
Dialogue: All right!! Start marching!!

Original: NPC 1: Charge--!!
Dialogue: Charge--!!

Original: NPC 1: No, what're you doing!?
Dialogue: No, what're you doing!?

Original: NPC 1: Hey!! Don't play around!
Dialogue: Hey!! Don't play around!

Original: NPC 1: Just GO! Then you just nonchalantly sneak in from the back! Make sure no one sees you!
Dialogue: Just GO! Then you just nonchalantly sneak in from the back! Make sure no one sees you!

Original: NPC 1: Hey!! Don't run away from me!
Dialogue: Hey!! Don't run away from me!

Original: (Upon joining the line, spoken throughout, where XXX is the number called by the soldier when the line must hold their weapon up.)NPC: Now!! XXX......!
Dialogue: Now!! XXX......!

Original: TV Producer: What the hell was that soldier doing?
Dialogue: What the hell was that soldier doing?

Original: AD: I don't know.
Dialogue: I don't know.

Original: TV Producer: Are the points up?
Dialogue: Are the points up?

Original: AD: This's terrible! Am...am I fired?
Dialogue: This's terrible! Am...am I fired?

Original: TV Producer: What!? You're FIRED!! Send that soldier a bomb or something!
Dialogue: What!? You're FIRED!! Send that soldier a bomb or something!

Original: On-screen: Received "Grenade"!
Dialogue: Received "Grenade"!

Original: AD: Well, it's so-so.
Dialogue: Well, it's so-so.

Original: TV Producer: Hmm... Better send that soldier something.

Dialogue: He disappeared right after that. There's a rumor going around that it was Sephiroth.

Dialogue: This lift goes to the Shinra section... Ever since that Black-caped murderer... But we can't use it because we're all on red alert.

Dialogue: President Rufus is being sent off at the port.

Dialogue: What is it? The elevator's out of order right now due to an inspection. You know, right under us, is a Submarine Dock and the Underwater Mako Reactor.

Original: NPC: Mako energy puts a lot of wear and tear on the machinery. A lot of problems can pop up. So it's necessary for close inspections and maintenance.
Dialogue: Mako energy puts a lot of wear and tear on the machinery. A lot of problems can pop up. So it's necessary for close inspections and maintenance.

Dialogue: Come on, forget about your job! Step right up!!

Dialogue: Oh, a Soldier! Welcome!

Dialogue: Mm...? You too? Then, take your mask off and come here. That's our rule.

Original: NPC: Hey, how could you do that!? Nobody woke me up! And I can't find the uniform I left in my locker, either. I wonder if I left it somewhere...
Dialogue: Hey, how could you do that!? Nobody woke me up! And I can't find the uniform I left in my locker, either. I wonder if I left it somewhere...

Original: NPC: Geez! Do you think this could be... what they call 'bullying?' Oh man, My future in the military, is pretty bleak.
Dialogue: Geez! Do you think this could be... what they call 'bullying?' Oh man, My future in the military, is pretty bleak.

Original: NPC: Mmm? I'm not going to the parade. The road to becoming SOLDIER First Class is very difficult.
Dialogue: Mmm? I'm not going to the parade. The road to becoming SOLDIER First Class is very difficult.

Original: NPC: Don't mind me. As a man with promise and future, I don't have any time to fool around like the rest of you.
Dialogue: Don't mind me. As a man with promise and future, I don't have any time to fool around like the rest of you.

Dialogue: The President's safety is secure because we're here.

Dialogue: Stay outta this.

Dialogue: The minute you think the job's boring, you guys start messing around.

Dialogue: Hey! Aren't you still on duty!? Look, I'm in no position to talk, but...

Dialogue: Don't become a delinquent worker like me.

Dialogue: All right! Now finish strong!! SPECIAL---!!

Dialogue: Looks like you need more practice. With things looking like this, you better be ready for pay cuts...

Dialogue: Received "Silver Glasses"!

Original: Heidegger: Gya haa ha...!! Here's a special bonus for you!! A token of the President's kindness! Don't forget it!
Dialogue: Gya haa ha...!! Here's a special bonus for you!! A token of the President's kindness! Don't forget it!

Original: Heidegger: Gya haa ha...!! Here's a special bonus for you!! A token of the President's kindness! Don't forget it!
Dialogue: Gya haa ha...!! Here's a special bonus for you!! A token of the President's kindness! Don't forget it!

Dialogue: Once the word gets out that Sephiroth's here, Cloud and his friends will show up, too.

Dialogue: We'll crush them as soon as we find them!

NPC 1: All right! Dismissed!

Dialogue: Hey, hurry. You're the last one.

Dialogue: How did you get here?

Dialogue: A dolphin gave me a ride. Priscilla remembered the dolphin after you climbed the pole. But, you mustn't be mad at her.

Dialogue: We'll cross the ocean, to the new continent.

Dialogue: ...even if we are wearing Shinra's uniforms...

Dialogue: I'm workin' hard already, and you still want me to do more?

Dialogue: The new President's probably the same. He's just gonna order us around anyway.

Dialogue: Hey, get to work! Both the new President Rufus and Heidegger are aboard this ship! If we do good, we could get promoted!

Dialogue: Geez... What chance for a promotion. The only one who's gonna benefit from this is the Chief, anyway. It has nothing to do with us workers.

Dialogue: All right! I'm going to show the new President what I'm made of!

Dialogue: Hey, Cloud. You have any 'Tranquilizers'?

Dialogue: Thanks... Gross...this is bitter.

Dialogue: ...unless it's an emergency get away from me.

Dialogue: Where are the others? I dunno. Aren't they hiding somewhere around here? How should I know...? Ugh......urk......

Dialogue: Umm......It's me Aeris.

Dialogue: Hey, Cloud. Did you see the Airship at Junon

Dialogue: ...I heard it was big, but I didn't expect it to be THAT big.

Original: Aeris: That was REALLY something. Hey, do you think I could get on it?
Dialogue: That was REALLY something. Hey, do you think I could get on it?

Original: Cloud: ...keep hoping.
Dialogue: ...keep hoping.

Original: Aeris: Wow! I'm really looking forward to it!
Dialogue: Wow! I'm really looking forward to it!

Original: Cloud: ...It's a Shinra weapon. We probably should've destroyed it.
Dialogue: ...It's a Shinra weapon. We probably should've destroyed it.

Original: Aeris: ...Hmm. But just once, I'd like to ride it.
Dialogue: ...Hmm. But just once, I'd like to ride it.

Original: Aeris: Let's ride the Airship together, OK? Promise, promise me!
Dialogue: Let's ride the Airship together, OK? Promise, promise me!

Original: Aeris: Just once, I'd like to ride that Airship.
Dialogue: Just once, I'd like to ride that Airship.

Dialogue: Hey, Cloud. Did you see Barret? I hope he's not doing anything stupid...

Dialogue: Yes sir! Everything quiet, sir!

Dialogue: ...But, you know what? I really hate this uniform. Uniforms, soldiers, war, I hate 'em all. They take away all the things and people you love... I wish they'd all disappear. Right, Cloud?
