Dialogue: You're right!

Original: Tifa: Uh, yes sir, I'll continue my watch sir! Hee hee...
Dialogue: Uh, yes sir, I'll continue my watch sir! Hee hee...

Dialogue: ...Cloud. Wearing those clothes seems to have changed you a little. Does it remind you of being in SOLDIER? I hope not...

Dialogue: Hey! What's wrong, kid? You got no pep! A seaman's gotta have umph!

Dialogue: I got just the perfect thing! 'Invisible Alpha'-- A super drink for seamen!! Just one'll rejuvenate you! Only 250 gil!

Original: NPC: Thanks! This is a necessity for a sailor. This is a must item for a sailor! Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Thanks! This is a necessity for a sailor. This is a must item for a sailor! Ha ha ha !

Dialogue: HP/MP Restored!

Dialogue: Hey! You don't have enough money!

Dialogue: Hey! Seamen shouldn't be so stingy!

Dialogue: Ey ey! Whattaya mean, 'missin'!?

Dialogue: President Rufus and his men are in the Bridge of the Ship. If they see you slacking, they'll bust you one!

Original: NPC: Oh man, we're almost to Costa del Sol. When I get there, I'm going to take a long overdue vacation. Maybe I'll go down to the beach and get a tan...
Dialogue: Oh man, we're almost to Costa del Sol. When I get there, I'm going to take a long overdue vacation. Maybe I'll go down to the beach and get a tan...

Original: Red XIII: ....... ......It's me. Red XIII.
Dialogue: ....... ......It's me. Red XIII.

Dialogue: I'm a little woozy, but I shouldn't get caught. Humans only look at appearances anyway. Anyway you look at it, I'd say I make a fine human being.

Dialogue: It's pretty hard standing on two feet...

Dialogue: Look, Cloud. It's Rufus and Heidegger. They're this close but we can't do a thing to 'em...

Original: Barret: Ummmm...... Gmmmmm...... How can he...... Goin' off laughin' like that? Because of him, Biggs...... Wedge...... Jessie......! Ggggggggh... Ggggh......! Ggggggghhh!!
Dialogue: Ummmm...... Gmmmmm...... How can he...... Goin' off laughin' like that? Because of him, Biggs...... Wedge...... Jessie......! Ggggggggh... Ggggh......! Ggggggghhh!!

Dialogue: God!! I can't take it anymore! I'm gonna settle things here and now......

Dialogue: Emergency alert! Reports of a suspicious character found! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found!

Dialogue: I repeat. Suspicious character found on board! Those not on detail, search the ship. Report when found!

Dialogue: Damn, did they find us!?

Original: Barret: Hey, that don't seem like us. Do they mean...Tifa and the others!?
Dialogue: Hey, that don't seem like us. Do they mean...Tifa and the others!?

Original: Barret: Get off your spikey butt and let's go, Cloud!
Dialogue: Get off your spikey butt and let's go, Cloud!

Dialogue: Everyone all right!?

Dialogue: You all right!?

Dialogue: Huh?

Dialogue: Everyone's here...right?

Dialogue: Hey, wait. You don't think that suspicious character is... Sephiroth!?

Original: Tifa: Really!?
Dialogue: Really!?

Original: Barret: How the hell am I supposed to know!?
Dialogue: How the hell am I supposed to know!?

Original: Cloud: ...Let's find out.
Dialogue: ...Let's find out.

Original: Red XIII: It's the most logical thing to do. Then, who's going to go?
Dialogue: It's the most logical thing to do. Then, who's going to go?

Original: Yuffie: N, not me... I don't even like Sephiroth anyway. And besid......ugh......urk......
Dialogue: N, not me... I don't even like Sephiroth anyway. And besid......ugh......urk......

Original: Cloud: ...... Sephiroth...... ......All right, let's go!
Dialogue: ...... Sephiroth...... ......All right, let's go!

Dialogue: I'm goin' too!

Dialogue: Take me with you!

Dialogue: Is it really Sephiroth......?

Dialogue: These clothes are too tight on me. Can I switch with you?

Dialogue: I told you...I don't want... to, ugh......urk......

Dialogue: Say, who are you? You're not a part of the crew.

Dialogue: Oh well, seamen never bother with details! How you feelin'!

Dialogue: ...the Engine Room... ...a suspicious......character... No......there's no way...... that......not a human...... That thing's not human......

Dialogue: I'm getting so confused... Cloud, explain what's happened so far.

Original: Aeris: Hmm... I don't get it. Hey, Cloud. Can you explain it to us?
Dialogue: Hmm... I don't get it. Hey, Cloud. Can you explain it to us?

Original: Red XIII: Hmm... The story's not that simple. Cloud, why don't you summarize what's happened so far?
Dialogue: Hmm... The story's not that simple. Cloud, why don't you summarize what's happened so far?

Original: Yuffie: So what's the story? Hey Cloud. Give us a quick run down.
Dialogue: So what's the story? Hey Cloud. Give us a quick run down.

Original: Cloud: ...I'll try, but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.
Dialogue: ...I'll try, but don't interrupt me while I'm explaining.

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth went off searching for the Promised Land, so he could become the ruler of the planet... That was 5 years ago. Then Sephiroth came back and killed President Shinra. And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.
Dialogue: Sephiroth went off searching for the Promised Land, so he could become the ruler of the planet... That was 5 years ago. Then Sephiroth came back and killed President Shinra. And then just now all of us saw Sephiroth.

Original: Cloud: He was carrying Jenova with him. ...This much I do know. He told me he wants to go to the Promised Land with his mother, Jenova.
Dialogue: He was carrying Jenova with him. ...This much I do know. He told me he wants to go to the Promised Land with his mother, Jenova.

Original: Cloud: ...I guess that's about it.
Dialogue: ...I guess that's about it.

Original: On-screen: Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.
Dialogue: Dock workers--We will be docking in Costa del Sol in 5 minutes. Prepare for docking.

Original: Barret: Whoa! We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.
Dialogue: Whoa! We'd best hurry and hide somewhere.

Original: Tifa: We should hide somewhere again.
Dialogue: We should hide somewhere again.

Original: Aeris: Maybe we shouldn't stay in here anymore...
Dialogue: Maybe we shouldn't stay in here anymore...

Original: Red XIII: I don't think it's wise to stay here any longer.
Dialogue: I don't think it's wise to stay here any longer.

Original: Yuffie: Phew... We're finally here... Now we gotta hide......
Dialogue: Phew... We're finally here... Now we gotta hide......

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth... is alive... The Promised Land... Does it really exist...?
Dialogue: Sephiroth... is alive... The Promised Land... Does it really exist...?

Original: Barret: Damn! Sure is hot here! But I sure feel better now that I can say good-bye to this sailor suit.
Dialogue: Damn! Sure is hot here! But I sure feel better now that I can say good-bye to this sailor suit.

Original: Barret: Yo listen up!! Y'all be sure to mingle like regular folks here!
Dialogue: Yo listen up!! Y'all be sure to mingle like regular folks here!

Original: Aeris: Oh, too bad. I liked Barret's sailor suit. He looked so cute.
Dialogue: Oh, too bad. I liked Barret's sailor suit. He looked so cute.

Original: Barret: ......What'ya mean "cute"?
Dialogue: ......What'ya mean "cute"?

Original: Tifa: Right...well, uh... Barret, why don't you use that sailor suit for pajamas? Right, Cloud?
Dialogue: Right...well, uh... Barret, why don't you use that sailor suit for pajamas? Right, Cloud?

Original: Cloud: Ahhh...... You look like a bear wearing a marshmallow.
Dialogue: Ahhh...... You look like a bear wearing a marshmallow.

Original: Barret: The hell's that supposed to mean!? This happens to be the most comfortable, so shu'up!
Dialogue: The hell's that supposed to mean!? This happens to be the most comfortable, so shu'up!

Original: Cloud: Remember, this isn't a vacation. We're here after Sephiroth. I'm going on ahead.
Dialogue: Remember, this isn't a vacation. We're here after Sephiroth. I'm going on ahead.

Original: Barret: Hmmph, Cloud. You're the one, who's always hangin' around wastin' time. I'm going to skip this resort!
Dialogue: Hmmph, Cloud. You're the one, who's always hangin' around wastin' time. I'm going to skip this resort!

Original: Red XIII: ...puff...puff... Would you kindly hurry? The heat here is drying my nose.
Dialogue: ...puff...puff... Would you kindly hurry? The heat here is drying my nose.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, mine, too!!
Dialogue: Yeah, mine, too!!

Original: Cloud: All right. We'll take a break and then head off. Don't wander too far off.
Dialogue: All right. We'll take a break and then head off. Don't wander too far off.

Original: Barret: I'll wander wherever I damn well want! Who made him the leader?
Dialogue: I'll wander wherever I damn well want! Who made him the leader?

Original: Red XIII: It looks like my mane got messed up. I'm going to rest somewhere cool.
Dialogue: It looks like my mane got messed up. I'm going to rest somewhere cool.

Original: Yuffie: Don't bother looking for me!
Dialogue: Don't bother looking for me!

Original: Tifa: I think I'll go swimming.
Dialogue: I think I'll go swimming.

Original: Aeris: Sounds good to me!
Dialogue: Sounds good to me!

Original: Aeris: Hmm? Cloud, are you thinking of anything in particular? Your cool exterior's cracking...
Dialogue: Hmm? Cloud, are you thinking of anything in particular? Your cool exterior's cracking...

Original: Aeris: Well then, let's go!
Dialogue: Well then, let's go!

Original: Aeris: Maybe I should get a tan for a change. Which do you like, Cloud?
Dialogue: Maybe I should get a tan for a change. Which do you like, Cloud?

Original: Aeris: Got it. I'll remember that.
Dialogue: Got it. I'll remember that.

Original: NPC: What a long boat ride that was!!
Dialogue: What a long boat ride that was!!

Original: Rufus: Hmmm...... Good work everyone......
Dialogue: Hmmm...... Good work everyone......

Original: Heidegger: Gya, Heh, heh..., ha!! Hurry up with that!
Dialogue: Gya, Heh, heh..., ha!! Hurry up with that!

Original: NPC: Yes, sir!!
Dialogue: Yes, sir!!

Original: Rufus: I heard Sephiroth was on board.
Dialogue: I heard Sephiroth was on board.

Original: Heidegger: ......Yes.
Rufus: And it seems Cloud and the others were on board, too.
Dialogue: And it seems Cloud and the others were on board, too.

Original: Heidegger: ......Yes.
Rufus: They all slipped through...... You messed up big this time, Heidegger.
Dialogue: They all slipped through...... You messed up big this time, Heidegger.

Original: Heidegger: I'm ashamed of myself.
Dialogue: I'm ashamed of myself.

Original: Rufus: Is that all you can do...? Give one word answers and apologize for everything?
Dialogue: Is that all you can do...? Give one word answers and apologize for everything?

Original: NPC: Ready for departure, sir!!
Dialogue: Ready for departure, sir!!

Original: Rufus: ......Do something. I'll be expecting results.
Dialogue: ......Do something. I'll be expecting results.

Original: Red XIII: Hm, that's interesting. It's not as if I'm doing this because I want to. You see, this tail of mine, moves quite independently of my will.
Dialogue: Hm, that's interesting. It's not as if I'm doing this because I want to. You see, this tail of mine, moves quite independently of my will.

Original: Red XIII: Grrr...... Grrrrr.........
Dialogue: Grrr...... Grrrrr.........

Original: Yuffie: Orders are taken at the counter.
Dialogue: Orders are taken at the counter.

Original: Yuffie: Ah, Cloud! Let me make a buck why don't you? I'm sellin' Materia. Why don't you buy some!?
Dialogue: Ah, Cloud! Let me make a buck why don't you? I'm sellin' Materia. Why don't you buy some!?

Original: Johnny: What's with YOU!!
Dialogue: What's with YOU!!

Original: Johnny: Hey, is it.........you? We were in SOLDIER, and childhood friends before that. You were such a playboy. And a $#&^ murderer!! Why can't I remember your name?
Dialogue: Hey, is it.........you? We were in SOLDIER, and childhood friends before that. You were such a playboy. And a $#&^ murderer!! Why can't I remember your name?

Original: Johnny: That's right. Long time no see. Do you remember me? That's okay. We'll just keep on like we don't know each other. I'm starting a new life in this town. A lot of things happened to us. Heh, I better stop my mumbling! I sure envy you all just living outside with the sky as your ceiling.
Dialogue: That's right. Long time no see. Do you remember me? That's okay. We'll just keep on like we don't know each other. I'm starting a new life in this town. A lot of things happened to us. Heh, I better stop my mumbling! I sure envy you all just living outside with the sky as your ceiling.

Original: Johnny: You think you're good enough to go around bragging about who you are? I don't wanna hear it! Heh, no more mumbling from me! From now on, I'm starting a new life!
Dialogue: You think you're good enough to go around bragging about who you are? I don't wanna hear it! Heh, no more mumbling from me! From now on, I'm starting a new life!

Original: NPC: I'm sorry about that. He's had some big shocks lately and is pretty depressed.
Dialogue: I'm sorry about that. He's had some big shocks lately and is pretty depressed.

Original: Johnny: Hurry up and get out of here! I'm happy like this. So keep out of my life. (Upon entering the Costa del Sol inn.)
Dialogue: Hurry up and get out of here! I'm happy like this. So keep out of my life. (Upon entering the Costa del Sol inn.)

Original: Barret: Uh uh!
Dialogue: Uh uh!

Original: Barret: Hmmm!?
Dialogue: Hmmm!?

Original: Barret: Marlene! You ok?......
Dialogue: Marlene! You ok?......

Original: Barret: Dad'll wear this when I go to see you.
Dialogue: Dad'll wear this when I go to see you.

Original: Barret: Uh uh!
Dialogue: Uh uh!

Original: Barret: Hey, yo!!! Someone's in here, awright!?
Dialogue: Hey, yo!!! Someone's in here, awright!?

Original: NPC: Uggh! I feel God awful! Oh!! You! Weren't you the one with that big sailor?
Dialogue: Uggh! I feel God awful! Oh!! You! Weren't you the one with that big sailor?

Original: Cloud: What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's the matter?

Original: NPC: Listen to this... All of a sudden, this big sailor just busts in here, and takes over the restroom. He's been in there moaning ever since. I don't know what I'm gonna do.
Dialogue: Listen to this... All of a sudden, this big sailor just busts in here, and takes over the restroom. He's been in there moaning ever since. I don't know what I'm gonna do.

Original: Cloud: I don't know.
Dialogue: I don't know.

Original: NPC: Wrong guy? It puts us in a bad situation. That guy's taken over the john. And he hasn't even paid his hotel bill yet. Ah......if you're checking in, would you please pay his bill, too?
Dialogue: Wrong guy? It puts us in a bad situation. That guy's taken over the john. And he hasn't even paid his hotel bill yet. Ah......if you're checking in, would you please pay his bill, too?

Original: Barret: Yo, Cloud! Still too early, ain't it?
Dialogue: Yo, Cloud! Still too early, ain't it?

Original: NPC: Come on now... He's a friend of yours......fibber.
Dialogue: Come on now... He's a friend of yours......fibber.

Original: NPC: What now? Call it a night? 200 gil a night.
Dialogue: What now? Call it a night? 200 gil a night.

Original: NPC: Shucks!! Too bad!
Dialogue: Shucks!! Too bad!

Original: NPC: Hey! Hey you! Does your friend have a cute lady? She came in here looking for him a while ago. Shouldn't you find her?
Dialogue: Hey! Hey you! Does your friend have a cute lady? She came in here looking for him a while ago. Shouldn't you find her?

Original: NPC: What are you going to do? Just forget about her and go to bed? 200 gil a night.
Dialogue: What are you going to do? Just forget about her and go to bed? 200 gil a night.

Original: NPC: You look like you can handle it. Well then......
Dialogue: You look like you can handle it. Well then......

Original: NPC: That's right. Don't worry. Please come by again.
Dialogue: That's right. Don't worry. Please come by again.

Original: Aeris: Oh! Cloud!!
Dialogue: Oh! Cloud!!

Original: Tifa: Look, look at that!
Dialogue: Look, look at that!

Original: Cloud: Hm...?
Cloud: Is that man over there, Hojo?
Dialogue: Is that man over there, Hojo?

Original: Tifa: Go over and talk to him.
Dialogue: Go over and talk to him.

Original: Cloud: Not a bad view......
Dialogue: Not a bad view......

Original: Tifa: What're you looking at? That man over there. That's Hojo from Shinra. Get outta here Go talk to him!
Dialogue: What're you looking at? That man over there. That's Hojo from Shinra. Get outta here Go talk to him!

Original: Tifa: Go over and talk to him.
Dialogue: Go over and talk to him.

Original: Aeris: I have a bad feeling about this.
Dialogue: I have a bad feeling about this.

Original: NPC 1: heh heh...... All the good ones are gone.
Dialogue: heh heh...... All the good ones are gone.

Original: NPC 2: What about that one? Shall we make do with her?
Dialogue: What about that one? Shall we make do with her?

Original: NPC 1: But she's got a guy with her.
Dialogue: But she's got a guy with her.

Original: NPC 2: No problem, I can handle him.
Dialogue: No problem, I can handle him.

Original: NPC 1: Right? You thought so, too?
Dialogue: Right? You thought so, too?

Original: NPC 2: Geez! What about those two?
Dialogue: Geez! What about those two?

Original: NPC 1: Heh heh......I want the one on the left.
Dialogue: Heh heh......I want the one on the left.

Original: NPC 1: Well then, I guess that leaves me with the one on the right.
Dialogue: Well then, I guess that leaves me with the one on the right.

Original: NPC: God!! What do you want?
Dialogue: God!! What do you want?

Original: NPC: (Hey, who do you think you are?)
Dialogue: (Hey, who do you think you are?)

Original: NPC: Professor Hojo. That scary man says he wants to talk with you.
Dialogue: Professor Hojo. That scary man says he wants to talk with you.

Original: NPC: (What's his problem?)
Dialogue: (What's his problem?)

Original: NPC: Yes, that's right. It's the Professor!
Dialogue: Yes, that's right. It's the Professor!

Original: NPC: Professor... someone's here to see you, sir.
Dialogue: Professor... someone's here to see you, sir.

Original: Hojo: I'm busy right now. ......But. Too bad.
Dialogue: I'm busy right now. ......But. Too bad.

Original: Hojo: No, I remember you all now......
Dialogue: No, I remember you all now......

Original: Hojo: Yes, yes. I remember now. It's been a long time, Cloud.
Dialogue: Yes, yes. I remember now. It's been a long time, Cloud.

Original: Hojo: Heh heh heh...... All right. You sure are loud. Long time no see, Cloud.
Dialogue: Heh heh heh...... All right. You sure are loud. Long time no see, Cloud.

Original: Cloud: Hojo......
Dialogue: Hojo......

Original: Hojo: Sometimes you just gotta do something like this.
Dialogue: Sometimes you just gotta do something like this.

Original: Cloud: ......What are you doing?
Dialogue: ......What are you doing?

Original: Hojo: It should be obvious, I'm getting a tan.
Dialogue: It should be obvious, I'm getting a tan.

Original: Cloud: Answer me!
Dialogue: Answer me!

Original: Hojo: Hmm! I believe we're both after the same goal.
Dialogue: Hmm! I believe we're both after the same goal.

Original: Cloud: You mean Sephiroth?
Dialogue: You mean Sephiroth?

Original: Hojo: Did you see him?
Dialogue: Did you see him?

Original: Hojo: I see......Ha! Ha!
Dialogue: I see......Ha! Ha!

Original: Cloud: What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: Hojo: Nothing. I just remembered a certain hypothesis...... Haven't you ever had the feeling something is calling you? Or that you had to visit some place?......
Dialogue: Nothing. I just remembered a certain hypothesis...... Haven't you ever had the feeling something is calling you? Or that you had to visit some place?......

Original: Cloud: I'll go anywhere Sephiroth is at! To beat him and put an end to all this!
Dialogue: I'll go anywhere Sephiroth is at! To beat him and put an end to all this!

Original: Hojo: I see...... This could be interesting. Were you in SOLDIER?......Heh heh heh! Would you like to be my guinea pig?
Dialogue: I see...... This could be interesting. Were you in SOLDIER?......Heh heh heh! Would you like to be my guinea pig?

Original: Hojo: Oh, now what? Are you going to draw your sword?
Dialogue: Oh, now what? Are you going to draw your sword?

Original: Barret: Yo, yo! It's a bad idea to kill him.
Dialogue: Yo, yo! It's a bad idea to kill him.

Original: Tifa: Stop, Cloud! I know how you feel, but you mustn't.
Dialogue: Stop, Cloud! I know how you feel, but you mustn't.

Original: Aeris: Cloud, don't. If he dies, we won't find out anything!
Dialogue: Cloud, don't. If he dies, we won't find out anything!

Original: Red XIII: ...huff...puff... Stop, Cloud!
Dialogue: ...huff...puff... Stop, Cloud!

Original: Yuffie: Knock it off, Cloud! Look I don't know, but he knows a lot of stuff, right?
Dialogue: Knock it off, Cloud! Look I don't know, but he knows a lot of stuff, right?

Original: Hojo: Ha! Ha! Ha!......
Dialogue: Ha! Ha! Ha!......

Original: Hojo: Say, aren't you the 'Ancient'?
Dialogue: Say, aren't you the 'Ancient'?

Original: Aeris: I'm Aeris. The least you can do is remember my name. I want you to tell me something, Professor Hojo... I know I'm an Ancient. My mother told me.
Dialogue: I'm Aeris. The least you can do is remember my name. I want you to tell me something, Professor Hojo... I know I'm an Ancient. My mother told me.

Original: Hojo: Your mother? Oh, you mean Ifalna. How is she?
Dialogue: Your mother? Oh, you mean Ifalna. How is she?

Original: Aeris: You didn't know!? She died.
Dialogue: You didn't know!? She died.

Original: Hojo: ......I see.
Aeris: Professor Hojo... Is Jenova an Ancient? Is Sephiroth an Ancient? Do we all have the same blood?
Dialogue: Professor Hojo... Is Jenova an Ancient? Is Sephiroth an Ancient? Do we all have the same blood?

Original: Hojo: ......mumble...mumble...head west......
Dialogue: ......mumble...mumble...head west......

Original: Aeris: He's mumbling slowly... That must means he's hiding something!
Dialogue: He's mumbling slowly... That must means he's hiding something!

Original: Red XIII: Grrr, Grrr......... ...huff...puff...
Dialogue: Grrr, Grrr......... ...huff...puff...

Original: Tifa: Hey! Answer us!!
Dialogue: Hey! Answer us!!

Original: Cloud: ......It's no use. It's no go.
Dialogue: ......It's no use. It's no go.

Original: Tifa: Oh, right! I remember that, too.
Dialogue: Oh, right! I remember that, too.

Original: Johnny: Yeah, yeah! And you remember the time when......?
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah! And you remember the time when......?

Original: Tifa: Hee, hee, hee!
Dialogue: Hee, hee, hee!

Original: Johnny: Ha, ha, ha!......
Dialogue: Ha, ha, ha!......

Original: Tifa: Ha, ha...oh stop it! That's right. Oh really......
Dialogue: Ha, ha...oh stop it! That's right. Oh really......

Original: Johnny: Yeah. Oh yeah, and then that time......
Dialogue: Yeah. Oh yeah, and then that time......

Original: Tifa: Yeah, yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah!

Original: Tifa: Cloud, would you mind leaving us alone for the day? We haven't seen each other for ages and sometimes it's fun to talk about old times for a change.
Dialogue: Cloud, would you mind leaving us alone for the day? We haven't seen each other for ages and sometimes it's fun to talk about old times for a change.

Original: Tifa: We'll try not to be too late. So please don't worry about us!
Dialogue: We'll try not to be too late. So please don't worry about us!

Original: Cloud: I'm not worried.
Dialogue: I'm not worried.

Original: Tifa: You're right......
Dialogue: You're right......

Original: Cloud: Just remember we're leaving early tomorrow.
Dialogue: Just remember we're leaving early tomorrow.

Original: Tifa: Ok, I know.
Dialogue: Ok, I know.

Original: Johnny: Yeah, so don't get mad or anything.
Dialogue: Yeah, so don't get mad or anything.

Original: Aeris: Whew... I don't know why I'm so tired. There's so many things I don't understand...... I feel a little uneasy.
Dialogue: Whew... I don't know why I'm so tired. There's so many things I don't understand...... I feel a little uneasy.

Original: Aeris: Cloud...? What do you think of me?
Dialogue: Cloud...? What do you think of me?

Original: Cloud: I don't understand anything.
Dialogue: I don't understand anything.

Original: Aeris: ......You're right. Even I don't understand myself. I wonder what part of me is like an Ancient? What is an Ancient supposed to be like? It's strange, isn't it? I don't understand it...... Ahh......I'm going around in circles. I wonder if there's any answer to this. Everything's so complicated.
Dialogue: ......You're right. Even I don't understand myself. I wonder what part of me is like an Ancient? What is an Ancient supposed to be like? It's strange, isn't it? I don't understand it...... Ahh......I'm going around in circles. I wonder if there's any answer to this. Everything's so complicated.

Original: Aeris: I'm going on to bed.
Dialogue: I'm going on to bed.

Original: Cloud: Sorry, but I never thought about things like that.
Dialogue: Sorry, but I never thought about things like that.

Original: Aeris: How could you say such a thing! Sometimes you make me so mad! Oh, I never should have brought this up!!
Dialogue: How could you say such a thing! Sometimes you make me so mad! Oh, I never should have brought this up!!

Original: Aeris: I don't want to talk about it!
Dialogue: I don't want to talk about it!

Original: NPC: Welcome!! What's it going to be? 200 gil a night.
Dialogue: Welcome!! What's it going to be? 200 gil a night.

Original: On-screen: Cradled by the sound of the ocean waves...... Sweet dreams...
Dialogue: Cradled by the sound of the ocean waves...... Sweet dreams...

Original: NPC: Good morning. Be careful traveling.
Dialogue: Good morning. Be careful traveling.

Original: NPC: Your party has departed. Oops...... That's bad luck...... I mean, they have already left.
Dialogue: Your party has departed. Oops...... That's bad luck...... I mean, they have already left.

Original: NPC: Wait a minute! There's not enough money here.
Dialogue: Wait a minute! There's not enough money here.

Original: NPC: Are you sure? Please come again.
Dialogue: Are you sure? Please come again.

Original: NPC: Whew!! Hey! You're actually talking to me.
Dialogue: Whew!! Hey! You're actually talking to me.

Original: Cloud: What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Dialogue: I just passed a guy in a black cloak back there. I just tried to tell him that it's dangerous up ahead, and he ignored me!

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth...
Dialogue: Sephiroth...

Original: Tifa: Let's hurry on.
Dialogue: Let's hurry on.

Original: Aeris: There was a black-cloaked guy here, too?
Dialogue: There was a black-cloaked guy here, too?

Original: Red XIII: Hmm...... I'm moving on ahead...
Dialogue: Hmm...... I'm moving on ahead...

Original: Yuffie: Oh gawd, what a drag!!
Dialogue: Oh gawd, what a drag!!

Dialogue: It's dangerous up ahead. Be careful on your way.

Dialogue: If any strangers should greet you warmly while traveling, make sure to greet them back.

Dialogue: Whew! I guess that's the fun of being on the road.

Dialogue: Oh, oh oh oh oh!! Push the

Dialogue: Get the treasure by holding the Left or Right Direction buttons down while repeatedly pressing the

Dialogue: We can't go on until the bridge is let down. I think there's a switch in that shack over there... But there's too many monsters around and I'm beat...

Dialogue: The shack is here!! (^^);

Dialogue: Come on, Cloud. Let's rest a minute.

Dialogue: Wha? Oh, it's you.

Dialogue: There seems to be an instrument in that hut that manipulates this bridge. Perhaps it's best if we rest a moment.

Dialogue: The shack is here!! (^^);

Dialogue: I was just wishing you were here! Unless someone lets down the bridge, we're stuck. Cloud should be able to do something. But let's take a breather first.

Dialogue: The shack is here!! (^^);

Dialogue: I'm sure glad I'm with you, Cloud!

Original: Red XIII: Glu...glug...!

Original: Cloud: ...it's got nothing to do with us. Just forget about it.
Dialogue: ...it's got nothing to do with us. Just forget about it.

Original: Tifa: Right! That was admirable of you.
Dialogue: Right! That was admirable of you.

Original: Aeris: Cloud......
Dialogue: Cloud......

Dialogue: You kiddin'?

Original: Barret: Haeey!! Baaeby!!
Dialogue: Haeey!! Baaeby!!

Original: Red XIII: Glu...glug...!
Dialogue: Glu...glug...!

Original: NPC: Hey! How'd you ever wind up around here?
Dialogue: Hey! How'd you ever wind up around here?

Original: NPC: Look, I'm sorry but, I can't do a thing for you!
Dialogue: Look, I'm sorry but, I can't do a thing for you!

Original: NPC: Oh boy!! Corel sure has gone to pot. It used to be a famous coal mining town!
Dialogue: Oh boy!! Corel sure has gone to pot. It used to be a famous coal mining town!

Original: NPC: They say there were more jobs than you could shake a... Well, you get the picture!
Dialogue: They say there were more jobs than you could shake a... Well, you get the picture!

Original: NPC: Now, it's nothing but a miserable pit! Me, my bulldozer...everything's out of work.
Dialogue: Now, it's nothing but a miserable pit! Me, my bulldozer...everything's out of work.

Original: NPC: Got no job...I can't even show my face. 'Bout all that's left for me is to just live in this hole all day.
Dialogue: Got no job...I can't even show my face. 'Bout all that's left for me is to just live in this hole all day.

Original: NPC 1: You, you're...
Dialogue: You, you're...

Original: NPC 2: Hey!! He's back!
Dialogue: Hey!! He's back!

Original: Barret: Wait here...
Dialogue: Wait here...

Original: NPC 1: Well, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.
Dialogue: Well, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.

Original: NPC 1: Those people over there, they with you? Well, I feel sorry for 'em! Hangin' around a walkin' death sentence like Barret.
Dialogue: Those people over there, they with you? Well, I feel sorry for 'em! Hangin' around a walkin' death sentence like Barret.

Original: NPC 1: Well, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.
Dialogue: Well, lookey here! Never thought I'd ever see your face again.

Original: NPC 2: They kick you out of another town or somethin'? You destroy everything you touch.
Dialogue: They kick you out of another town or somethin'? You destroy everything you touch.

Original: NPC 3: You got a lot of balls comin' back here! Look at this place! It's all your fault North Corel turned into a garbage heap!
Dialogue: You got a lot of balls comin' back here! Look at this place! It's all your fault North Corel turned into a garbage heap!

Original: NPC 2: Why doncha say something!? Or did ya forget what you done here already?
Dialogue: Why doncha say something!? Or did ya forget what you done here already?

Original: Barret: ...I'm sorry...
Dialogue: ...I'm sorry...

Original: NPC 3: ^%$#! You ain't even worth the effort.
Dialogue: ^%$#! You ain't even worth the effort.

Original: NPC 2: Don't waste your time talkin' to that Techno-freak!
Dialogue: Don't waste your time talkin' to that Techno-freak!

Original: Barret: You heard 'em... It's my fault this town was...destroyed...
Dialogue: You heard 'em... It's my fault this town was...destroyed...

Original: Aeris: Barret, what happened?
Dialogue: Barret, what happened?

Original: Barret: Sorry.
Dialogue: Sorry.

Original: Cloud: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Barret: My hometown used to be around here.
Dialogue: My hometown used to be around here.

Original: Red XIII: What do you mean 'used to'?
Dialogue: What do you mean 'used to'?

Original: Barret: It ain't here no more. Heard it got buried... in just 4 years.
Dialogue: It ain't here no more. Heard it got buried... in just 4 years.

Original: Aeris: But how could those people say those terrible things?
Dialogue: But how could those people say those terrible things?

Original: Barret: An' it's my fault. ALL my fault.
Dialogue: An' it's my fault. ALL my fault.

Original: (During flashback in Corel.)Barret (narrating): ...My hometown, Corel's always been a coal mining town. It's so dusty, but calm and so poor...... A real small town, this one. That's the first time I ever heard the word "Mako Reactor" mentioned since that time...
Dialogue: ...My hometown, Corel's always been a coal mining town. It's so dusty, but calm and so poor...... A real small town, this one. That's the first time I ever heard the word "Mako Reactor" mentioned since that time...

Original: Village Headman: What are we going to do? The only one against this is Dyne...
Dialogue: What are we going to do? The only one against this is Dyne...

Original: Dyne: I am definitely against it, no matter what. There's nothing to talk about if you're thinking of throwing away our coal!
Dialogue: I am definitely against it, no matter what. There's nothing to talk about if you're thinking of throwing away our coal!

Original: Dyne: Our coal's been protected for generations. Our fathers, and theirs before them, risked their lives for it. We have no right to throw it all away so easily!
Dialogue: Our coal's been protected for generations. Our fathers, and theirs before them, risked their lives for it. We have no right to throw it all away so easily!

Original: Barret (in flashback): But listen, Dyne. No one uses coal nowadays. It's the sign of the times.
Dialogue: But listen, Dyne. No one uses coal nowadays. It's the sign of the times.

Original: Scarlet: Right, everything is Mako, now.
Dialogue: Right, everything is Mako, now.

Original: Scarlet: It'll be all right, Dyne. Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your livelihood once the Mako Reactor is completed.
Dialogue: It'll be all right, Dyne. Shinra, Inc. will guarantee your livelihood once the Mako Reactor is completed.

Original: Barret (in flashback): Listen, Dyne. I don't want my wife, Myrna, to suffer anymore.
Dialogue: Listen, Dyne. I don't want my wife, Myrna, to suffer anymore.

Original: Dyne: I know how you feel! I feel the same way too, damn it! But even so, I won't give away our coal mines!
Dialogue: I know how you feel! I feel the same way too, damn it! But even so, I won't give away our coal mines!

Original: Village Headman: Dyne...you've got to understand.
Dialogue: Dyne...you've got to understand.

Original: Barret (narrating): That's how the Corel Reactor was built......and completed. We all thought it would bring us an easier life.
Dialogue: That's how the Corel Reactor was built......and completed. We all thought it would bring us an easier life.

Original: Barret (narrating): It happened when Dyne and I were out of town for a few days. Corel was burned down by the Shinra troops. All the townspeople... All my relatives...... Everyone...everything......
Dialogue: It happened when Dyne and I were out of town for a few days. Corel was burned down by the Shinra troops. All the townspeople... All my relatives...... Everyone...everything......

Original: Cloud: Shinra troops? What for!?
Dialogue: Shinra troops? What for!?

Original: Barret: There was an explosion at a reactor. Shinra blamed the accident on the people. Said it was done by a rebel faction.
Dialogue: There was an explosion at a reactor. Shinra blamed the accident on the people. Said it was done by a rebel faction.

Original: Tifa: That's so terrible!
Dialogue: That's so terrible!

Original: Barret: Well, I guess that's true. But more than Shinra, I couldn't forgive myself. Never should've gone along with the building of the reactor...
Dialogue: Well, I guess that's true. But more than Shinra, I couldn't forgive myself. Never should've gone along with the building of the reactor...

Original: Tifa: Don't blame yourself. We were all fooled by the promises Shinra made back then.
Dialogue: Don't blame yourself. We were all fooled by the promises Shinra made back then.

Original: Barret: That's why... that's why I get so pissed off!! Not only did they take advantage of me...... But I lost my wife, Myrna, too...
Dialogue: That's why... that's why I get so pissed off!! Not only did they take advantage of me...... But I lost my wife, Myrna, too...

Original: NPC: Hey everyone! If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer', hurry and get on!
Dialogue: Hey everyone! If you want to go to the 'Gold Saucer', hurry and get on!

Original: NPC: Ride the Ropeway?
Dialogue: Ride the Ropeway?

Original: Cloud: Let's get on.
Dialogue: Let's get on.

Dialogue: Dyne was my best friend. We was close ever since we was kids...

Original: Tifa: I never knew. Barret never said a thing...
Dialogue: I never knew. Barret never said a thing...

Original: Red XIII: .........
Yuffie: I'm not sympathizing with Barret! He never should have trusted Shinra, Inc....
Dialogue: I'm not sympathizing with Barret! He never should have trusted Shinra, Inc....

Original: Tifa: We better go on!
Dialogue: We better go on!

Original: Barret: Dyne was my best friend. We was close ever since we was kids...
Dialogue: Dyne was my best friend. We was close ever since we was kids...

Dialogue: I'm waiting inside.

Dialogue: Everything Shinra does seem to make everyone miserable...

Original: Barret: It's all my fault...
Dialogue: It's all my fault...

Original: Tifa: I never knew. Barret never said a thing...
Dialogue: I never knew. Barret never said a thing...

Original: Red XIII: .........
NPC: Please buy your ticket here.
Dialogue: Please buy your ticket here.

Original: NPC: Welcome to the Gold Saucer.
Dialogue: Welcome to the Gold Saucer.

Original: NPC: Are you together? A single pass is 3000 gil, or you can purchase a lifetime pass for 30000 gil.
Dialogue: Are you together? A single pass is 3000 gil, or you can purchase a lifetime pass for 30000 gil.

Original: NPC: Thank you very much. If you leave Gold Saucer, your tickets become invalid.
Dialogue: Thank you very much. If you leave Gold Saucer, your tickets become invalid.

Original: NPC: Thank you very much. If you have a Gold Ticket, you can come and go freely into the park...as long as you don't lose it.
Dialogue: Thank you very much. If you have a Gold Ticket, you can come and go freely into the park...as long as you don't lose it.

Original: NPC: I'm sorry, you don't have enough money.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, you don't have enough money.

Original: NPC: Here at the Gold Saucer, there are many places where you must pay with GP. Just think of 'GP' as money that you can only use at the Gold Saucer. GP can only be redeemed at the games in Wonder Square and at the Chocobo Races. Your GP limit is 10000, so please be careful. Please enjoy yourselves.
Dialogue: Here at the Gold Saucer, there are many places where you must pay with GP. Just think of 'GP' as money that you can only use at the Gold Saucer. GP can only be redeemed at the games in Wonder Square and at the Chocobo Races. Your GP limit is 10000, so please be careful. Please enjoy yourselves.

Original: Aeris: Wow! Let's have fun!
Dialogue: Wow! Let's have fun!

Dialogue: I know this isn't the right time to do this.

Dialogue: Hey, Barret, cheer up!

Dialogue: ......I ain't in no cheery mood. So jes' leave me alone.

Dialogue: Really? That's too bad.

Dialogue: Let's go!

Dialogue: ...whisper...whisper... (Wasn't that a little harsh, Aeris!?)

Dialogue: ...whisper... (You think so...?)

Dialogue: So PLAY! ...messin' round #@^%$! Don't forget we're after Sephiroth!

Dialogue: I wish we could just forget everything and have fun!

Dialogue: ......You want to go with me?

Dialogue: Are we leaving the others?

Dialogue: Cloud! Are we just going to leave the others?

Dialogue: Hey boy.

Dialogue: Boy...

Dialogue: How is it? You having fun?

Dialogue: Mmm, so, you ARE having fun. Well, good, good for you boy.

Dialogue: My name's Cloud. And stop calling me boy.

Original: Dio: Mmm? Me? I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer. The name's Dio. Just call me 'Dio'.
Dialogue: Mmm? Me? I'm the owner of the Gold Saucer. The name's Dio. Just call me 'Dio'.

Original: Cloud: ......(Not even listening)
Dialogue: ......(Not even listening)

Original: Dio: By the way, boy, do you know what a 'Black Materia' is?
Dialogue: By the way, boy, do you know what a 'Black Materia' is?

Original: Dio: Oh, so you do know.
Dialogue: Oh, so you do know.

Original: Dio: Ha ha ha ......that, I say, that's a good one, boy! But it's not good to lie. You can't fool me.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha ......that, I say, that's a good one, boy! But it's not good to lie. You can't fool me.

Original: Cloud: Why d'you ask me?
Dialogue: Why d'you ask me?

Dialogue: Well, a while back, a boy your age came in and asked me if I had a 'Black Materia.'

Original: Dio: I thought you might know who he was, seein' as how you're both about the same age.
Dialogue: I thought you might know who he was, seein' as how you're both about the same age.

Original: Cloud: Did he happen to have... a Black Cape...
Dialogue: Did he happen to have... a Black Cape...

Original: Dio: Why yes, yes indeed. And a tattoo on his hand that said '1'.
Dialogue: Why yes, yes indeed. And a tattoo on his hand that said '1'.

Original: Cloud: Where did he go!?
Dialogue: Where did he go!?

Original: Dio: Ha ha ha, I have no idea.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha, I have no idea.

Original: Dio: Well then. I say, stop by the Battle Arena if you like, boy. You'll probably like it. Many of my collections are on display there.
Dialogue: Well then. I say, stop by the Battle Arena if you like, boy. You'll probably like it. Many of my collections are on display there.

Original: Dio: Ha, ha ha.
Dialogue: Ha, ha ha.

Dialogue: What happened?

Dialogue: What?

Dialogue: What happened?

Dialogue: What is it?

Cloud: Shinra soldiers... Even here...
Dialogue: Shinra soldiers... Even here...

Dialogue: Attention! Dismissed!!

Original: Cait Sith: Hey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?
Dialogue: Hey you!! What're you lookin' so down for!?

Original: Cait Sith: How 'bout it? Want me to read your fortune!? A bright future! A happy future!
Dialogue: How 'bout it? Want me to read your fortune!? A bright future! A happy future!

Original: Cait Sith: Oh, but don't hold it against me if it's not a great prediction!
Dialogue: Oh, but don't hold it against me if it's not a great prediction!

Original: Cait Sith: Oh, so sorry! I'm a fortune telling machine. The name's...
Dialogue: Oh, so sorry! I'm a fortune telling machine. The name's...

Original: Cloud: You can only read the future?
Dialogue: You can only read the future?

Original: Cait Sith: You kidding!? I can find missing things, missing people, anything!
Dialogue: You kidding!? I can find missing things, missing people, anything!

Original: Cloud: Then can you tell me where a man named Sephiroth is?
Dialogue: Then can you tell me where a man named Sephiroth is?

Original: Cait Sith: Sephiroth, right!? Okay, here goes!!
Dialogue: Sephiroth, right!? Okay, here goes!!

Original: Cloud: ...Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune. Give into the good will of others, and something big'll happen after summer. ...wait...what's this?
Dialogue: ...Ordinary luck. It will be an active fortune. Give into the good will of others, and something big'll happen after summer. ...wait...what's this?

Original: Cait Sith: Huh? Let me try again.
Dialogue: Huh? Let me try again.

Original: Cloud: Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky color is...blue? ...Forget it.
Dialogue: Be careful of forgetfulness. Your lucky color is...blue? ...Forget it.

Original: Cait Sith: Wait, wait give me another chance! Wait! Let me try it again!
Dialogue: Wait, wait give me another chance! Wait! Let me try it again!

Original: Cloud: ...What the!?
Dialogue: ...What the!?

Original: Tifa: What does it say?
Dialogue: What does it say?

Original: Aeris: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Red XIII: Read it out loud, Cloud
Dialogue: Read it out loud, Cloud

Original: Yuffie: What is it! Tell us!
Dialogue: What is it! Tell us!

Original: Cloud: What you pursue will be yours. But you will lose something dear.
Dialogue: What you pursue will be yours. But you will lose something dear.

Original: Cait Sith: I don't know if it's good OR bad... This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.
Dialogue: I don't know if it's good OR bad... This's the first time I ever got something like THIS.

Original: Cait Sith: Then shall we?
Dialogue: Then shall we?

Original: Tifa: Excuse me?
Dialogue: Excuse me?

Original: Aeris: What are you talking about?
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Original: Red XIII: To where?
Dialogue: To where?

Original: Yuffie: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cait Sith: As a fortune teller, I can't help but think about this. If I don't see what it leads to, I won't be able to relax. That's why I'm going with you!
Dialogue: As a fortune teller, I can't help but think about this. If I don't see what it leads to, I won't be able to relax. That's why I'm going with you!

Original: Tifa: Is it all right, Cloud?
Dialogue: Is it all right, Cloud?

Original: Aeris: What are we going to do, Cloud?
Dialogue: What are we going to do, Cloud?

Original: Red XIII: Cloud, it's all right with you?
Dialogue: Cloud, it's all right with you?

Dialogue: He's weird! Cloud, don't let him come!

Dialogue: I'm comin' with you no matter WHAT you say!

Dialogue: H...hey!

Dialogue: Mm!?

Dialogue: Wh...why?

Dialogue: Don't, don't just leave me!

Dialogue: No...it's not him... They're all shot... Sephiroth would never use a gun...

Dialogue: Ugh, ugggh.

Dialogue: Ugh...ugh...a man with a gun...on his arm......

Dialogue: I'll tell you one thing, rookie. This desert is extremely dangerous. It'll welcome you in, but when you try to leave, it'll swallow ya. I hear tell, some of them never make it out... the best thing is to stay out of the desert entirely.

Dialogue: Want to enter the Chocobo Race?

Dialogue: This elevator will take you to the top... But, you gotta be picked as a Chocobo Racer, first.

Original: NPC: Those guys only tell lies. Only lies. Not a one of 'em will tell you the truth. Just talk with 'em a couple of times, and you'll get sick of them.
Dialogue: Those guys only tell lies. Only lies. Not a one of 'em will tell you the truth. Just talk with 'em a couple of times, and you'll get sick of them.

Original: NPC 1: This place is heaven.
Dialogue: This place is heaven.

Original: NPC 2: This place is heaven.
Dialogue: This place is heaven.

Original: NPC 3: This place is heaven.
Dialogue: This place is heaven.

Original: NPC 1: Man with a gun on his arm?
Dialogue: Man with a gun on his arm?

Original: NPC 1: Never heard of him.
Dialogue: Never heard of him.

Original: NPC 2: Never heard of him.
Dialogue: Never heard of him.

Original: NPC 3: Never heard of him.
Dialogue: Never heard of him.

Original: NPC 1: You wanna see the Boss?
Dialogue: You wanna see the Boss?

Original: NPC 1: Go Southwest and you'll meet him.
Dialogue: Go Southwest and you'll meet him.

Original: NPC 2: You'll meet him.
Dialogue: You'll meet him.

Original: NPC 3: You'll meet him.
Dialogue: You'll meet him.

Original: NPC 1: Once out in the desert, stay still and don't walk.
Dialogue: Once out in the desert, stay still and don't walk.

Original: NPC 2: Don't walk
Dialogue: Don't walk

Original: NPC 3: Don't walk
Dialogue: Don't walk

Original: NPC 1: There's no way you'll ever see a mysterious Chocobo carriage. No way.
Dialogue: There's no way you'll ever see a mysterious Chocobo carriage. No way.

Original: NPC 2: No way.
Dialogue: No way.

Original: NPC 3: No way.
Dialogue: No way.

Original: NPC: You new? Then go and pay your respects to Mr. Coates.
Dialogue: You new? Then go and pay your respects to Mr. Coates.

Original: NPC: More respects again? You sure are formal, go ahead...
Dialogue: More respects again? You sure are formal, go ahead...

Original: Mr.Coates: Never seen your face 'round here before. Goin' up?
Dialogue: Never seen your face 'round here before. Goin' up?

Original: Mr.Coates: Heh heh! You sure got guts!
Dialogue: Heh heh! You sure got guts!

Original: Mr.Coates: You don't seem to understand how things work down here. This is the Gold Saucer's garbage dump. And that makes alluv ya scrubs. The only way to get back up there is to win the Chocobo Race. But, it's not as easy as you rookies think. Of course, if you got the boss's permission it'd be a different story but, YOU'll never get that! Ha ha ha ha.
Dialogue: You don't seem to understand how things work down here. This is the Gold Saucer's garbage dump. And that makes alluv ya scrubs. The only way to get back up there is to win the Chocobo Race. But, it's not as easy as you rookies think. Of course, if you got the boss's permission it'd be a different story but, YOU'll never get that! Ha ha ha ha.

Original: Cloud: Looks like we could get some sleep here.
Dialogue: Looks like we could get some sleep here.

Original: NPC: A rookie? Then you gotta buy something. Yup, that's the rule here.
Dialogue: A rookie? Then you gotta buy something. Yup, that's the rule here.

Original: Barret: Didn't I tell you not to come here!?
Dialogue: Didn't I tell you not to come here!?

Original: Cait Sith: Ju......just hold on for a second! We just want to talk! You'll understand if you just hear us out!
Dialogue: Ju......just hold on for a second! We just want to talk! You'll understand if you just hear us out!

Original: Barret: Didn't want none of ya to get involved...
Dialogue: Didn't want none of ya to get involved...

Original: Aeris: Hey that's Cloud's line! '...It's too dangerous, I can't let you get involved...' blah, blah, blah...
Dialogue: Hey that's Cloud's line! '...It's too dangerous, I can't let you get involved...' blah, blah, blah...

Original: Tifa: Yeah. We're already involved in this.
Dialogue: Yeah. We're already involved in this.

Original: Aeris: We saw you and hurried here. Barret, just tell us what's going on.
Dialogue: We saw you and hurried here. Barret, just tell us what's going on.

Original: Tifa: We saw you and hurried here. So come on Barret, just tell us what's going on.
Dialogue: We saw you and hurried here. So come on Barret, just tell us what's going on.

Original: Barret: You guys...
Dialogue: You guys...

Original: Red XIII: I heard that the murders at the Battle Arena were done by a man with a gun-arm. ...Was that you?
Dialogue: I heard that the murders at the Battle Arena were done by a man with a gun-arm. ...Was that you?

Original: Barret: There's another... another man that got a gun grafted inta one of his arms. It was four years ago...
Dialogue: There's another... another man that got a gun grafted inta one of his arms. It was four years ago...

Original: Barret (narrating): I remember... I was on my way home from visiting a Mako Reactor being built.
Dialogue: I remember... I was on my way home from visiting a Mako Reactor being built.

Original: NPC: Barret! Dyne! Come quick! The village's being attacked! It's Shinra soldiers!
Dialogue: Barret! Dyne! Come quick! The village's being attacked! It's Shinra soldiers!

Original: Barret (in flashback): What!!!?
Dialogue: What!!!?

Original: Barret (in flashback): What the hell happened?......
Dialogue: What the hell happened?......

Original: Dyne: Hey, Barret! It's not over yet! Everyone's waiting! Let's go back to the village!
Dialogue: Hey, Barret! It's not over yet! Everyone's waiting! Let's go back to the village!

Original: NPC: Barret! Dyne! Protect the village...!
Dialogue: Barret! Dyne! Protect the village...!

Original: Barret (in flashback): Hmp!! Old man!!
Dialogue: Hmp!! Old man!!

Original: Dyne: C'mon, Barret! We gotta hurry!
Dialogue: C'mon, Barret! We gotta hurry!

Original: Barret (in flashback): Krggh!!
Dialogue: Krggh!!

Original: Dyne: Barret!! You stay here!!
Dialogue: Barret!! You stay here!!

Original: Scarlet: Kyaa haa, ha!! You can shoot all day and never hit them with aim like that.
Dialogue: Kyaa haa, ha!! You can shoot all day and never hit them with aim like that.

Original: Barret (in flashback): Shu' up!!
Dialogue: Shu' up!!

Original: Scarlet: Haa, ha, ha!! Stop playing around and cover me!!
Dialogue: Haa, ha, ha!! Stop playing around and cover me!!

Original: Dyne: Watch out!!
Dialogue: Watch out!!

Original: Barret (in flashback): Dyne!! Hang on!! Lissen to me!! You're comin' back to the village, hear!!?
Dialogue: Dyne!! Hang on!! Lissen to me!! You're comin' back to the village, hear!!?

Original: Dyne: Yeah... I ain't lettin' go... You're comin' back... Everyone's waitin' for ya... Eleanor... and Marlene... They all waitin' on us...
Dialogue: Yeah... I ain't lettin' go... You're comin' back... Everyone's waitin' for ya... Eleanor... and Marlene... They all waitin' on us...

Original: Barret: From then on, I couldn't use my right arm no more. ...I was depressed for a while. But then I threw away my artificial arm and got this gun grafted in. Got a new right arm to get revenge on the Shinra, who took everything away...
Dialogue: From then on, I couldn't use my right arm no more. ...I was depressed for a while. But then I threw away my artificial arm and got this gun grafted in. Got a new right arm to get revenge on the Shinra, who took everything away...

Original: Barret: Back then, I heard the doc say there was another man who got the same operation as me. But, his was the left arm.
Dialogue: Back then, I heard the doc say there was another man who got the same operation as me. But, his was the left arm.

Original: Cloud: ......
Aeris: But...Dyne's injury was the same as yours, right?
Dialogue: But...Dyne's injury was the same as yours, right?

Original: Tifa: Yeah, that's right. He was deceived by the Shinra too. He'll probably join us to fight against the Shinra.
Dialogue: Yeah, that's right. He was deceived by the Shinra too. He'll probably join us to fight against the Shinra.

Original: Barret: ...wouldn't bet on it. I gotta 'pologize to Dyne before I can rest in peace. An' that's why, I gotta go alone.
Dialogue: ...wouldn't bet on it. I gotta 'pologize to Dyne before I can rest in peace. An' that's why, I gotta go alone.

Original: Cloud: Do whatever you want... Is that what you want to hear? Well, I can't let you do it. Because, if you die on me, I'm gonna have nightmares.
Dialogue: Do whatever you want... Is that what you want to hear? Well, I can't let you do it. Because, if you die on me, I'm gonna have nightmares.

Original: Aeris: Barret, this isn't the end.
Dialogue: Barret, this isn't the end.

Original: Tifa: Weren't you going to save the Planet?
Dialogue: Weren't you going to save the Planet?

Original: Barret: Shit! Tifa, you oughtta know by now.
Dialogue: Shit! Tifa, you oughtta know by now.

Original: Tifa: ...That's all right. I'm not so different from you.
Dialogue: ...That's all right. I'm not so different from you.

Original: Aeris: That's easier to understand. It's you, Barret.
Dialogue: That's easier to understand. It's you, Barret.

Original: Cloud: So there it is, Barret. So I guess it'll be Barret, me, and......
Dialogue: So there it is, Barret. So I guess it'll be Barret, me, and......

Original: Tifa: Be careful.
Dialogue: Be careful.

Original: Aeris: I wonder if Dyne will join us?
Dialogue: I wonder if Dyne will join us?

Original: Red XIII: Hmm? Shall I go with you?
Dialogue: Hmm? Shall I go with you?

Original: Yuffie: You sure are all acting pretty heroic, considerin' we're not makin' any money on this...
Dialogue: You sure are all acting pretty heroic, considerin' we're not makin' any money on this...

Original: Cait Sith: Fortune's good. Everything is perfect!
Dialogue: Fortune's good. Everything is perfect!

Original: NPC: Man, the Boss was REALLY in a bad mood today... Or was it one of his better days?
Dialogue: Man, the Boss was REALLY in a bad mood today... Or was it one of his better days?

Original: NPC: If you get lost in the desert, just keep going Northeast. If you're lucky, you'll make it back here.
Dialogue: If you get lost in the desert, just keep going Northeast. If you're lucky, you'll make it back here.

Original: NPC: Wanna ride...?
Dialogue: Wanna ride...?

Original: Barret: ...Dyne ...Is that you?
Dialogue: ...Dyne ...Is that you?

Original: Dyne: Now that's a voice I haven't heard in years... A voice I'll never forget...
Dialogue: Now that's a voice I haven't heard in years... A voice I'll never forget...

Original: Barret: I always hoped I'd be able to see you again someday... I knew you were alive somewhere... we had the same operation.
Dialogue: I always hoped I'd be able to see you again someday... I knew you were alive somewhere... we had the same operation.

Original: Barret: Listen to me Dyne. I want to...
Dialogue: Listen to me Dyne. I want to...

Original: Dyne: What's that?......I hear her voice.
Dialogue: What's that?......I hear her voice.

Original: Barret: ......?
Dyne: I hear her voice, Eleanor's voice. Begging me... not to hate your rotten guts. That's why I didn't hunt you down...
Dialogue: I hear her voice, Eleanor's voice. Begging me... not to hate your rotten guts. That's why I didn't hunt you down...

Original: Barret: ...I know I was stupid. I'm not asking you to forgive me. But...What're you doin' in a place like this? Why ya wanna kill those that ain't even involved? Why?
Dialogue: ...I know I was stupid. I'm not asking you to forgive me. But...What're you doin' in a place like this? Why ya wanna kill those that ain't even involved? Why?

Original: Dyne: ...Why!? The hell do you care for!? Are the people killed going to understand 'why'? Are the people of Corel going to understand just hearing Shinra's excuses?
Dialogue: ...Why!? The hell do you care for!? Are the people killed going to understand 'why'? Are the people of Corel going to understand just hearing Shinra's excuses?

Original: Dyne: I don't CARE what the reason is! All they give us are artillery and stupid excuses... What's left is a world of despair and emptiness...
Dialogue: I don't CARE what the reason is! All they give us are artillery and stupid excuses... What's left is a world of despair and emptiness...

Original: Barret: .......

Dyne: You still want to hear 'why'? ...All right, I'll tell you. 'Cause I want to destroy everything. The people of this city. This city itself. The whole world! I got nothing left in this world. Corel, Eleanor...... Marlene......
Dialogue: You still want to hear 'why'? ...All right, I'll tell you. 'Cause I want to destroy everything. The people of this city. This city itself. The whole world! I got nothing left in this world. Corel, Eleanor...... Marlene......

Original: Barret: Dyne,Marlene...... Marlene's still alive.
Dialogue: Dyne,Marlene...... Marlene's still alive.

Original: Barret: I went back into town. I thought she was gone for sure. That is why I wanted to be by her side till the end. That's when I found her... ...found Marlene.
Dialogue: I went back into town. I thought she was gone for sure. That is why I wanted to be by her side till the end. That's when I found her... ...found Marlene.

Original: Dyne: ...
Barret: She's in Midgar. Let's go see her together, all right?
Dialogue: She's in Midgar. Let's go see her together, all right?

Original: Dyne: So......she's still alive...
Dialogue: So......she's still alive...

Original: Dyne: All right, Barret. I guess that means you and I gotta fight.
Dialogue: All right, Barret. I guess that means you and I gotta fight.

Original: Barret: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Dyne: Eleanor's alone all by herself. I've got to take Marlene to her.
Dialogue: Eleanor's alone all by herself. I've got to take Marlene to her.

Original: Barret: Dyne...are you insane!?
Dialogue: Dyne...are you insane!?

Original: Dyne: Marlene wants to see her Mom, don't she?
Dialogue: Marlene wants to see her Mom, don't she?

Original: Barret: Stop, Dyne! I can't die yet!
Dialogue: Stop, Dyne! I can't die yet!

Original: Dyne: Oh yeah? Well my life's been over ever since then.
Dialogue: Oh yeah? Well my life's been over ever since then.

Original: Barret: Stop it! I don't wanna fight you!
Dialogue: Stop it! I don't wanna fight you!

Original: Cloud: Barret!
Dialogue: Barret!

Original: Barret: Cloud, you stay the hell out of it! This is MY problem!!
Dialogue: Cloud, you stay the hell out of it! This is MY problem!!

Original: Dyne: Urgh!
Dialogue: Urgh!

Original: Dyne: Back!!
Dialogue: Back!!

Original: Dyne: ...it wasn't just my arm...... back then...... I lost something irreplaceable. I don't know where I went wrong...
Dialogue: ...it wasn't just my arm...... back then...... I lost something irreplaceable. I don't know where I went wrong...

Original: Barret: Dyne...I don't know either, man. Is this the only way... we can resolve this?
Dialogue: Dyne...I don't know either, man. Is this the only way... we can resolve this?

Original: Dyne: I told you... I... I want to destroy everything... Everything... This crazy world... Even me...
Dialogue: I told you... I... I want to destroy everything... Everything... This crazy world... Even me...

Original: Barret: An' what 'bout Marlene? What's gonna happen to her!?
Dialogue: An' what 'bout Marlene? What's gonna happen to her!?

Original: Dyne: ...Think about it...Barret... How old was Marlene back then...? Even if I did go to her now... she wouldn't even know me...
Dialogue: ...Think about it...Barret... How old was Marlene back then...? Even if I did go to her now... she wouldn't even know me...

Original: Dyne: And what's more...Barret... These hands are a little too stained to carry Marlene anymore...
Dialogue: And what's more...Barret... These hands are a little too stained to carry Marlene anymore...

Original: Barret: ......
Dyne: Barret... Give that pendant to Marlene... It was...Eleanor's... my wife's...memento...
Dialogue: Barret... Give that pendant to Marlene... It was...Eleanor's... my wife's...memento...

Original: Barret: All right...
Dialogue: All right...

Original: Dyne: ...wow...Marlene's... already......4......
Dialogue: ...wow...Marlene's... already......4......

Original: Dyne: Barret... Don't ......make... ......Don't ever make Marlene......cry...
Dialogue: Barret... Don't ......make... ......Don't ever make Marlene......cry...

Original: Barret: Dyne...?
Dialogue: Dyne...?

Original: Barret: Dyne!
Dialogue: Dyne!

Original: Barret: Dy------ne!!
Barret: ...Dyne. Me an' you were the same... My hands ain't any cleaner...... I shouldn't be able to carry...Marlene either...
Dialogue: ...Dyne. Me an' you were the same... My hands ain't any cleaner...... I shouldn't be able to carry...Marlene either...

Original: Barret: Uuuurrrrrrgh!!!
Dialogue: Uuuurrrrrrgh!!!

Original: Mr.Coates: You want somethin'?
Dialogue: You want somethin'?

Original: Barret: I want to go up.
Dialogue: I want to go up.

Original: Mr.Coates: Like I told you before, you gotta get the Boss' permission, then win the Chocobo......
Dialogue: Like I told you before, you gotta get the Boss' permission, then win the Chocobo......

Original: Barret: Dyne's got his reasons an' can't speak. So, I got this, instead.
Dialogue: Dyne's got his reasons an' can't speak. So, I got this, instead.

Original: Mr.Coates: Yeah, bull--!!
Dialogue: Yeah, bull--!!

Original: Barret: I want to go up.
Dialogue: I want to go up.

Original: Mr.Coates: R, right. Did you kill Dyne? You must've. Or you'd never be holding that thing. ...So Dyne's dead... Maybe now, the place'll calm down a little. Dyne didn't care who anyone was......
Dialogue: R, right. Did you kill Dyne? You must've. Or you'd never be holding that thing. ...So Dyne's dead... Maybe now, the place'll calm down a little. Dyne didn't care who anyone was......

Original: Barret: The hell do YOU know!!
Dialogue: The hell do YOU know!!

Original: Mr.Coates: R...ri......right! I mean, no, I DON'T know anything. S, s...sorry.
Dialogue: R...ri......right! I mean, no, I DON'T know anything. S, s...sorry.

Original: Cloud: Then, will you get us outta here?
Dialogue: Then, will you get us outta here?

Original: Mr.Coates: Huh? Oh man, you guys are mistaken. I already told you, there's only one way to get outta here. That's to win the Chocobo Race and that's held up there, in the Gold Saucer. And, only one racer can go up at a time.
Dialogue: Huh? Oh man, you guys are mistaken. I already told you, there's only one way to get outta here. That's to win the Chocobo Race and that's held up there, in the Gold Saucer. And, only one racer can go up at a time.

Original: Barret: Say what!?
Dialogue: Say what!?

Original: Mr.Coates: Noooo! Really, even if you threaten me!! A rule's a rule. I can't change it. If I do, the whole system down here'll get messed up!! An' I can't do that!
Dialogue: Noooo! Really, even if you threaten me!! A rule's a rule. I can't change it. If I do, the whole system down here'll get messed up!! An' I can't do that!

Original: Mr.Coates: Okay, ok, I'll let one go up there. After that, he's gotta deal with Dio.
Dialogue: Okay, ok, I'll let one go up there. After that, he's gotta deal with Dio.

Original: Barret: Awright then. Cloud, you go. We'll wait down here. Hurry up an' win that Chocobo Race, an' get us outta here!
Dialogue: Awright then. Cloud, you go. We'll wait down here. Hurry up an' win that Chocobo Race, an' get us outta here!

Original: Tifa: Right, Cloud. We'll be waiting and rooting for you.
Dialogue: Right, Cloud. We'll be waiting and rooting for you.

Original: Aeris: Yes, good luck, Cloud.
Dialogue: Yes, good luck, Cloud.

Original: Red XIII: You're right. Cloud should do it.
Dialogue: You're right. Cloud should do it.

Original: Yuffie: Well, Cloud go get 'em!
Dialogue: Well, Cloud go get 'em!

Original: Cait Sith: Ok Cloud, knock 'em dead!
Dialogue: Ok Cloud, knock 'em dead!

Original: Mr.Coates: Have you decided?
Dialogue: Have you decided?

Original: Mr.Coates: All you need now is a manager. ... and register and get a Chocobo...
Dialogue: All you need now is a manager. ... and register and get a Chocobo...

Original: Ester: Hi......I happened to hear your story.
Dialogue: Hi......I happened to hear your story.

Original: Mr.Coates: Ester?
Dialogue: Ester?

Original: Ester: I'll be your manager.
Dialogue: I'll be your manager.

Original: Mr.Coates: Well, I have nothing against it, but...
Dialogue: Well, I have nothing against it, but...

Original: Mr.Coates: This is Ester. She may look kinda funny... But there's no better manager in the races...
Dialogue: This is Ester. She may look kinda funny... But there's no better manager in the races...

Original: Ester: That's so rude...
Dialogue: That's so rude...

Original: Ester: Yeah, well. Nice to meet you, Cloud.
Dialogue: Yeah, well. Nice to meet you, Cloud.

Original: Mr.Coates: All right then, Cloud. I'll send you up the elevator. Ester'll fill you in on the details.
Dialogue: All right then, Cloud. I'll send you up the elevator. Ester'll fill you in on the details.

Original: Ester: Hmm, so that's what happened. I'll talk to Dio directly. You just concentrate on the race. Oh yeah, getting back to the other thing, there are many different types of Chocobo jockeys. It's not only for criminals. Some people compete for the fame, some people compete for the money, some only for glory... And then there're people like you. Oh yeah, I'll teach you how to ride a Chocobo.
Dialogue: Hmm, so that's what happened. I'll talk to Dio directly. You just concentrate on the race. Oh yeah, getting back to the other thing, there are many different types of Chocobo jockeys. It's not only for criminals. Some people compete for the fame, some people compete for the money, some only for glory... And then there're people like you. Oh yeah, I'll teach you how to ride a Chocobo.

Original: Ester: Ummm... First use the
Dialogue: Ummm... First use the

Original: Man: You new?
Dialogue: You new?

Original: Ester: Hi, Joe.
Dialogue: Hi, Joe.

Original: Joe: Hey,Ester you're looking pretty as usual.
Dialogue: Hey,Ester you're looking pretty as usual.

Original: Ester: Thanks.
Dialogue: Thanks.

Original: Ester: Let me introduce you, Cloud. This is Joe, one of the top Chocobo Jockeys.
Dialogue: Let me introduce you, Cloud. This is Joe, one of the top Chocobo Jockeys.

Original: Joe: Nice to meet you, Cloud. If you're with Ester, then...
Dialogue: Nice to meet you, Cloud. If you're with Ester, then...

Original: Ester: Right! He's an up and coming jockey. He's only been down here for a day and already he made it up here!!
Dialogue: Right! He's an up and coming jockey. He's only been down here for a day and already he made it up here!!

Original: Joe: What!? Oh, I see...
Dialogue: What!? Oh, I see...

Original: Joe: So what did you do down there?
Dialogue: So what did you do down there?

Original: Joe: Sorry...you're not supposed to ask about the past here...
Dialogue: Sorry...you're not supposed to ask about the past here...

Original: Joe: Pretty interesting... I have a feeling that we'll meet again. Then, until we meet again, Cloud.
Dialogue: Pretty interesting... I have a feeling that we'll meet again. Then, until we meet again, Cloud.

Original: Ester: I'm going to check on the Chocobo. You just wait here for a while.
Dialogue: I'm going to check on the Chocobo. You just wait here for a while.

Original: Ester: I'll be right back.
Dialogue: I'll be right back.

Original: NPC: Don't get cocky. Skills don't matter once you get in the race...
Dialogue: Don't get cocky. Skills don't matter once you get in the race...

Original: NPC: I got nothing to say.
Dialogue: I got nothing to say.

Original: On-screen: The race will start in a few moments. Will the jockeys for the next race, please proceed to the paddock. I repeat...
Dialogue: The race will start in a few moments. Will the jockeys for the next race, please proceed to the paddock. I repeat...

Original: Ester: Cloud
Dialogue: Cloud

Original: Ester: Thanks for waiting. I registered you in the next race. This is a Chocobo I prepared myself. He won't lose easily.
Dialogue: Thanks for waiting. I registered you in the next race. This is a Chocobo I prepared myself. He won't lose easily.

Original: Ester: Oh yeah... You know how to ride one?
Dialogue: Oh yeah... You know how to ride one?

Original: Ester: Let's see First use the
Dialogue: Let's see First use the

Original: Ester: Then, good luck.
Dialogue: Then, good luck.

Original: Ester: Too bad.
Dialogue: Too bad.

Original: Ester: You had a tough situation there.
Dialogue: You had a tough situation there.

Original: Ester: I was expecting a little more from you.
Dialogue: I was expecting a little more from you.

Original: Ester: You were so close.
Dialogue: You were so close.

Original: Ester: Let me find a better Chocobo for you. Wait here for a while, OK?
Dialogue: Let me find a better Chocobo for you. Wait here for a while, OK?

Original: Ester: If you couldn't win with that last Chocobo... All right, I'll go get the best Chocobo there is!
Dialogue: If you couldn't win with that last Chocobo... All right, I'll go get the best Chocobo there is!

Original: Ester: You gotta be kidding me!? There aren't any other Chocobos better than the last one! Well, if you really want to win, just push the 'SELECT' and try the 'AUTO' mode.
Dialogue: You gotta be kidding me!? There aren't any other Chocobos better than the last one! Well, if you really want to win, just push the 'SELECT' and try the 'AUTO' mode.

Original: Ester: Congratulations!! Now you're home free!
Dialogue: Congratulations!! Now you're home free!

Original: Ester: Oh yeah, the owner told me to give this letter to you when you won.
Dialogue: Oh yeah, the owner told me to give this letter to you when you won.

Original: Dio (letter): Boy, if you're reading this letter, then you must've won. And won a victory that I am sure you earned. I heard about Dyne from Ester. Now that you are victorious, I promise that you and all your friends will get a full pardon, and you all will be set free. And also, by way of apology, I prepared a little gift for you to use on your journey. Sorry I couldn't be there to tell you this in person, but I'm a very busy man. Sincerely, Dio
Dialogue: Boy, if you're reading this letter, then you must've won. And won a victory that I am sure you earned. I heard about Dyne from Ester. Now that you are victorious, I promise that you and all your friends will get a full pardon, and you all will be set free. And also, by way of apology, I prepared a little gift for you to use on your journey. Sorry I couldn't be there to tell you this in person, but I'm a very busy man. Sincerely, Dio

Original: Cloud: A gift?
Dialogue: A gift?

Original: Aeris (through PHS): Cloud, isn't this great!? The assistant manager just stopped by and dropped off a 'buggy' for you! Now you can go over 'deserts' and 'rivers' no problem. OK, Cloud. I'll be waiting outside.
Dialogue: Cloud, isn't this great!? The assistant manager just stopped by and dropped off a 'buggy' for you! Now you can go over 'deserts' and 'rivers' no problem. OK, Cloud. I'll be waiting outside.

Original: Cloud: (Hmm? The letter continues...)
Dialogue: (Hmm? The letter continues...)

Original: Dio (letter): P.S. I just recently met Sephiroth. He must have a lot of fans with boys your age. Why don't you get his autograph? It seems he's headed toward the South of the river, towards Gongaga.
Dialogue: P.S. I just recently met Sephiroth. He must have a lot of fans with boys your age. Why don't you get his autograph? It seems he's headed toward the South of the river, towards Gongaga.

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth...
Dialogue: Sephiroth...

Original: Ester: I guess this is goodbye. Yeah. Well, if you ever get your own Race Chocobo, come back again. I'll take care of your registration and everything. I'll see you again.
Dialogue: I guess this is goodbye. Yeah. Well, if you ever get your own Race Chocobo, come back again. I'll take care of your registration and everything. I'll see you again.

Original: On-screen: How to drive the buggy Press the [OK] button to get on. Press the [CANCEL] button to get off. Buggy's can cross shallow rivers and deserts. You can even enter Costa del Sol and Junon by buggy, by hitching a ride on the 'Cargo Ship'.
Dialogue: How to drive the buggy Press the [OK] button to get on. Press the [CANCEL] button to get off. Buggy's can cross shallow rivers and deserts. You can even enter Costa del Sol and Junon by buggy, by hitching a ride on the 'Cargo Ship'.

Original: Cloud: Oh man...a breakdown? Now?
Dialogue: Oh man...a breakdown? Now?

Original: Cloud: ...Is someone there?
Dialogue: ...Is someone there?

Original: Reno: Hey, Rude. Who do you like?
Dialogue: Hey, Rude. Who do you like?

Original: Reno: What are you getting so embarrassed about? Come on? Who do you like?
Dialogue: What are you getting so embarrassed about? Come on? Who do you like?

Original: Rude: .........Tifa.
Reno: Hmmmm... That's a tough one. But, poor Elena. She......you......
Dialogue: Hmmmm... That's a tough one. But, poor Elena. She......you......

Original: Rude: No, she likes Tseng.
Dialogue: No, she likes Tseng.

Original: Reno: I never knew that! But Tseng likes that Ancient...
Dialogue: I never knew that! But Tseng likes that Ancient...

Original: Cloud: What are they talking about?
Dialogue: What are they talking about?

Original: Elena: It's so stupid! They always talk about who they like or don't like. But Tseng is different.
Dialogue: It's so stupid! They always talk about who they like or don't like. But Tseng is different.

Original: Elena: Ah! Oh no!
Dialogue: Ah! Oh no!

Original: Elena: They're here! They're really here!
Dialogue: They're here! They're really here!

Original: Reno: Hmm... Then it's time...
Dialogue: Hmm... Then it's time...

Original: Reno: Rude...Don't go easy on them even though they're girls.
Dialogue: Rude...Don't go easy on them even though they're girls.

Original: Rude: ...Don't worry, I'll do my job.
Dialogue: ...Don't worry, I'll do my job.

Original: Elena: Then, we're counting on you. I'll report to Tseng!
Dialogue: Then, we're counting on you. I'll report to Tseng!

Original: Reno: It's been a while.
Dialogue: It's been a while.

Original: Reno: Payback time for what you did in Sector 7.
Dialogue: Payback time for what you did in Sector 7.

Original: Reno: That's sad.
Dialogue: That's sad.

Original: Rude: That's as far as you go.
Dialogue: That's as far as you go.

Original: Reno: I don't like being taken for a fool.
Dialogue: I don't like being taken for a fool.

Original: Rude: That's as far as you go.
Dialogue: That's as far as you go.

Original: Rude: That's as far as you go.
Dialogue: That's as far as you go.

Original: Reno: This is just part of the job. Don't take it personally.
Dialogue: This is just part of the job. Don't take it personally.

Original: Reno: We may be retreating, but... we're still victorious.
Dialogue: We may be retreating, but... we're still victorious.

Original: Barret: I don't like it. How'd they find out where we were?
Dialogue: I don't like it. How'd they find out where we were?

Original: Tifa: Hey, something seems wrong, Like they knew we were coming.
Dialogue: Hey, something seems wrong, Like they knew we were coming.

Original: Aeris: ...How could they know we were coming here.
Dialogue: ...How could they know we were coming here.

Original: Red XIII(before "In the Land of the Study of Planet Life"): Interesting... They were definitely waiting for us.
Dialogue: Interesting... They were definitely waiting for us.

Original: Red XIII(after "In the Land of the Study of Planet Life"): Hey, Cloud. How did the Turks know to wait and ambush us here?
Dialogue: Hey, Cloud. How did the Turks know to wait and ambush us here?

Original: Cait Sith: How'd they know that we were here?
Dialogue: How'd they know that we were here?

Original: Yuffie: I don't like this! It's like the whole world knows where we're going.
Dialogue: I don't like this! It's like the whole world knows where we're going.

Original: Vincent: How did they know that we were here...
Dialogue: How did they know that we were here...

Original: Cid: Man, looks like they've taken a short cut.
Dialogue: Man, looks like they've taken a short cut.

Original: Cloud: They followed us...... But there weren't any signs of it. Then, that means......
Dialogue: They followed us...... But there weren't any signs of it. Then, that means......

Original: Barret: A spy, maybe? No, no way.
Dialogue: A spy, maybe? No, no way.

Original: Tifa: A spy!?...No way.
Dialogue: A spy!?...No way.

Original: Aeris: That there's a Shinra spy...
Dialogue: That there's a Shinra spy...

Original: Red XIII(before "In the Land of the Study of Planet Life"): ......someone's been informing them.
Dialogue: ......someone's been informing them.

Original: Red XIII(after "In the Land of the Study of Planet Life"): ...You think someone told the Shinra about us?
Dialogue: ...You think someone told the Shinra about us?

Original: Yuffie: Maybe it's someone in this group?
Dialogue: Maybe it's someone in this group?

Original: Cait Sith: You don't think there's a spy, do you Cloud? I hate this. Now everyone's gonna blame me because I'm new.
Dialogue: You don't think there's a spy, do you Cloud? I hate this. Now everyone's gonna blame me because I'm new.

Original: Vincent: Means there's a Shinra spy...?
Dialogue: Means there's a Shinra spy...?

Original: Cid: And a couple of Shinra dogs are here too!
Dialogue: And a couple of Shinra dogs are here too!

Original: Cloud: I don't even want to think that there's a spy... I trust everyone.
Dialogue: I don't even want to think that there's a spy... I trust everyone.

Original: Cloud: A ruined reactor.
