Dialogue: A ruined reactor.

Original: Cloud: It's Scarlet, Head of Shinra Weapon Development.
Dialogue: It's Scarlet, Head of Shinra Weapon Development.

Original: Scarlet: ......Hmph! This isn't any good either. You only get junky materia from junky reactors.
Dialogue: ......Hmph! This isn't any good either. You only get junky materia from junky reactors.

Original: Scarlet: This reactor's a failure. What I'm looking for is big, large, huge materia. You seen any?
Dialogue: This reactor's a failure. What I'm looking for is big, large, huge materia. You seen any?

Original: Tseng: ...No I haven't seen it. I'll get on it right away.
Dialogue: ...No I haven't seen it. I'll get on it right away.

Original: Scarlet: Please. We could make the ultimate weapon if we only had some.
Dialogue: Please. We could make the ultimate weapon if we only had some.

Original: Tseng: I just can't wait.
Dialogue: I just can't wait.

Original: Scarlet: With Hojo gone, the Weapon Development's been getting a bigger budget.
Dialogue: With Hojo gone, the Weapon Development's been getting a bigger budget.

Original: Tseng: I envy them.
Dialogue: I envy them.

Original: Scarlet: But, even if we make the perfect weapon, could that stupid Heidegger even use it?
Dialogue: But, even if we make the perfect weapon, could that stupid Heidegger even use it?

Original: Tseng: ......
Scarlet: Oh...sorry! I forgot Heidegger was your boss! Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Oh...sorry! I forgot Heidegger was your boss! Ha ha ha!

Original: Tseng: ......
Scarlet: Let's go!
Dialogue: Let's go!

Original: Cloud: ...Big, large, huge materia? An ultimate weapon? The perfect weapon? Just what are the Shinra up to...?
Dialogue: ...Big, large, huge materia? An ultimate weapon? The perfect weapon? Just what are the Shinra up to...?

Original: Cloud: There's something shiny back there...
Dialogue: There's something shiny back there...

Original: On-screen: Received "Titan" Materia!
Dialogue: Received "Titan" Materia!

Original: NPC 1: You a traveller? Hey wait, that glare in your eye... you in SOLDIER?
Dialogue: You a traveller? Hey wait, that glare in your eye... you in SOLDIER?

Original: NPC 2: Oh you're right! Don't you know anything about our son?
Dialogue: Oh you're right! Don't you know anything about our son?

Original: NPC 1: His name is Zack.
Dialogue: His name is Zack.

Original: NPC 2: It's been close to 10 years since he left for the city, saying that he didn't want to live in the country...
Dialogue: It's been close to 10 years since he left for the city, saying that he didn't want to live in the country...

Original: NPC 1: He left saying he's going to join SOLDIER. You ever hear of a Zack in SOLDIER?
Dialogue: He left saying he's going to join SOLDIER. You ever hear of a Zack in SOLDIER?

Original: Cloud: Hmmm...I don't know.
Dialogue: Hmmm...I don't know.

Original: Aeris: Zack...
Dialogue: Zack...

Original: NPC 1: Young lady, you know him?
Dialogue: Young lady, you know him?

Original: NPC 2: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?
Dialogue: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?

Original: Aeris: That can't...
Dialogue: That can't...

Original: Tifa: Zack...
Dialogue: Zack...

Original: Cloud: What happened to you two?
Dialogue: What happened to you two?

Original: Aeris: Zack...
Dialogue: Zack...

Original: NPC 1: Young lady, you know him?
Dialogue: Young lady, you know him?

Original: NPC 2: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?
Dialogue: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?

Original: Aeris: That can't...
Dialogue: That can't...

Original: Cloud: Aeris...
Dialogue: Aeris...

Original: Tifa: Zack...
Dialogue: Zack...

Original: NPC 1: Young lady, you know him?
Dialogue: Young lady, you know him?

Original: NPC 2: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?
Dialogue: I remember he wrote us 6 or 7 years ago saying that he had a girlfriend. Could that have been you?

Original: Tifa: ...No, it wasn't.
Dialogue: ...No, it wasn't.

Original: Cloud: Tifa... What happened?
Dialogue: Tifa... What happened?

Original: Cloud: ...Zack. Zack. I don't know anything about that man. ......But That name sounds familiar... Why...!?
Dialogue: ...Zack. Zack. I don't know anything about that man. ......But That name sounds familiar... Why...!?

Original: NPC: Have you ever met someone in SOLDIER named Zack?
Dialogue: Have you ever met someone in SOLDIER named Zack?

Original: NPC: I can't believe he hasn't contacted us in 10 years...! ...After all, we're his parents.
Dialogue: I can't believe he hasn't contacted us in 10 years...! ...After all, we're his parents.

Original: Cloud: Aeris...
Dialogue: Aeris...

Original: Aeris: What a shock... I didn't know Zack was from this town.
Dialogue: What a shock... I didn't know Zack was from this town.

Original: Cloud: You know him?
Dialogue: You know him?

Original: Aeris: Didn't I tell you? He was my first love.
Dialogue: Didn't I tell you? He was my first love.

Original: Aeris: Zack... SOLDIER First Class. Same as Cloud.
Dialogue: Zack... SOLDIER First Class. Same as Cloud.

Original: Cloud: Strange, there aren't that many who make First Class, but I've never heard of him.
Dialogue: Strange, there aren't that many who make First Class, but I've never heard of him.

Original: Aeris: That's all right. It's all in the past now. I was just worried because I heard he's been missing.
Dialogue: That's all right. It's all in the past now. I was just worried because I heard he's been missing.

Original: Cloud: Missing?
Dialogue: Missing?

Original: Aeris: I think it was 5 years ago. He went out on a job, and never came back. He loved women, a real lady's man. He probably found someone else...
Dialogue: I think it was 5 years ago. He went out on a job, and never came back. He loved women, a real lady's man. He probably found someone else...

Original: Aeris: Hey? What's wrong?
Dialogue: Hey? What's wrong?

Original: Aeris: I don't really mind that I haven't heard from him. But I feel for his parents.
Dialogue: I don't really mind that I haven't heard from him. But I feel for his parents.

Original: Aeris: Are you...jealous? Hmm? Hmmm? Are you, Cloud?
Dialogue: Are you...jealous? Hmm? Hmmm? Are you, Cloud?

Original: Aeris: I'm kidding. I'm sorry.
Dialogue: I'm kidding. I'm sorry.

Original: Aeris: I was hoping maybe you were...
Dialogue: I was hoping maybe you were...

Original: Aeris: Let's go, Cloud.
Dialogue: Let's go, Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Zack......
Dialogue: Zack......

Original: Cloud: Do you know him?
Dialogue: Do you know him?

Original: Tifa: N, no, I don't know him!
Dialogue: N, no, I don't know him!

Original: Cloud: Your face tells me differently.
Dialogue: Your face tells me differently.

Original: Tifa: I told you, I don't!
Dialogue: I told you, I don't!

Original: Cloud: A, all right.
Dialogue: A, all right.

Original: Tifa: That sounds just like you, leaving town, and saying 'I'm joining SOLDIER!'.
Dialogue: That sounds just like you, leaving town, and saying 'I'm joining SOLDIER!'.

Original: Cloud: There were a lot of guys like that back then.
Dialogue: There were a lot of guys like that back then.

Original: Tifa: You must really be something making it in SOLDIER out of a group like that. I really respect you...
Dialogue: You must really be something making it in SOLDIER out of a group like that. I really respect you...

Original: Tifa: Don't be so humble!
Dialogue: Don't be so humble!

Original: Tifa: Hard work pays off, huh.
Dialogue: Hard work pays off, huh.

Original: Tifa: You know... I'm as proud of Cloud joining SOLDIER as if it were me.
Dialogue: You know... I'm as proud of Cloud joining SOLDIER as if it were me.

Original: Tifa: Cloud, thanks for caring.
Dialogue: Cloud, thanks for caring.

Original: Red XIII: I am home! It is I, Nanaki!
Dialogue: I am home! It is I, Nanaki!

Original: NPC: Hey, Nanaki! You're safe! Come on, and say hello to Bugenhagen!
Dialogue: Hey, Nanaki! You're safe! Come on, and say hello to Bugenhagen!

Original: Cloud: ...Nanaki?
Dialogue: ...Nanaki?

Original: Barret: I finally made it... So this is...Cosmo Canyon!
Dialogue: I finally made it... So this is...Cosmo Canyon!

Original: Tifa: Red XIII seems different, doesn't he?
Dialogue: Red XIII seems different, doesn't he?

Original: Aeris: Cosmo...Canyon? I wonder if there's any relation to the planet or the Ancients...
Dialogue: Cosmo...Canyon? I wonder if there's any relation to the planet or the Ancients...

Original: Yuffie: Hmmm... Any Materia? Any Materia around?
Dialogue: Hmmm... Any Materia? Any Materia around?

Original: Cait Sith: Hmmm...So this is Cosmo Canyon.
Dialogue: Hmmm...So this is Cosmo Canyon.

Original: NPC: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Are you familiar with this land?
Dialogue: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon. Are you familiar with this land?

Original: NPC: You lied. That is something that is not treated lightly here in Cosmo Canyon.
Dialogue: You lied. That is something that is not treated lightly here in Cosmo Canyon.

Original: NPC: Let me explain. People from all over the world gather here to seek the Study of Planet Life.
Dialogue: Let me explain. People from all over the world gather here to seek the Study of Planet Life.

Original: Barret: Wooooooooo! I always wanted to come here!
Dialogue: Wooooooooo! I always wanted to come here!

Original: NPC: Ummgah! It's full capacity at present, so I'm afraid I can't let you enter.
Dialogue: Ummgah! It's full capacity at present, so I'm afraid I can't let you enter.

Original: Red XIII: They helped me some when I was on the road. Please let them in.
Dialogue: They helped me some when I was on the road. Please let them in.

Original: NPC: ...Oh, is that so? You helped our Nanaki? Please, come in.
Dialogue: ...Oh, is that so? You helped our Nanaki? Please, come in.

Original: Cloud: Who is Nanaki?
Dialogue: Who is Nanaki?

Original: NPC: Nanaki is Nanaki. That's his name.
Dialogue: Nanaki is Nanaki. That's his name.

Original: Red XIII: Here is where I was...I mean, ...this is my hometown. My tribe were protectors of those who appreciate this beautiful canyon and the Planet. My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her...... I am the last of my race.
Dialogue: Here is where I was...I mean, ...this is my hometown. My tribe were protectors of those who appreciate this beautiful canyon and the Planet. My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her...... I am the last of my race.

Original: Cloud: Cowardly father?
Dialogue: Cowardly father?

Original: Red XIII: Yes. My father was a wastrel. And so the mission I inherited from my ancestors, is to protect this place. My journey ends here.
Dialogue: Yes. My father was a wastrel. And so the mission I inherited from my ancestors, is to protect this place. My journey ends here.

Original: Bugenhagen: Hey! Nanaki--! You're home!
Dialogue: Hey! Nanaki--! You're home!

Original: Red XIII: Coming, Grandpa!
Dialogue: Coming, Grandpa!

Original: Barret: Good timin'. Let's take a breather. I got stuff I want to find out, too.
Dialogue: Good timin'. Let's take a breather. I got stuff I want to find out, too.

Original: Tifa: That's perfect. Why don't we take a break too? We can meet back here in a while, OK?
Dialogue: That's perfect. Why don't we take a break too? We can meet back here in a while, OK?

Original: Aeris: Let's rest for a bit. There are some things I want to find out about anyway.
Dialogue: Let's rest for a bit. There are some things I want to find out about anyway.

Original: Yuffie: Rest, rest, rest! I wanna rest! There! It's decided!
Dialogue: Rest, rest, rest! I wanna rest! There! It's decided!

Original: Cait Sith: I'm just dead tired. Everyone, how 'bout some rest?
Dialogue: I'm just dead tired. Everyone, how 'bout some rest?

Original: Aeris: Maybe there are some people here that know about the Promised Land and the Ancients.
Dialogue: Maybe there are some people here that know about the Promised Land and the Ancients.

Original: Tifa: Red XIII...... I wonder what's happened to Red XIII...? He's as excited as a little boy.
Dialogue: Red XIII...... I wonder what's happened to Red XIII...? He's as excited as a little boy.

Original: Barret: There was this guy who studied 'Planetary Life' here. He couldn't take things the way they were, so he went to Midgar to form AVALANCHE. Wanna hear more?
Dialogue: There was this guy who studied 'Planetary Life' here. He couldn't take things the way they were, so he went to Midgar to form AVALANCHE. Wanna hear more?

Original: Barret: Guess you could say this is where AVALANCHE was born. I always wanted to come here... And...I finally......made it. A lot...happened...
Dialogue: Guess you could say this is where AVALANCHE was born. I always wanted to come here... And...I finally......made it. A lot...happened...

Original: Barret: And then...? I don't know what's going to happen, now that there is no AVALANCHE...
Dialogue: And then...? I don't know what's going to happen, now that there is no AVALANCHE...

Original: Yuffie: Oh man! This place looks like a real drag. And their Materia sucks, too.
Dialogue: Oh man! This place looks like a real drag. And their Materia sucks, too.

Original: Cait Sith: Hmm, this place seems like it has a lot of secrets. So, when's dinner?
Dialogue: Hmm, this place seems like it has a lot of secrets. So, when's dinner?

Original: Red XIII: Cloud, this is my grandfather, Bugen. He is incredible. He knows everything.
Dialogue: Cloud, this is my grandfather, Bugen. He is incredible. He knows everything.

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. I hear that you looked after Nanaki a bit. Nanaki is still a child you see.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. I hear that you looked after Nanaki a bit. Nanaki is still a child you see.

Original: Red XIII: Please stop, grandfather. I'm 48.
Dialogue: Please stop, grandfather. I'm 48.

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity. So you see his 48 years would only be equivalent to say that of a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity. So you see his 48 years would only be equivalent to say that of a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning.

Original: Cloud: 15 or 16!?
Bugenhagen: He's quiet and very deep. You thought he was an adult?
Dialogue: He's quiet and very deep. You thought he was an adult?

Original: Red XIII: ......grandfather. I want to be an adult. I want to grow up to be able to protect you and the village.
Dialogue: ......grandfather. I want to be an adult. I want to grow up to be able to protect you and the village.

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. No Nanaki. You can't stand on your own yet. To do that now would destroy you in the long run. Reaching up into the heavens, threatening to snatch the very stars from the great city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. No Nanaki. You can't stand on your own yet. To do that now would destroy you in the long run. Reaching up into the heavens, threatening to snatch the very stars from the great city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?

Original: Bugenhagen: Well, that's a bad example. Looking up too much makes you lose perspective. When it's time for this planet to die, you'll understand that you know absolutely nothing.
Dialogue: Well, that's a bad example. Looking up too much makes you lose perspective. When it's time for this planet to die, you'll understand that you know absolutely nothing.

Original: Cloud: ......When the planet dies?
Dialogue: ......When the planet dies?

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now... But it's not long off.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now... But it's not long off.

Original: Cloud: How do you know this?
Dialogue: How do you know this?

Original: Bugenhagen: I hear the cries of the Planet.
Dialogue: I hear the cries of the Planet.

Original: Cloud: What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Bugenhagen: The sounds of the stars in the heavens. While this goes on, planets are born, and die.
Dialogue: The sounds of the stars in the heavens. While this goes on, planets are born, and die.

Original: Cloud: What was that?
Dialogue: What was that?

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. That was a scream from this planet. Didn't you hear it? As if to say... I hurt, I suffer......
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. That was a scream from this planet. Didn't you hear it? As if to say... I hurt, I suffer......

Original: Red XIII: They have come here on a journey to save the planet. Why don't you show them your apparatus?
Dialogue: They have come here on a journey to save the planet. Why don't you show them your apparatus?

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!

Original: Bugenhagen: But, then again, I guess it wouldn't hurt to show him.
Dialogue: But, then again, I guess it wouldn't hurt to show him.

Original: NPC: Bugenhagen! Several odd looking people have come.
Dialogue: Bugenhagen! Several odd looking people have come.

Original: Bugenhagen: The whole place has gotten busy all of a sudden.
Dialogue: The whole place has gotten busy all of a sudden.

Original: Red XIII: He brought friends too. I'll go get them.
Dialogue: He brought friends too. I'll go get them.

Original: Red XIII: Cloud, please call one of them. Only three people can fit in grandfather's machine.
Dialogue: Cloud, please call one of them. Only three people can fit in grandfather's machine.

Original: Bugenhagen: Don't worry. My machine won't run away. You go and invite your friends.
Dialogue: Don't worry. My machine won't run away. You go and invite your friends.

Original: Aeris: Hmm?
Dialogue: Hmm?

Original: Tifa: Are you going somewhere?
Dialogue: Are you going somewhere?

Original: Barret: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Yuffie: God. I HATE studying!
Dialogue: God. I HATE studying!

Original: Cait Sith: What did they say?
Dialogue: What did they say?

Original: Red XIII: Don't worry about me. I've seen it many times. It's my first time back in a while. Let me rest for a bit...
Dialogue: Don't worry about me. I've seen it many times. It's my first time back in a while. Let me rest for a bit...

Original: Bugenhagen: Here, over here. The door's unlocked, come on in.
Dialogue: Here, over here. The door's unlocked, come on in.

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. It looks like you have them all together. Then let's begin. I'll be stand there.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. It looks like you have them all together. Then let's begin. I'll be stand there.

Original: Aeris: So pretty...It's just like the real thing!
Dialogue: So pretty...It's just like the real thing!

Original: Tifa: Wow! It's just like the real thing!
Dialogue: Wow! It's just like the real thing!

Original: Yuffie: Woa! Wooooah! Pretty good, surprisin' me!
Dialogue: Woa! Wooooah! Pretty good, surprisin' me!

Original: Barret: This is really somethin'!
Dialogue: This is really somethin'!

Original: Bugenhagen: Hmm, yes pretty good. This is my laboratory. All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
Dialogue: Hmm, yes pretty good. This is my laboratory. All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.

Original: Aeris: Hey! A shooting star!
Dialogue: Hey! A shooting star!

Original: Aeris: Wow, how wonderful.
Dialogue: Wow, how wonderful.

Original: Tifa: Look, look! A shooting star!
Dialogue: Look, look! A shooting star!

Original: Tifa: Oh! This is amazing!!
Dialogue: Oh! This is amazing!!

Original: Yuffie: Wh, what the? A shooting star?
Dialogue: Wh, what the? A shooting star?

Original: Yuffie: Whew!!
Dialogue: Whew!!

Original: Barret: Whoa! Shootin' stars!
Dialogue: Whoa! Shootin' stars!

Original: Barret: This's really somethin'!
Dialogue: This's really somethin'!

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something, isn't it? Well, let's get to the subject.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something, isn't it? Well, let's get to the subject.

Original: Bugenhagen: Eventually...all humans die. What happens to them after they die? The body decomposes, and returns to the Planet. That much everyone knows. What about their consciousness, their hearts and their souls?
Dialogue: Eventually...all humans die. What happens to them after they die? The body decomposes, and returns to the Planet. That much everyone knows. What about their consciousness, their hearts and their souls?

Original: Bugenhagen: The soul too returns to the Planet. And not only those of humans, but everything on this Planet. In fact, all living things in the universe, are the same. The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet. They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.
Dialogue: The soul too returns to the Planet. And not only those of humans, but everything on this Planet. In fact, all living things in the universe, are the same. The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet. They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.

Original: Bugenhagen: Lifestream... In other words, a path of energy of the souls roaming the Planet. 'Spirit Energy' is a word that you should never forget. A new life...children are blessed with Spirit energy and are brought into the world. Then, the time comes when they die and once again return to the Planet... Of course there are exceptions, but this is the way of the world.
Dialogue: Lifestream... In other words, a path of energy of the souls roaming the Planet. 'Spirit Energy' is a word that you should never forget. A new life...children are blessed with Spirit energy and are brought into the world. Then, the time comes when they die and once again return to the Planet... Of course there are exceptions, but this is the way of the world.

Original: Bugenhagen: I've digressed, but you'll understand better if you watch this. Spirit energy makes all things possible, trees, birds, and humans. Not just living things. But Spirit energy makes it possible for Planets to be Planets. What happens if that Spirit energy were to disappear?
Dialogue: I've digressed, but you'll understand better if you watch this. Spirit energy makes all things possible, trees, birds, and humans. Not just living things. But Spirit energy makes it possible for Planets to be Planets. What happens if that Spirit energy were to disappear?

Original: Bugenhagen: ......These are the basics of the Study of Planet Life.
Dialogue: ......These are the basics of the Study of Planet Life.

Original: Cloud: If the Spirit energy is lost, our Planet is destroyed...
Dialogue: If the Spirit energy is lost, our Planet is destroyed...

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature. When Spirit energy is forcefully extracted, and manufactured, it can't accomplish its true purpose.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Spirit energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature. When Spirit energy is forcefully extracted, and manufactured, it can't accomplish its true purpose.

Original: Cloud: You're talking about Mako energy, right?
Dialogue: You're talking about Mako energy, right?

Original: Bugenhagen: Everyday Mako reactors suck up Spirit energy, diminishing it. Spirit energy gets compressed in the reactors and processed into Mako energy. All living things are being used up and thrown away. In other words, Mako energy will only destroy the Planet...
Dialogue: Everyday Mako reactors suck up Spirit energy, diminishing it. Spirit energy gets compressed in the reactors and processed into Mako energy. All living things are being used up and thrown away. In other words, Mako energy will only destroy the Planet...

Original: Bugenhagen: The story of the planets... and those who lived with them... You want to know more? Then you must listen to the words of the elders.
Dialogue: The story of the planets... and those who lived with them... You want to know more? Then you must listen to the words of the elders.

Original: Bugenhagen: Nanaki? His father a coward? So that's it... Nanaki's been thinking that all this time...
Dialogue: Nanaki? His father a coward? So that's it... Nanaki's been thinking that all this time...

Original: Red XIII: ......
Tifa: Cloud... Bonfires are funny, aren't they? They make you remember all sorts of things.
Dialogue: Cloud... Bonfires are funny, aren't they? They make you remember all sorts of things.

Original: Tifa: You know, Cloud. 5 Years ago...
Dialogue: You know, Cloud. 5 Years ago...

Original: Tifa: ......It's nothing. No, forget it. I'm afraid to ask...
Dialogue: ......It's nothing. No, forget it. I'm afraid to ask...

Original: Cloud: What is it...?
Dialogue: What is it...?

Original: Tifa: It feels like... it feels like you're going far away... You really, really are...... you...right?
Dialogue: It feels like... it feels like you're going far away... You really, really are...... you...right?

Original: Barret: Cosmo Canyon... This's where AVALANCHE was born... I promised my guys someday... when we saved the planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate... Biggs... Wedge... Jessie... Now they're all gone... died for the planet.
Dialogue: Cosmo Canyon... This's where AVALANCHE was born... I promised my guys someday... when we saved the planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate... Biggs... Wedge... Jessie... Now they're all gone... died for the planet.

Original: Barret: ...Really? To save the planet? We all... we all hate the Shinra... Do I even got a to go on? Will they...... ...will they ever forgive me?
Dialogue: ...Really? To save the planet? We all... we all hate the Shinra... Do I even got a to go on? Will they...... ...will they ever forgive me?

Original: Barret: ...Right now, I really don't know. But I know one thing. If there's anything I can do, to save the planet...or the people livin' on it... Then I'm gonna do it! I don't care if it's for justice or revenge, or whatever. I don't care......let 'em decide for 'emselves.
Dialogue: ...Right now, I really don't know. But I know one thing. If there's anything I can do, to save the planet...or the people livin' on it... Then I'm gonna do it! I don't care if it's for justice or revenge, or whatever. I don't care......let 'em decide for 'emselves.

Original: Barret: Urrrrrgh! I'm gonna do it!! Again... Again...AVALANCHE's born again!
Dialogue: Urrrrrgh! I'm gonna do it!! Again... Again...AVALANCHE's born again!

Original: Yuffie: What a boring place, just like I thought. I wanna go somewhere! Let's go find some Materia!
Dialogue: What a boring place, just like I thought. I wanna go somewhere! Let's go find some Materia!

Original: Cait Sith: I wonder how many years it's been... Gosh, it brings back memories......
Dialogue: I wonder how many years it's been... Gosh, it brings back memories......

Original: Aeris: I learned a lot. The elders taught me many things. About the Cetra... And the Promised Land... I'm......alone... I'm all alone now...
Dialogue: I learned a lot. The elders taught me many things. About the Cetra... And the Promised Land... I'm......alone... I'm all alone now...

Original: Cloud: But I'm......we're here for you, right?
Dialogue: But I'm......we're here for you, right?

Original: Aeris: I know. I know, but... I am the only......Cetra.
Dialogue: I know. I know, but... I am the only......Cetra.

Original: Cloud: Does that mean we can't help?
Dialogue: Does that mean we can't help?

Original: Aeris: ......
Red XIII: ...Long ago. ...When I was still very small. We were all around this flame...
Dialogue: ...Long ago. ...When I was still very small. We were all around this flame...

Original: Red XIII: No, never mind...
Dialogue: No, never mind...

Original: Cloud: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Red XIII: It's about my parents. When I talk about my mother, I am full of pride and joy... And that's fine. ...But when I remember my father, my heart is full of anger...
Dialogue: It's about my parents. When I talk about my mother, I am full of pride and joy... And that's fine. ...But when I remember my father, my heart is full of anger...

Original: Bugenhagen: ...You really can't forgive your father...?
Dialogue: ...You really can't forgive your father...?

Original: Red XIII: Of course. He......left mother for dead. When the Gi tribe attacked, he ran off by himself, leaving mother and the people of the Canyon!
Dialogue: Of course. He......left mother for dead. When the Gi tribe attacked, he ran off by himself, leaving mother and the people of the Canyon!

Original: Bugenhagen: ...Come, Nanaki. There's something you should see.
Dialogue: ...Come, Nanaki. There's something you should see.

Original: Red XIII: ...?
Bugenhagen: The place may be dangerous.
Dialogue: The place may be dangerous.

Original: Bugenhagen: Cloud. Will you and one other person come with us?
Dialogue: Cloud. Will you and one other person come with us?

Original: Barret: ...Where're they going?
Dialogue: ...Where're they going?

Original: Tifa: Can I go too?
Dialogue: Can I go too?

Original: Aeris: I wonder what he wants to show Red XIII...?
Dialogue: I wonder what he wants to show Red XIII...?

Original: Yuffie: Does he want to show him THAT? You know, maybe there's some Materia that's been passed on for generations in this Canyon!?
Dialogue: Does he want to show him THAT? You know, maybe there's some Materia that's been passed on for generations in this Canyon!?

Original: Cait Sith: Dangerous? Count me out......
Dialogue: Dangerous? Count me out......

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo

Original: Bugenhagen: Are we all set?
Dialogue: Are we all set?

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Shall we go?
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Shall we go?

Original: Bugenhagen: All right. Come in, come in.
Dialogue: All right. Come in, come in.

Original: Red XIII: Hey? Aren't you going with us, Grandpa?
Dialogue: Hey? Aren't you going with us, Grandpa?

Original: Bugenhagen: What are you crazy? It's dangerous in there. I told you that! You want an old man like me should go first? I'll be right behind you.
Dialogue: What are you crazy? It's dangerous in there. I told you that! You want an old man like me should go first? I'll be right behind you.

Original: Bugenhagen: Not ready yet? Tell me when you are ready.
Dialogue: Not ready yet? Tell me when you are ready.

Original: Bugenhagen: What is it, you're going back? I'll be waiting here for you when you're ready. I can't leave this door open forever.
Dialogue: What is it, you're going back? I'll be waiting here for you when you're ready. I can't leave this door open forever.

Original: Cloud: This is a strange looking rock...
Dialogue: This is a strange looking rock...

Original: Cloud: Funny looking rock...
Dialogue: Funny looking rock...

Original: Cloud: A strange shaped rock...
Dialogue: A strange shaped rock...

Original: Cloud:An odd shaped rock...
Dialogue: An odd shaped rock...

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe. Killed in a certain battle.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe. Killed in a certain battle.

Original: Red XIII: A certain battle...?
Dialogue: A certain battle...?

Original: Bugenhagen: The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream...
Dialogue: The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream...

Original: Bugenhagen: We still have far to go. Ho Ho Hoooo.
Dialogue: We still have far to go. Ho Ho Hoooo.

Original: Bugenhagen: As you can see, this cave leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon. It was unfortunate that the Gi were larger than us. If they attacked through here, we wouldn't have stood a chance.
Dialogue: As you can see, this cave leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon. It was unfortunate that the Gi were larger than us. If they attacked through here, we wouldn't have stood a chance.

Original: Red XIII: .......
Bugenhagen: Let's move on.
Dialogue: Let's move on.

Original: Bugenhagen: This warrior went through the cave all alone. Fighting attackers one after another...
Dialogue: This warrior went through the cave all alone. Fighting attackers one after another...

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa...... That warrior...
Dialogue: Grandpa...... That warrior...

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo... We're almost there.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo... We're almost there.

Original: Bugenhagen: What is this......?
Dialogue: What is this......?

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa, is he...!?
Dialogue: Grandpa, is he...!?

Original: Bugenhagen: After death... The ghosts of the Gi... Like stagnant air...... This...can't be!!
Dialogue: After death... The ghosts of the Gi... Like stagnant air...... This...can't be!!

Original: Bugenhagen: ...Thank you, Cloud. Because of you, we survived. Nanaki, you have grown strong, too.
Dialogue: ...Thank you, Cloud. Because of you, we survived. Nanaki, you have grown strong, too.

Original: Red XIII: ......Oh yeah?
Dialogue: ......Oh yeah?

Original: Bugenhagen: Now I know that it wasn't a mistake bringing you here...
Dialogue: Now I know that it wasn't a mistake bringing you here...

Original: Bugenhagen: Come, I have something I want to show you. Right over here.
Dialogue: Come, I have something I want to show you. Right over here.

Original: Red XIII: This is...
Dialogue: This is...

Original: Bugenhagen: ...The warrior who fought against the Gi. He kept them from taking even one step into Cosmo Canyon. But he was never able to return to town...
Dialogue: ...The warrior who fought against the Gi. He kept them from taking even one step into Cosmo Canyon. But he was never able to return to town...

Original: Bugenhagen: Look, Nanaki. Look at your father, at the warrior, Seto.
Dialogue: Look, Nanaki. Look at your father, at the warrior, Seto.

Original: Red XIII: ...That... That's ......Seto...?
Dialogue: ...That... That's ......Seto...?

Original: Bugenhagen: Seto continued to fight the Gi tribe here. ...To protect this Canyon. Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows turned his body to stone...... Even after they all ran away... Seto, continued to protect us. And he continues to protect us, even now.
Dialogue: Seto continued to fight the Gi tribe here. ...To protect this Canyon. Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows turned his body to stone...... Even after they all ran away... Seto, continued to protect us. And he continues to protect us, even now.

Original: Red XIII: Even now...
Dialogue: Even now...

Original: Bugenhagen: You thought that he was a coward and ran away. But he, alone risked his life to protect Cosmo Canyon. That is your father, Seto.
Dialogue: You thought that he was a coward and ran away. But he, alone risked his life to protect Cosmo Canyon. That is your father, Seto.

Original: Red XIII: That......that is Seto? ...!? Did mother know?
Dialogue: That......that is Seto? ...!? Did mother know?

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo...She knew. The two of them made me promise to keep this cave shut. They asked me to seal it myself and not to tell a soul. They said we should forget about this cave.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo...She knew. The two of them made me promise to keep this cave shut. They asked me to seal it myself and not to tell a soul. They said we should forget about this cave.

Original: Red XIII: .........
Bugenhagen: Cloud... Would you mind leaving the two of us alone?
Dialogue: Cloud... Would you mind leaving the two of us alone?

Original: Bugenhagen: Nanaki. I want you to continue your journey with Cloud and the others.
Dialogue: Nanaki. I want you to continue your journey with Cloud and the others.

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa!?
Dialogue: Grandpa!?

Original: Bugenhagen: Listen, Nanaki. Cloud says they are trying to save the planet. Honestly, I don't think it can be done. For even if they stop every reactor on the planet, it's only going to postpone the inevitable. Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.
Dialogue: Listen, Nanaki. Cloud says they are trying to save the planet. Honestly, I don't think it can be done. For even if they stop every reactor on the planet, it's only going to postpone the inevitable. Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.

Original: Bugenhagen: But, Nanaki. I've been thinking lately. I've been thinking if there was anything WE could do, as a part of the planet, something to help a planet already in misery... No matter what happens, isn't it important to try? Am I just wishing against fate?
Dialogue: But, Nanaki. I've been thinking lately. I've been thinking if there was anything WE could do, as a part of the planet, something to help a planet already in misery... No matter what happens, isn't it important to try? Am I just wishing against fate?

Original: Bugenhagen: I am too old to do anything about it... This year, I'll be 130. Ho Ho Hoooo. That is why, Nanaki, you must go with them! For my sake.
Dialogue: I am too old to do anything about it... This year, I'll be 130. Ho Ho Hoooo. That is why, Nanaki, you must go with them! For my sake.

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa...
Dialogue: Grandpa...

Original: Bugenhagen: I wanted to show you your real father before you left... I'm so glad that you came back while I was still alive to show you.
Dialogue: I wanted to show you your real father before you left... I'm so glad that you came back while I was still alive to show you.

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa...don't talk like that. I don't want to think of life... without you......
Dialogue: Grandpa...don't talk like that. I don't want to think of life... without you......

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Well, I've had a long life.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Well, I've had a long life.

Original: Red XIII: Grandpa! You must live!
Dialogue: Grandpa! You must live!

Original: Red XIII: I'll see to it. I'll see to what's happening to the planet. And I'll come back to tell you.
Dialogue: I'll see to it. I'll see to what's happening to the planet. And I'll come back to tell you.

Original: Bugenhagen: Nanaki...
Dialogue: Nanaki...

Original: Red XIII: I am Nanaki of Cosmo Canyon! The son of the warrior, Seto! I'll come back a warrior true to that noble name! So please, Grandpa...
Dialogue: I am Nanaki of Cosmo Canyon! The son of the warrior, Seto! I'll come back a warrior true to that noble name! So please, Grandpa...

Original: Bugenhagen: That's...Seto's...... Seto......
Dialogue: That's...Seto's...... Seto......

Original: Red XIII: Seto...... Fa...Father...
Dialogue: Seto...... Fa...Father...

Original: Barret: They said they finished fixin' the buggy.
Dialogue: They said they finished fixin' the buggy.

Original: Barret: The buggy's fixed, so we can go now.
Dialogue: The buggy's fixed, so we can go now.

Original: Cloud: Shall we get going?
Dialogue: Shall we get going?

Original: Aeris: So this is it, Red XIII...
Dialogue: So this is it, Red XIII...

Original: Barret: That's just the way it goes. ...You came in handy at times...
Dialogue: That's just the way it goes. ...You came in handy at times...

Original: Red XIII: Wait for me! I'm coming too!
Dialogue: Wait for me! I'm coming too!

Original: Cloud: Mmm?
Dialogue: Mmm?

Original: Bugenhagen: Cloud. Please look after Nanaki.
Dialogue: Cloud. Please look after Nanaki.

Original: Cloud: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Red XIII: I think I grew up a little. That's what happened!
Dialogue: I think I grew up a little. That's what happened!

Original: Bugenhagen: Ho Ho Hoooo. Come back whenever you need my knowledge.
Dialogue: Ho Ho Hoooo. Come back whenever you need my knowledge.

Original: Tifa: What---!! This was all supposed to be burnt down, right?
Dialogue: What---!! This was all supposed to be burnt down, right?

Original: Cloud: ...I thought so.
Dialogue: ...I thought so.

Original: Tifa: Then why...? My house is still there too...
Dialogue: Then why...? My house is still there too...

Original: Barret: The hell's goin' on!? This a dream or somethin'?
Dialogue: The hell's goin' on!? This a dream or somethin'?

Original: Aeris: ...somthing's strange?
Dialogue: ...somthing's strange?

Original: Red XIII: I wonder what's going on...
Dialogue: I wonder what's going on...

Original: Yuffie: What the...!?
Dialogue: What the...!?

Original: Cait Sith: Cloud, maybe you were just dreaming...?
Dialogue: Cloud, maybe you were just dreaming...?

Original: Barret: You said the whole town burnt down, right?
Dialogue: You said the whole town burnt down, right?

Original: Aeris: This is Nibelheim, right? But the town's all here.
Dialogue: This is Nibelheim, right? But the town's all here.

Original: Red XIII: This is Nibelheim? I heard it burnt down.
Dialogue: This is Nibelheim? I heard it burnt down.

Original: Yuffie: I heard from someone that this town was gone!
Dialogue: I heard from someone that this town was gone!

Original: Cait Sith: The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth. At least that's what I heard...
Dialogue: The whole town was destroyed by Sephiroth. At least that's what I heard...

Original: Cloud: ...Yeah.
Dialogue: ...Yeah.

Original: Barret: You trin' to fool us!?
Dialogue: You trin' to fool us!?

Original: Aeris: Hey, what's going on?
Dialogue: Hey, what's going on?

Original: Red XIII: Cloud... Did you lie to us?
Dialogue: Cloud... Did you lie to us?

Original: Yuffie: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Cait Sith: Cloud, did you make up your story just to get our support?
Dialogue: Cloud, did you make up your story just to get our support?

Original: Cloud: I'm not lying! I remember...the intense heat of the flames...
Dialogue: I'm not lying! I remember...the intense heat of the flames...

Original: Cloud: Sephiroth!
Dialogue: Sephiroth!

Original: Sephiroth: Being here brings back memories.
Dialogue: Being here brings back memories.

Original: Sephiroth: Are you going to participate in the Reunion?
Dialogue: Are you going to participate in the Reunion?

Original: Cloud: I don't even know what a Reunion is!
Dialogue: I don't even know what a Reunion is!

Original: Sephiroth: Jenova will be at the Reunion. Jenova will join the Reunion becoming a calamity from the skies.
Dialogue: Jenova will be at the Reunion. Jenova will join the Reunion becoming a calamity from the skies.

Original: Cloud: Jenova, a calamity from the skies? You mean she wasn't an Ancient!?
Dialogue: Jenova, a calamity from the skies? You mean she wasn't an Ancient!?

Original: Sephiroth: ...I see. I don't think you have the right to participate. I will go North past Mt. Nibel. If you wish to find out...then follow...
Dialogue: ...I see. I don't think you have the right to participate. I will go North past Mt. Nibel. If you wish to find out...then follow...

Original: Cloud: ...Reunion? Calamity from the skies?
Dialogue: ...Reunion? Calamity from the skies?

Original: Cloud: What's that...!?
Dialogue: What's that...!?

Original: Cloud: A rusty old rocket... Wonder what they'd make something that huge for?
Dialogue: A rusty old rocket... Wonder what they'd make something that huge for?

Original: Cloud: There's a Shinra logo on it. Tiny Bronco...... This is cool.
Dialogue: There's a Shinra logo on it. Tiny Bronco...... This is cool.

Original: Barret: The Shinra always keep the most useful things to themselves. Let's steal it!
Dialogue: The Shinra always keep the most useful things to themselves. Let's steal it!

Original: Tifa: I wonder if we can borrow it...
Dialogue: I wonder if we can borrow it...

Original: Aeris: Let's take it? OK, Cloud!
Dialogue: Let's take it? OK, Cloud!

Original: Red XIII: Will it fly? Is it all right to just take it?
Dialogue: Will it fly? Is it all right to just take it?

Original: Yuffie: Cloud, let's steal it! I love stealing from the Shinra!
Dialogue: Cloud, let's steal it! I love stealing from the Shinra!

Original: Cait Sith: Cloud! If we steal it, we'll get in deep trouble!
Dialogue: Cloud! If we steal it, we'll get in deep trouble!

Original: Vincent: ...Want me to keep watch?
Dialogue: ...Want me to keep watch?

Original: Shera: Um...may I help you?
Dialogue: Um...may I help you?

Original: Cloud: No... We're just looking at it.
Dialogue: No... We're just looking at it.

Original: Shera: ...If you would like to use it, please ask the Captain. The Captain should be in the Rocket.
Dialogue: ...If you would like to use it, please ask the Captain. The Captain should be in the Rocket.

Original: Shera: I'm Shera. And what are your names?
Dialogue: I'm Shera. And what are your names?

Original: Cloud: I'm Cloud.
Dialogue: I'm Cloud.

Original: Barret: I'm Barret, of AVALANCHE.
Dialogue: I'm Barret, of AVALANCHE.

Original: Tifa: Tifa. Nice to meet you.
Dialogue: Tifa. Nice to meet you.

Original: Aeris: I'm Aeris.
Dialogue: I'm Aeris.

Original: Red XIII: Nanaki, otherwise known as Red XIII.
Dialogue: Nanaki, otherwise known as Red XIII.

Original: Yuffie: I'm Yuffie!
Dialogue: I'm Yuffie!

Original: Cait Sith: Fortune telling machine Cait Sith, here.
Dialogue: Fortune telling machine Cait Sith, here.

Original: Vincent: Vincent. My occupation is......forget it.
Dialogue: Vincent. My occupation is......forget it.

Original: Shera: Hmm... So you're not with the Shinra. I thought the approval for the reopening of the Space Program came.
Dialogue: Hmm... So you're not with the Shinra. I thought the approval for the reopening of the Space Program came.

Original: Shera: President Rufus is scheduled to come here. The Captain's been so restless all morning.
Dialogue: President Rufus is scheduled to come here. The Captain's been so restless all morning.

Original: Cloud: Rufus!!?
Dialogue: Rufus!!?

Original: Cid: What're you guys doin' here?
Dialogue: What're you guys doin' here?

Original: Cloud: We heard the Captain was here.
Dialogue: We heard the Captain was here.

Original: Cid: Captain? I'm the Captain!
Dialogue: Captain? I'm the Captain!

Original: Cid: The name's Cid. Everyone calls me 'Captain', though.
Dialogue: The name's Cid. Everyone calls me 'Captain', though.

Original: Cid: What d'ya want?
Dialogue: What d'ya want?

Original: Cid: Wow! Not bad for a kid. Alright then, I'll explain it to you. You know Shinra developed a lot of technological gadgets during the meaningless war, right? Now it's a Mako company, but in the old days it was a weapons manufacturer.
Dialogue: Wow! Not bad for a kid. Alright then, I'll explain it to you. You know Shinra developed a lot of technological gadgets during the meaningless war, right? Now it's a Mako company, but in the old days it was a weapons manufacturer.

Original: Cid: Well, they came up with a Rocket Engine. There was so much excitement about the thought of going into outer space. Our dreams got bigger and bigger. They put a major budget into it and made prototype after prototype! Finally, they completed Shinra No. 26. They chose the best pilot in Shinra-- no, in the world--me. I mean, come on.
Dialogue: Well, they came up with a Rocket Engine. There was so much excitement about the thought of going into outer space. Our dreams got bigger and bigger. They put a major budget into it and made prototype after prototype! Finally, they completed Shinra No. 26. They chose the best pilot in Shinra-- no, in the world--me. I mean, come on.

Original: Cid: And finally we get to the day of the launch. Everything was goin' well... But, because of that dumb-ass Shera, the launch got messed up. That's why they became so anal! And so, Shinra nixed their outer space exploration plans. After they told me how the future was Space Exploration and got my damn hopes up...DAMN THEM!
Dialogue: And finally we get to the day of the launch. Everything was goin' well... But, because of that dumb-ass Shera, the launch got messed up. That's why they became so anal! And so, Shinra nixed their outer space exploration plans. After they told me how the future was Space Exploration and got my damn hopes up...DAMN THEM!

Original: Cid: Then, it was all over once they found out Mako energy was profitable. They didn't even so much as look at space exploration. Money, moola, dinero! My dream was just a financial number for them! Look at this rusted Rocket. I was supposed to be the first man in space with this. Everyday, it tilts a little bit more. At this rate, I don't know which will come first, this thing falling down or me gettin' outta here. My last hope is to talk to the President......
Dialogue: Then, it was all over once they found out Mako energy was profitable. They didn't even so much as look at space exploration. Money, moola, dinero! My dream was just a financial number for them! Look at this rusted Rocket. I was supposed to be the first man in space with this. Everyday, it tilts a little bit more. At this rate, I don't know which will come first, this thing falling down or me gettin' outta here. My last hope is to talk to the President......

Original: Cid: Yeah! It must be news about restarting the Space Program. A young President, that's what we needed! He still has dreams, too!
Dialogue: Yeah! It must be news about restarting the Space Program. A young President, that's what we needed! He still has dreams, too!

Original: Cid: You out of your *&$^$# mind!? That's my most cherished possession. I can't let you take it.
Dialogue: You out of your *&$^$# mind!? That's my most cherished possession. I can't let you take it.

Original: Cid: Ummm... Just look around...
Dialogue: Ummm... Just look around...

Original: Shera: Excuse me...Cloud? Did the Captain say anything?
Dialogue: Excuse me...Cloud? Did the Captain say anything?

Original: Cloud: Nope...
Dialogue: Nope...

Original: Shera: Oh...?
Cid: ^%$#! Shera. What are you, blind!? We got guests!! GET SOME TEA! ^%$#!
Dialogue: ^%$#! Shera. What are you, blind!? We got guests!! GET SOME TEA! ^%$#!

Original: Shera: I...I'm sorry.
Dialogue: I...I'm sorry.

Original: Cloud: Really, don't mind us.
Dialogue: Really, don't mind us.

Original: Cid: Shut up! Sit your ass down in that chair and drink your goddamn TEA!
Dialogue: Shut up! Sit your ass down in that chair and drink your goddamn TEA!

Original: Cid: Arggggggh! DAMN, I'm pissed!
Dialogue: Arggggggh! DAMN, I'm pissed!

Original: Cid: Shera! I'll be in the backyard tunin' up Tiny Bronco! An' make sure to serve them some tea! All right!?
Dialogue: Shera! I'll be in the backyard tunin' up Tiny Bronco! An' make sure to serve them some tea! All right!?

Original: Barret: ...damn, man. Wassup with that guy's attitude?
Dialogue: ...damn, man. Wassup with that guy's attitude?

Original: Tifa: Poor Shera.
Dialogue: Poor Shera.

Original: Aeris: Sheesh...!! What bad manners!
Dialogue: Sheesh...!! What bad manners!

Original: Red XIII: Who does he think he is......?
Dialogue: Who does he think he is......?

Original: Yuffie: Man, this sucks...!
Dialogue: Man, this sucks...!

Original: Cait Sith: Man, he sure seems wound up tight.
Dialogue: Man, he sure seems wound up tight.

Original: Cloud: Sorry. It's our fault.
Dialogue: Sorry. It's our fault.

Original: Shera: No, no. He's always like this.
Dialogue: No, no. He's always like this.

Original: Barret: He always like this? That's pretty bad!
Dialogue: He always like this? That's pretty bad!

Original: Tifa: Is it always like this...? Why is Cid so hard on you?
Dialogue: Is it always like this...? Why is Cid so hard on you?

Original: Aeris: Is it like this all the time? You keep quiet even when he's like that to you?
Dialogue: Is it like this all the time? You keep quiet even when he's like that to you?

Original: Red XIII: I think it's a bit too harsh.
Dialogue: I think it's a bit too harsh.

Original: Yuffie: What's his prob!? I'm gonna go clean that guy's clock!!
Dialogue: What's his prob!? I'm gonna go clean that guy's clock!!

Original: Cait Sith: Is he like this all the time...? Bitin' your head off like that? I could never stand it...
Dialogue: Is he like this all the time...? Bitin' your head off like that? I could never stand it...

Original: Vincent: ...It's amazing that you can live with it.
Dialogue: ...It's amazing that you can live with it.

Original: Shera: No... It's because of my stupid mistake. I was the one who destroyed his dream...
Dialogue: No... It's because of my stupid mistake. I was the one who destroyed his dream...

Original: Cloud: What happened?
Dialogue: What happened?

Original: Cid (in flashback): Hey! Get your ass in gear! You work like a snail! Even the moon'd get tired waitin' around for your ass!
Dialogue: Hey! Get your ass in gear! You work like a snail! Even the moon'd get tired waitin' around for your ass!

Original: Shera (in flashback): I'm...I'm sorry.
Dialogue: I'm...I'm sorry.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Don't take so much time checkin' that *%$^# oxygen tank! Shera, bein' careful's good, but it won't do any good, no matter how many times you check that oxygen tank. That thing wouldn't break even if hell froze over.
Dialogue: Don't take so much time checkin' that *%$^# oxygen tank! Shera, bein' careful's good, but it won't do any good, no matter how many times you check that oxygen tank. That thing wouldn't break even if hell froze over.

Original: Shera (in flashback): But...
Dialogue: But...

Original: Cid (in flashback): No buts!! You're not stupid, so be more efficient!
Dialogue: No buts!! You're not stupid, so be more efficient!

Original: Shera (in flashback): I'm sorry......
Dialogue: I'm sorry......

Original: NPC 1: Captain! Our dreams are finally coming true!
Dialogue: Captain! Our dreams are finally coming true!

Original: NPC 2: We are so proud to be a part of the launch of Shinra No. 26.
Dialogue: We are so proud to be a part of the launch of Shinra No. 26.

Original: NPC 3: Captain, preparations are complete! All that's left is lift off!
Dialogue: Captain, preparations are complete! All that's left is lift off!

Original: Cid (in flashback): Yeah! Leave it all to me! I'll be back in a few!
Dialogue: Yeah! Leave it all to me! I'll be back in a few!

Original: NPC: All right, Captain! Fly our dreams into outer space!
Dialogue: All right, Captain! Fly our dreams into outer space!

Original: Cid (in flashback): Thanks, guys!
Dialogue: Thanks, guys!

Original: NPC: We're praying for your safety!
Dialogue: We're praying for your safety!

Original: Cid (in flashback): Instrument panel...all clear. Shinra No. 26, ready for launch.
Dialogue: Instrument panel...all clear. Shinra No. 26, ready for launch.

Original: NPC: Engine pressure rising. Shinra No. 26, 3 minutes to launch. Beginning countdown.
Dialogue: Engine pressure rising. Shinra No. 26, 3 minutes to launch. Beginning countdown.

Original: Cid (in flashback): ......finally.
Dialogue: ......finally.

Original: Cid (in flashback): What the? What happened!?
Dialogue: What the? What happened!?

Original: NPC: Cid! We have an emergency situation! A mechanic is still in the engine section of the rocket!
Dialogue: Cid! We have an emergency situation! A mechanic is still in the engine section of the rocket!

Original: Cid (in flashback): What!? Who is the little ^%$@!?
Dialogue: What!? Who is the little ^%$@!?

Original: NPC: I don't know. Activating the intercom in the engine section.
Dialogue: I don't know. Activating the intercom in the engine section.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Hey goddammit!! Who the &%$#'s still in there?
Dialogue: Hey goddammit!! Who the &%$#'s still in there?

Original: Shera (in flashback): It's Shera, Captain. Don't mind me, go ahead with the launch.
Dialogue: It's Shera, Captain. Don't mind me, go ahead with the launch.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Shera!? What are you still doin' in there!?
Dialogue: Shera!? What are you still doin' in there!?

Original: Shera (in flashback): I was still concerned. The results of the oxygen tank test weren't satisfactory.
Dialogue: I was still concerned. The results of the oxygen tank test weren't satisfactory.

Original: Cid (in flashback): You stupid little ^$#^%! It's gonna get so hot in there that there ain't gonna be SHIT left when we blast off! You're gonna be burnt to a crisp! You're gonna die! You know that, doncha!?
Dialogue: You stupid little ^$#^%! It's gonna get so hot in there that there ain't gonna be SHIT left when we blast off! You're gonna be burnt to a crisp! You're gonna die! You know that, doncha!?

Original: Shera (in flashback): I don't mind. If I can just fix this, the launch will be a success. I'm almost done.
Dialogue: I don't mind. If I can just fix this, the launch will be a success. I'm almost done.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Almost done!? You're gonna die!
Dialogue: Almost done!? You're gonna die!

Original: NPC: Cid, we must start the countdown. We won't make it if we don't!
Dialogue: Cid, we must start the countdown. We won't make it if we don't!

Original: NPC: Starting engine!
Dialogue: Starting engine!

Original: Cid (in flashback): Hey, wait a minute! Shera's still in here!
Dialogue: Hey, wait a minute! Shera's still in here!

Original: NPC: What are you going to do, Cid? If we cancel now, it'll be another six months until the next launch!
Dialogue: What are you going to do, Cid? If we cancel now, it'll be another six months until the next launch!

Original: Cid (in flashback): GODDAMMIT, Shera... you wanna make me a murderer?
Dialogue: GODDAMMIT, Shera... you wanna make me a murderer?

Original: Shera (in flashback): Captain!
Dialogue: Captain!

Original: Cid (in flashback): Shera!?
Dialogue: Shera!?

Original: Shera (in flashback): Tank Number 7 check is complete. Once I complete Tank Number 8, it's all clear.
Dialogue: Tank Number 7 check is complete. Once I complete Tank Number 8, it's all clear.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Come on, Shera...hurry up... You're gonna die...
Dialogue: Come on, Shera...hurry up... You're gonna die...

Original: NPC: 30 seconds until ignition. Beginning countdown.
Dialogue: 30 seconds until ignition. Beginning countdown.

Original: NPC: Cid! Forget about her. We won't make it in time!
Dialogue: Cid! Forget about her. We won't make it in time!

Original: Cid (in flashback): What...what am I...... What am I supposed to do...?
Dialogue: What...what am I...... What am I supposed to do...?

Original: NPC: 15 seconds until ignition. Internal temperature rising.
Dialogue: 15 seconds until ignition. Internal temperature rising.

Original: Cid (in flashback): Oh man, the moon...outer space... my dreams...
Dialogue: Oh man, the moon...outer space... my dreams...

Original: NPC: Ignite Engine!
Dialogue: Ignite Engine!

Original: Cid (in flashback): SH-------------IT!!

Shera: He pushed the Emergency Engine Shut Down switch, aborting the mission, to save my life. After that, the Space Program was cut back and the launch was canceled. It's my fault his dream was destroyed... That's why...it's all right. I don't care what the Captain says, I'll live my life for him.
Dialogue: He pushed the Emergency Engine Shut Down switch, aborting the mission, to save my life. After that, the Space Program was cut back and the launch was canceled. It's my fault his dream was destroyed... That's why...it's all right. I don't care what the Captain says, I'll live my life for him.

Original: Cid: Shera! You still haven't served 'em tea!
Dialogue: Shera! You still haven't served 'em tea!

Original: Shera: I...I'm sorry.
Dialogue: I...I'm sorry.

Original: Cid: Hurry up and sit down! Or ain't my hospitality good enough for you!?
Dialogue: Hurry up and sit down! Or ain't my hospitality good enough for you!?

Original: Cid: They're late... Where is Rufus...?
Dialogue: They're late... Where is Rufus...?

Original: Palmer: Hey-HEY! Long time no see! So Cid, how ya been?
Dialogue: Hey-HEY! Long time no see! So Cid, how ya been?

Original: Cid: Well, if it ain't fat man, Palmer. How long were you figurin' on keepin' me waitin'!?
Dialogue: Well, if it ain't fat man, Palmer. How long were you figurin' on keepin' me waitin'!?

Original: Cid: So? When's the Space Program gonna start up again?
Dialogue: So? When's the Space Program gonna start up again?

Original: Palmer: Hey-hey! I don't know. The President's outside, so why don't you ask him?
Dialogue: Hey-hey! I don't know. The President's outside, so why don't you ask him?

Original: Cid: ^$#&! Good for nothing, fat &$#$^@!
Dialogue: ^$#&! Good for nothing, fat &$#$^@!

Original: Palmer: Don't say 'fat'!
Dialogue: Don't say 'fat'!

Original: Palmer: Hey-hey! Tea! Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and... oh yeah, don't forget the lard!
Dialogue: Hey-hey! Tea! Can I have some too? With lotsa sugar and honey and... oh yeah, don't forget the lard!

Original: Shera: Is President Rufus here to announce that he's going to restart the Space Program?
Dialogue: Is President Rufus here to announce that he's going to restart the Space Program?

Original: Palmer: Hey-hey? Have we met before?
Dialogue: Hey-hey? Have we met before?

Original: Palmer: Hey-hey! Is the tea ready yet? With plenty of sugar and honey. Oh yeah, and don't forget the lard too.
Dialogue: Hey-hey! Is the tea ready yet? With plenty of sugar and honey. Oh yeah, and don't forget the lard too.

Original: Cid: What the......! You got me all excited for nothing!? Then, what'd you come here for?
Dialogue: What the......! You got me all excited for nothing!? Then, what'd you come here for?

Original: Rufus: I want to borrow the Tiny Bronco. We're going after Sephiroth. But seems like we've been going in the wrong direction. But now, we think we know where he's headed. But, we have to cross the ocean. That's why we want your plane...
Dialogue: I want to borrow the Tiny Bronco. We're going after Sephiroth. But seems like we've been going in the wrong direction. But now, we think we know where he's headed. But, we have to cross the ocean. That's why we want your plane...

Original: Cid: &^#^%! First the Airship, then the Rocket, and now, the Tiny Bronco. Shinra took outer space away from me and now you want to take the sky away from me too!?
Dialogue: &^#^%! First the Airship, then the Rocket, and now, the Tiny Bronco. Shinra took outer space away from me and now you want to take the sky away from me too!?

Original: Rufus: Oh my... You seem to forget it was because of Shinra, Inc. that you were able to fly in the first place.
Dialogue: Oh my... You seem to forget it was because of Shinra, Inc. that you were able to fly in the first place.

Original: Cid: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Shera: Uh, excuse me... This way...
Dialogue: Uh, excuse me... This way...

Original: Shera: You wanted to use the Tiny Bronco, right? I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?
Dialogue: You wanted to use the Tiny Bronco, right? I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?

Original: Shera: I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?
Dialogue: I believe Palmer's going to take it. Why don't you talk to him?

Original: Palmer: Hmm... Why do I have to do this...? I'm the head of the Space Program...
Dialogue: Hmm... Why do I have to do this...? I'm the head of the Space Program...

Dialogue: We'll be takin' that Tiny Bronco.

Dialogue: I've seen you somewhere before...

Dialogue: I know! The Shinra building! When the President was killed! Ulp! Se...se...security!!

Original: Palmer: Heh-hic-heh-hic!
Dialogue: Heh-hic-heh-hic!

Dialogue: Mako Gun

Dialogue: Heh heh hic!

Dialogue: Ugh!

Dialogue: It won't stop!

Dialogue: It won't stop!

Dialogue: It's going to take off.

Dialogue: No!! It's gonna take off!

Dialogue: No! It's going to take off!

Dialogue: It's not going to stop...

Dialogue: Forget it! Get in!!

Dialogue: Shit!! The tail's been hit!

Dialogue: Emergency landing...

Dialogue: This's gonna be a big splash. Hold on to your drawers and don't piss in 'em!

Dialogue: She won't fly anymore.

Dialogue: Can't we use it as a boat?

Dialogue: $#&%! Do whatever you want!

Dialogue: Cid, what are you going to do now?

Dialogue: Dunno. I'm history with the Shinra and I've given up on the town.

Dialogue: How 'bout your wife? How 'bout Shera?

Original: Cid: Wife? Don't make me laugh! Just thinkin' 'bout marryin' her gives me the chills.
Dialogue: Wife? Don't make me laugh! Just thinkin' 'bout marryin' her gives me the chills.

Dialogue: What're you guys gonna do?

Dialogue: We're going after a man named Sephiroth. We'll have to get Rufus of the Shinra someday too.

Original: Cid: I don't know about any of that, but...
Dialogue: I don't know about any of that, but...

Dialogue: What the hell!? Sign me up!

Dialogue: How 'bout it, everyone?

Original: Barret: I don't care.
Dialogue: I don't care.

Original: Tifa: Of course, no problem!
Dialogue: Of course, no problem!

Original: Aeris: I'm all for it.
Dialogue: I'm all for it.

Original: Red XIII: I don't really care.
Dialogue: I don't really care.

Dialogue: Whatever!

Original: Cait Sith: I don't mind.
Dialogue: I don't mind.

Dialogue: ...Do whatever you like.

Dialogue: Glad to be aboard, numbskulls!

Original: Cloud: Numskulls...?
Dialogue: Numskulls...?

Original: Cid: Yeah. Anyone stupid enough to go up against Shinra nowadays, has GOTTA be a numskull! I like it!
Dialogue: Yeah. Anyone stupid enough to go up against Shinra nowadays, has GOTTA be a numskull! I like it!

Original: Cid: So, where we headed? Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth towards the Temple of the Ancients.
Dialogue: So, where we headed? Rufus was goin' after Sephiroth towards the Temple of the Ancients.

Original: Cloud: Really!?...Where is it? That Temple of the Ancients?
Dialogue: Really!?...Where is it? That Temple of the Ancients?

Original: Cid: Dunno. That numskull kid was tellin' me he was headin 'The wrong direction'... so maybe it's off this way?
Dialogue: Dunno. That numskull kid was tellin' me he was headin 'The wrong direction'... so maybe it's off this way?

Original: Cloud: Let's just head for land and get some information. Temple of the Ancients... that name bothers me.
Dialogue: Let's just head for land and get some information. Temple of the Ancients... that name bothers me.

Original: Yuffie: .........Hm. How 'bout goin' west? No, no reason. NO reason at all!
Dialogue: .........Hm. How 'bout goin' west? No, no reason. NO reason at all!

Original: On-screen: How to fly the Tiny Bronco Press the [OK] button to get on. Press the [CANCEL] button to get off. Tiny Bronco can cross shallow waters and rivers. Players can get on and off it on the beach.
Dialogue: How to fly the Tiny Bronco Press the [OK] button to get on. Press the [CANCEL] button to get off. Tiny Bronco can cross shallow waters and rivers. Players can get on and off it on the beach.

Original: Yuffie: Wait, wait, wait, wai----t!!
Dialogue: Wait, wait, wait, wai----t!!

Dialogue: What!? The hell happened, all of a sudden!?

Dialogue: What the--? Did something happen?

Original: Aeris: What!? What happened, all of a sudden?
Dialogue: What!? What happened, all of a sudden?

Dialogue: What happened all of a sudden!? Don't scare me like that!

Original: Cait Sith: Wh, wh, what is it, all of a sudden!? Don't scare me like that!
Dialogue: Wh, wh, what is it, all of a sudden!? Don't scare me like that!

Dialogue: What happened all of a sudden? Did something happen?

Dialogue: What the HELL is it! Shoutin' out and jumpin' in front of me all of a sudden!

Dialogue: I know this area pretty well. It gets pretty tough past here. Better get ready...

Dialogue: ...Hah, I know what you're thinkin'. And you sayin' that just now means you're up to somethin'! Right!?

Original: Tifa: ...Really? Somehow,...I don't believe it. Are you trying to con us again...?
Dialogue: ...Really? Somehow,...I don't believe it. Are you trying to con us again...?

Original: Aeris: ......Hmmm...... Something's fishy... You're not planning something sneaky again, are you?
Dialogue: ......Hmmm...... Something's fishy... You're not planning something sneaky again, are you?

Original: Red XIII: Hmm...... Smells fishy. You're not going to trick us again...?
Dialogue: Hmm...... Smells fishy. You're not going to trick us again...?

Original: Barret: ...You serious? And you sayin' that just now means you're up to somethin'! Right!? That means, I don't trust you.
Dialogue: ...You serious? And you sayin' that just now means you're up to somethin'! Right!? That means, I don't trust you.

Original: Tifa: ...Really? Something's telling me I still shouldn't trust you. Are you thinking of tricking us again...?
Dialogue: ...Really? Something's telling me I still shouldn't trust you. Are you thinking of tricking us again...?

Original: Aeris: ......Hmmm... Something's fishy... You're not planning something sneaky again, are you?
Dialogue: ......Hmmm... Something's fishy... You're not planning something sneaky again, are you?

Original: Red XIII: Hmm,... Smells fishy. My nose never lies!
Dialogue: Hmm,... Smells fishy. My nose never lies!

Original: Cait Sith: You serious? I can't trust a person like you. But, I guess I'm not one to talk.
Dialogue: You serious? I can't trust a person like you. But, I guess I'm not one to talk.

Dialogue: Further down? I don't see any signs of danger... Also, there's something unnatural in the way Yuffie's acting...

Original: Cid: Hey! You, serious? If you're trying to con us, you won't get away with it!
Dialogue: Hey! You, serious? If you're trying to con us, you won't get away with it!

Dialogue: No! It's REALLY tough...

Dialogue: There they are, catch 'em!!

Dialogue: Hey, that's not them! These are the other guys from before!!

Dialogue: Yuffie, so you're...!

Dialogue: Whaddya mean 'this one'!? 'This one'! So you WERE plannin' somethin'!!

Dialogue: What's going on? I thought something was funny, my materia, disappeared!!
